column1: The All-In-Sensor is the ultimative device for security, real time informations and smart device control.
It's the only device of its kind that can be connected directly to your smartphone.
And the lifelong update guarantee ensures that your system is always state-of-the-art.
Equipment for surveillance, environmental informations and smart device control has a huge problem:
You have to buy a lot of different sensors, a control center and a gateway, you need internet access, a WiFi connection and a lot of time for commissioning to get the result you want.

The All-In-Sensor puts an end to this expensive and complicated situation.

 

18 sensors and functions make the All-in Sensor particularly effective and affordable. Gone are the days of purchasing a stand-alone security system with many different sensors and time-consuming and nerve-wracking installations.

 

And it offers the most easy to use smart home control technology on market. Gone are the days of trouble to bring your smart home system to work. Now you need only few clicks on your smartphone, and all is working as you wish.

 

The All-In-Sensor is the ultimate solution for all your needs, at home and on the road.
<div data-caption=""Find detailed descriptions of each sensor and function at the bottom of this page."" data-id=""32937523""><figure style=""margin: 0px
column9: s=6b9e974c07675b475c660077a1d4af88"" src=""""/>

column1: Instead of paying over $800 for all of these sensors and functions individually  you can get  all this functionality in one device. for just $ 99
It took 4 years of continues development effort to bring this new patented technology to you.
It can monitor, protect, measure and control any environment you want.
• to protect your car,  RV, hotel room or your office
• Track the light, humidity, gases and water in your bathroom, greenhouse, reptile tank and have peace of mind wherever you go
Installation is a breeze with All-In-Sensor's included adhesive pad. Stick it on a window frame, a wall, a window, or any other hard surface and your ready to use it!
Receive instant alerts from the All-In-Sensor when an alarm is triggered. Set your preferences in the accompanying app.
Place All-In-Sensor in your car and be notified of any disturbances.
It's easy to monitor temperature and humidity with the All-In-Sensor. Place it in a bathroom, a greenhouse, or a sauna for quick and easy monitoring.
When connected to smart lights, the All-In-Sensor can facilitate motion-activated light.
The app allows you to store multiple phone numbers. When an alarm is triggered, you can notify multiple people.
Personalize your preferences in the intuitive app. Set sensor thresholds, trigger responses, and connect smart home devices all in one place.
Use the app to control your smart home devices from anywhere! This allows you to respond to situations, alarms, and notifications you receive, even when you're not there.
See in  short videos how it works
Its so easy to connect All-In-Sensor with any smartphone.
Control every sensor by a click in app
Intelligent control of any device with just a few clicks. Smart home control couldn't be easier.
All-In-Sensor control of all devices from any place worldwide
The All-In-Sensor has an endless range of potential applications, see some suggestions for use in below PDF link

With the All-In-Sensor and your smartphone, you can control, secure, measure and monitor any space you want. An All-In-Sensor can monitor a whole room up to approximately 50 square meters (540 sq ft) for all common hazards and control any of the space's smart home devices.

The All-In-Sensor is connected with a smartphone via a special Bluetooth signal. This smartphone works as a ""control center"". It can be your smartphone if you are in the range of the All-In-Sensor or you use the Direct-Smarter Connector if you are far away.
It uses Bluetooth 4.2 LE and has a range of about 30m (100ft) indoors and 150m (500ft) outdoors.

Each sensor and function can be turned on individually and adjusted to your desired sensitivity. You can also set up alarms, notifications, and even actions that are triggered if a sensor’s set threshold is reached.

In case of an alarm or an event like the motion detector triggers or the room temperature rises above 30°C (86°F), the All-In-Sensor sends a signal to your smartphone. The smartphone makes an loud alarm or inform other people via call, SMS, mail or push notification.
When you use the AIS Receiver App on your smartphone, you will get the information 1 second after the event occur via Push Notification.

The All-In-Sensor app integrates with your smart home devices and allows you to respond with appropriate and immediate responses.

 

Say you own a vacation home that occasionally you let others rent. Before your visitors arrive, you can know the temperature, security, and status of the entire home. You can prepare it for their arrival by turning on lights, the water heater, and adjusting the thermostat. You can monitor when they arrive, when they leave, and what amenities they use. And you can make sure that the place is safe and secure when they leave.
<div data-caption=""Specific technologies will continually be developed and added"" data-id=""32937670""><figure style=""margin: 0px
column9: s=4132a72d83ee8f4089216479399785d9"" src=""""/>

column1: With our smart home power plug, you have the ability to respond to any alert, alarm, or condition by turning on/off the light, radio, air conditioning, heater, or appliance. You can control your smart home devices manually, or you can pre-program a response in the All-In-Sensor app.
We are already working on MQTT for connecting the All-In-Sensor with other smart home systems like Philips Hue, Apple Homekit and so on, so that you can use them together if you like.

column9:
s=62eb0696b81614849605dccec5ce9d5c"" src=""""/> 

The All-In-Sensor app allows you to program actions that your smart home will take if certain sensor thresholds are triggered. For example, if it is night and it is dark and movement is detected, the light will switch on. Or, if there is too much moisture in the bathroom, the window will open. With a smart power plug you can switch  on/off any electric device like lights, music, air conditioning, heat and so on.

column1:
Very helpful: you create your own smart processes just with few clicks on your smartphone, the new technology allows the cooperation of up to 5 sensors in the All-In-Sensor to control your electric devices in any way you want.

 

FOR LOCAL USE AND CONTROL, USE YOUR OWN SMARTPHONE

If you are in the proximity of the All-In-Sensor or switches (in buildings up to 50m / 150ft or an open field up to 150m / 500ft), all signals can be received and sent directly with your smartphone / tablet.

Neither a Wifi nor internet or cellular connection is required for this.

 

You operate your own private local network, this is possible at any place you want.

You install the AIS Center App directly onto your Android smartphone / tablet and can use all functions directly. (The iOS App is in the works and will be available in time with All-In-Sensor delivery)

 

FOR REMOTE USE AND CONTROL, USE THE CONNECTOR TO ACT AS LOCAL CONTROL CENTER

If you want to use the signals over long distances, you need the Connector in the area of your All-In-Sensors or switches. The Connector establishes a connection between the All-In-Sensor and switches to your (far away) smartphone / tablet. This connection is made via a secure M2M (machine to machine) cellular connection and works worldwide.

No data is stored on cloud servers, this gives you 100% data and hacker protection.  The DST- Connector can manage up to 99 sensors and smart switches in its environment and can be used at any place, indoor and outdoor, also moble in vehicles.
The weatherproof housing of the connector allows the use at any place and a world sim card for direct contact to your smartphone is also already cost free integrated.

The special Direct-Smarter SIM card is already included in the connector and automatically logs into the stronger cellular network, regardless of where you use the connector. Mobile use (e.g. in vehicles) is also possible.
The data volume for an average usage period of 5 years is already included on the Direct-Smarter SIM card
column2:
if necessary, it can be extended at any time for a $49.

 

For intensive data traffic, the connector can also be connected to the local WiFi network, the Direct-Smarter SIM card then works as a backup if the WiFi connection is disturbed.

column1:
The Connector is delivered ready for use, no registration or contract conclusion is required and there are no monthly costs.

 

To connect your smartphone to the connector, you will install the AIS Receiver app for Android or IOS on your smartphone / tablet.
It enables a direct connection to the connector, the All-In-Sensor and switches.  The AIS Receiver app is available in IOS store and google play.

We proudly introduce Direct-Smarter Technology with the All-In-Sensor, a solution that requires no Internet connection, no registration of user accounts, and no complicated installations. Direct-Smarter Technology allows the All-In-Sensor to be a wireless transmitter that can be used anywhere, with end-to-end encryption and complete data protection.
Camera surveillance is an important topic. But cases of cameras being hacked keep increasing. Who knows if someone is watching you through your camera without you noticing.
We look for dealer and distributor all over the world.
Take your chance to get one of the exclusive dealer licenses in your country.
If you are interested to cooperate with us, please contact us by e-mail.
Please note that none of these ADD-ON devices are required for the All-In-Sensor to work.
The All-In-Sensor is a stand-alone, full-fledged multi-sensor device that gives you the best performance that a security and intelligent control device on the market can offer.

The devices in our ADD-ON list are only intended to show which products are available. These devices can work together with the All-In-Sensor if you want to build a more extensive security- and smart home system

 

 Click on the photo below to open the linked PDF list.
The All-In-Sensor is our new premium stand alone multi tool for your smartphone.
Before we started the development of the All-In-Sensor, we finished on base
of our new radio technology many helpful components.
All of them are compatible with the All-In-Sensor.
In this Kickstarter campaign you can order them with great discount.

The motion detector detects movements in up to 10 m distance, sensitivity is adjustable in 3 steps.

 

Window Opening Sensor

In order to achieve a reliable security when leaving the house, it is important to be informed about the current condition of the windows. This  is why the All-In-Sensor sensor is able to detect the tilted or open position of a window.

 

Glass Breakage Sensor

If the sensor is mounted on a window, it can detect the break of the glass and trigger an alarm.

 

Subsonic Sensor

When opening and closing a door or window, an inaudible, very special air pulse is generated. The sensor can detect this impulse and monitor an area of about 120 m². This makes it possible to monitor all windows and doors in a room with just one All-In-Sensor sensor.

 

Magnetic Sensor

The sensor can be triggered by a magnet, e.g. by opening doors and windows.

 

Sabotage Detector

If the All-In-Sensor is removed from its bracket, the sabotage sensor triggers an alarm.

 

Light Sensor

The light sensor can detect daylight and darkness with adjustable sensitivity and trigger smart home switches when set thresholds are exceeded or not reached.

 

Vibration Sensor

As soon as the sensor detects a vibration with adjustable sensitivity, a signal will be sent.

 

Gyroscope 3 Axis Sensor

The 3-axis gyroscope sensor is extreme sensitive and the sensitivity can be adjusted from 1 - 100%. This can be used, for example, to determine whether a window or door is being opened, a vehicle is being moved, an object is being removed from its position, and so on.

 

Humidity Sensor

If the humidity exceed or not reach the set threshold, a signal will be sent.  This is very important, for example, in air-conditioned rooms, greenhouses, pet shops, storage rooms, etc.

 

Temperature Sensor

Like the humidity, a signal will be sent, when the temperature exceed or not reach the set threshold.  This is very important in air-conditioned rooms, greenhouses, pet shops, storage rooms, etc.

 

Fire Sensor

Each fire with an open flame generates a very special infrared light spectrum, which can be perceived by the flame sensor even at greater distances.
Due to the optical evaluation, the flame sensor is a very good addition, to smoke detectors and because it can detect fire without major smoke development in an early stage of fire development. The sensitivity can be adjusted for the individual needs.

 

Gas Detector

The gas detector can be connected to the All-In-Sensor via a USB-C plug and can send alarm signals or switch devices in combination with other sensors, e.g. the fire sensor.

 

Water Detector

The water detector can also be connected to the All-In-Sensor via a USB-C plug and can send alarm signals or switch for example a magnet valve off to stop water that is leaking out. This can be used in animal and plant breeding houses or for alerting.

 

Infrared Light Barrier

In contrast to the PIR motion detector, an infrared light barrier allows to monitor larger areas up to 30 m distance between sensor and IR signal transmitter. And a IR light barrier works reliably even at higher environment temperatures above  30°C (86°F).
The IR light barrier is available as pure IR transmitter for indoor use together with the All-In-Sensor or as standalone device for outdoor use.

 

Repeater

Even though the All-In-Sensor has high radio ranges, it can be helpful in difficult environmental conditions if a radio signal is transmitted from one sensor to the next and then to the smartphone. This is achieved by the integrated repeater function and thus enables even large and complex building structures to be secured and controlled.

 

Time Switch

The integrated timer makes it possible to activate or deactivate the sensors controlled by a certain time, like activate the motion detector from 10 pm to 6 am, so that the house is secured in the night. The timer can turn on the smart homes switches for a defined time, too.

 

Smart Home Device Control

In order to make the All-In-Sensor usable for a wide range of applications, a complete Smart Home control has been integrated. This enables the All-In-Sensor to perform tasks in the building or at any location in connection with a smartphone according to previously defined sensors and parameters.

It is planned that the All-In-Sensor is able to interact directly with switches, sockets or receiver modules in LED lamps or any electrical devices. The smartphone connector is only needed to make the settings then. 

 

More functions are constantly being developed, the updates are available to you free of charge.
","click here to see the video in other languages with subtitles
The All-In-Sensor is the ultimative device for security, real time informations and smart device control.
It's the only device of its kind that can be connected directly to your smartphone.
And the lifelong update guarantee ensures that your system is always state-of-the-art.
Equipment for surveillance, environmental informations and smart device control has a huge problem:
You have to buy a lot of different sensors, a control center and a gateway, you need internet access, a WiFi connection and a lot of time for commissioning to get the result you want.

The All-In-Sensor puts an end to this expensive and complicated situation. 18 sensors and functions make the All-in Sensor particularly effective and affordable. Gone are the days of purchasing a stand-alone security system with many different sensors and time-consuming and nerve-wracking installations. And it offers the most easy to use smart home control technology on market. Gone are the days of trouble to bring your smart home system to work. Now you need only few clicks on your smartphone, and all is working as you wish. The All-In-Sensor is the ultimate solution for all your needs, at home and on the road.
Find detailed descriptions of each sensor and function at the bottom of this page.
Instead of paying over $800 for all of these sensors and functions individually  you can get  all this functionality in one device. for just $ 99
It took 4 years of continues development effort to bring this new patented technology to you.
It can monitor, protect, measure and control any environment you want.
to protect your car,  RV, hotel room or your office
Track the light, humidity, gases and water in your bathroom, greenhouse, reptile tank and have peace of mind wherever you go
Installation is a breeze with All-In-Sensor's included adhesive pad. Stick it on a window frame, a wall, a window, or any other hard surface and your ready to use it!
Receive instant alerts from the All-In-Sensor when an alarm is triggered. Set your preferences in the accompanying app.
Place All-In-Sensor in your car and be notified of any disturbances.
It's easy to monitor temperature and humidity with the All-In-Sensor. Place it in a bathroom, a greenhouse, or a sauna for quick and easy monitoring.
When connected to smart lights, the All-In-Sensor can facilitate motion-activated light.
The app allows you to store multiple phone numbers. When an alarm is triggered, you can notify multiple people.
Personalize your preferences in the intuitive app. Set sensor thresholds, trigger responses, and connect smart home devices all in one place.
Use the app to control your smart home devices from anywhere! This allows you to respond to situations, alarms, and notifications you receive, even when you're not there.
See in  short videos how it works
Its so easy to connect All-In-Sensor with any smartphone.
Control every sensor by a click in app
Intelligent control of any device with just a few clicks. Smart home control couldn't be easier.
All-In-Sensor control of all devices from any place worldwide
The All-In-Sensor has an endless range of potential applications, see some suggestions for use in below PDF link

With the All-In-Sensor and your smartphone, you can control, secure, measure and monitor any space you want. An All-In-Sensor can monitor a whole room up to approximately 50 square meters (540 sq ft) for all common hazards and control any of the space's smart home devices.

The All-In-Sensor is connected with a smartphone via a special Bluetooth signal. This smartphone works as a ""control center"". It can be your smartphone if you are in the range of the All-In-Sensor or you use the Direct-Smarter Connector if you are far away.
It uses Bluetooth 4.2 LE and has a range of about 30m (100ft) indoors and 150m (500ft) outdoors.

Each sensor and function can be turned on individually and adjusted to your desired sensitivity. You can also set up alarms, notifications, and even actions that are triggered if a sensor’s set threshold is reached.

In case of an alarm or an event like the motion detector triggers or the room temperature rises above 30°C (86°F), the All-In-Sensor sends a signal to your smartphone. The smartphone makes an loud alarm or inform other people via call, SMS, mail or push notification.
When you use the AIS Receiver App on your smartphone, you will get the information 1 second after the event occur via Push Notification.

The All-In-Sensor app integrates with your smart home devices and allows you to respond with appropriate and immediate responses. Say you own a vacation home that occasionally you let others rent. Before your visitors arrive, you can know the temperature, security, and status of the entire home. You can prepare it for their arrival by turning on lights, the water heater, and adjusting the thermostat. You can monitor when they arrive, when they leave, and what amenities they use. And you can make sure that the place is safe and secure when they leave.
Specific technologies will continually be developed and added

With our smart home power plug, you have the ability to respond to any alert, alarm, or condition by turning on/off the light, radio, air conditioning, heater, or appliance. You can control your smart home devices manually, or you can pre-program a response in the All-In-Sensor app.
We are already working on MQTT for connecting the All-In-Sensor with other smart home systems like Philips Hue, Apple Homekit and so on, so that you can use them together if you like.

The All-In-Sensor app allows you to program actions that your smart home will take if certain sensor thresholds are triggered. For example, if it is night and it is dark and movement is detected, the light will switch on. Or, if there is too much moisture in the bathroom, the window will open. With a smart power plug you can switch  on/off any electric device like lights, music, air conditioning, heat and so on.

Very helpful: you create your own smart processes just with few clicks on your smartphone, the new technology allows the cooperation of up to 5 sensors in the All-In-Sensor to control your electric devices in any way you want. FOR LOCAL USE AND CONTROL, USE YOUR OWN SMARTPHONE

If you are in the proximity of the All-In-Sensor or switches (in buildings up to 50m / 150ft or an open field up to 150m / 500ft), all signals can be received and sent directly with your smartphone / tablet.
Neither a Wifi nor internet or cellular connection is required for this. You operate your own private local network, this is possible at any place you want.

You install the AIS Center App directly onto your Android smartphone / tablet and can use all functions directly. (The iOS App is in the works and will be available in time with All-In-Sensor delivery) FOR REMOTE USE AND CONTROL, USE THE CONNECTOR TO ACT AS LOCAL CONTROL CENTER

If you want to use the signals over long distances, you need the Connector in the area of your All-In-Sensors or switches. The Connector establishes a connection between the All-In-Sensor and switches to your (far away) smartphone / tablet. This connection is made via a secure M2M (machine to machine) cellular connection and works worldwide.

No data is stored on cloud servers, this gives you 100% data and hacker protection.  The DST- Connector can manage up to 99 sensors and smart switches in its environment and can be used at any place, indoor and outdoor, also moble in vehicles.
The weatherproof housing of the connector allows the use at any place and a world sim card for direct contact to your smartphone is also already cost free integrated.

The special Direct-Smarter SIM card is already included in the connector and automatically logs into the stronger cellular network, regardless of where you use the connector. Mobile use (e.g. in vehicles) is also possible.
The data volume for an average usage period of 5 years is already included on the Direct-Smarter SIM card
column2: if necessary, it can be extended at any time for a $49. For intensive data traffic, the connector can also be connected to the local WiFi network, the Direct-Smarter SIM card then works as a backup if the WiFi connection is disturbed.

column1: The Connector is delivered ready for use, no registration or contract conclusion is required and there are no monthly costs. To connect your smartphone to the connector, you will install the AIS Receiver app for Android or IOS on your smartphone / tablet.
It enables a direct connection to the connector, the All-In-Sensor and switches.  The AIS Receiver app is available in IOS store and google play.

We proudly introduce Direct-Smarter Technology with the All-In-Sensor, a solution that requires no Internet connection, no registration of user accounts, and no complicated installations. Direct-Smarter Technology allows the All-In-Sensor to be a wireless transmitter that can be used anywhere, with end-to-end encryption and complete data protection.

Before we started the development of the All-In-Sensor, we finished on base
of our new radio technology many helpful components.
All of them are compatible with the All-In-Sensor.
In this Kickstarter campaign you can order them with great discount.
The motion detector detects movements in up to 10 m distance, sensitivity is adjustable in 3 steps. Window Opening Sensor

In order to achieve a reliable security when leaving the house, it is important to be informed about the current condition of the windows. This  is why the All-In-Sensor sensor is able to detect the tilted or open position of a window. Glass Breakage Sensor
If the sensor is mounted on a window, it can detect the break of the glass and trigger an alarm. Subsonic Sensor

When opening and closing a door or window, an inaudible, very special air pulse is generated. The sensor can detect this impulse and monitor an area of about 120 m². This makes it possible to monitor all windows and doors in a room with just one All-In-Sensor sensor. Magnetic Sensor
The sensor can be triggered by a magnet, e.g. by opening doors and windows. Sabotage Detector
If the All-In-Sensor is removed from its bracket, the sabotage sensor triggers an alarm. Light Sensor
The light sensor can detect daylight and darkness with adjustable sensitivity and trigger smart home switches when set thresholds are exceeded or not reached. Vibration Sensor
As soon as the sensor detects a vibration with adjustable sensitivity, a signal will be sent. Gyroscope 3 Axis Sensor

The 3-axis gyroscope sensor is extreme sensitive and the sensitivity can be adjusted from 1 - 100%. This can be used, for example, to determine whether a window or door is being opened, a vehicle is being moved, an object is being removed from its position, and so on. Humidity Sensor

If the humidity exceed or not reach the set threshold, a signal will be sent.  This is very important, for example, in air-conditioned rooms, greenhouses, pet shops, storage rooms, etc. Temperature Sensor

Like the humidity, a signal will be sent, when the temperature exceed or not reach the set threshold.  This is very important in air-conditioned rooms, greenhouses, pet shops, storage rooms, etc. Fire Sensor

Each fire with an open flame generates a very special infrared light spectrum, which can be perceived by the flame sensor even at greater distances.Due to the optical evaluation, the flame sensor is a very good addition, to smoke detectors and because it can detect fire without major smoke development in an early stage of fire development. The sensitivity can be adjusted for the individual needs. Gas Detector
The gas detector can be connected to the All-In-Sensor via a USB-C plug and can send alarm signals or switch devices in combination with other sensors, e.g. the fire sensor. Water Detector

The water detector can also be connected to the All-In-Sensor via a USB-C plug and can send alarm signals or switch for example a magnet valve off to stop water that is leaking out. This can be used in animal and plant breeding houses or for alerting. Infrared Light Barrier

In contrast to the PIR motion detector, an infrared light barrier allows to monitor larger areas up to 30 m distance between sensor and IR signal transmitter. And a IR light barrier works reliably even at higher environment temperatures above  30°C (86°F).The IR light barrier is available as pure IR transmitter for indoor use together with the All-In-Sensor or as standalone device for outdoor use. Repeater

Even though the All-In-Sensor has high radio ranges, it can be helpful in difficult environmental conditions if a radio signal is transmitted from one sensor to the next and then to the smartphone. This is achieved by the integrated repeater function and thus enables even large and complex building structures to be secured and controlled. Time Switch

The integrated timer makes it possible to activate or deactivate the sensors controlled by a certain time, like activate the motion detector from 10 pm to 6 am, so that the house is secured in the night. The timer can turn on the smart homes switches for a defined time, too. Smart Home Device Control

column9:
>WaveTex is breathable, lint-free and durable (washable every-night)

Your pillow is covered with a piece of old tech… It's time to change that.

Incredibly soft, clean, and beautifully designed, our pillowcases are engineered with some of the most advanced textiles that are naturally cooling and hypoallergenic... It's called WaveTex! And, we made a pillowcase with it.

We recommend this Dullo WaveTex Pillowcase to those who:

column1: • Want to customize their pillows with ease
• Want to wash pillowcase every day or as frequently

A  good night’s sleep is essential for your physical and emotional health and well-being, and we specialize in providing optimal sleep temperature and cleanliness.

Dullo WaveTex Pillowcase achieves natural cooling without using any harsh dyes or chemicals at all.

column2: therefore, no artificial cooling 'effect' that may causes 'skin problems'

column1: Dullo WaveTex Pillowcase is made of a natural dyeing process, called pigment dye. It's widely known in the clothing industry, but we wanted to apply this to beddings to provide the perfect sleep environment. There are so many benefits &
column2: features to consider. And it looks beautiful, too.
column10:
>WaveTex is breathable, lint-free and durable (washable every-night)

So, How’s Revolutionary WaveTex Obtained? 

This WaveTex fabric is created through a natural and elegant process through which the fabric is boiled and dried at very high heat, removing lint and other impurities. That alone makes the Dullo WaveTex Pillowcase completely lint-free. Then comes the tumble dry stage of the fabric development, after which there is a natural shrinkage process that ends up organically creating the distinctive wave pattern it features. This is also how the unique aesthetics of this pillowcase is created: beyond its functionality and comfort it offers, the Dullo WaveTex Pillowcase will look spectacular on your bed!
column17:
s=f5c9cd717dbb8c2ef7bd6df6b2d07a97"" src=""""/>

In this natural pigment dying process, no harsh chemical treatment has been applied to the fabric what-so-ever
column18: therefore, providing the most natural sleep environment possible. Naturally, pre-shrunk, lint-free, and machine-washable. Look at this in detail once more. It's super satisfying to touch and feel.
column27:
>Super Stretchy

The Upper Third of the Pillow is Super Stretchy

The expandable band is made from the Lycra fabric that's often used in underwear and yoga pants. Thanks to this amazing stretchability, you can fit any pillows into the Dullo WaveTex Pillowcase. Try to fit 1-4 pillows
column28:
choose memory foams, cotton, goose downs, micro-fibers, or any other fillings. We tried to fit 3 pillows inside. See it yourself:

Important Notes: No one but you can create the perfect pillow for you. The Dullo WaveTex Pillowcase offers you the opportunity of always having the perfect personalized pillow that millimetrically suits your needs and preferences.
column29: >If sleeping flat doesn’t work for you, you can fit up to four pillows into your Dullo WaveTex Pillowcase for higher neck and spinal support!
column37:
>It works like this... air travel through and in-between the 3d wave texture

 WaveTex is Natural Cooling: It Feels Like A Million Soft Waves on the Ocean

Sleep Cool! Its surface is a 3-dimensional pattern, shaped like ocean waves. Touching it makes you feel like you’re being smoothly touched by a million soft waves on the ocean. Listen to it, yourself by press ""play""
column39:
showinfo=0"">
 

Natural Cooling by 3D Surface Structure with No Chemicals

Its finely designed embossed surface makes minimal contact with your skin, creating a special sense of breathability- incredibly breathable with cooling comfort. It allows you to sleep at an optimal temperature. It literally makes you feel like this guy:
column47:
Your body heat will be naturally dissipated.

Important Note: Rather than using harsh chemicals applied to the fabric and pillowcase directly, we made these pillowcases super eco-friendly. Also, no fake cooling 'effect' and 'skin problems' from coolants on textiles. The fewer chemicals, the better it is for you.

Lint-Free &
column48:
Super Skin-Friendly, too

Hypoallergenic WaveTex provides resistance from dust mites and other allergens! It's extremely satisfying to touch. You will be waking up feeling rested and refreshed every morning. WaveTex, itself, is also wrinkle, shrink, fade, and stain-resistant!
column55:
s=99781a6d2466e84bc7e7ff7099d4aba6"" src=""""/>

Cover Those Hotel Pillows

Do you travel frequently and worry about the pillows you’re sleeping on? Now you can sleep with health and well-being undisturbed. Cover up those hotel pillows! Most importantly, it fits any pillows!   

 We Dare You to Wash It Every Day. Put it to the Test, please!

The Dullo WaveTex Pillowcase is extremely durable. You can wash it every day if you wish to enjoy a pillowcase that always feels new and fresh. It will endure as many washing cycles as you want to put it through without losing its unique properties! 

Of course, it's machine washable. It dries quickly on tumble dry low or even at room temperature.

CottonShower takes safety very seriously
column56: especially with our new invention-WaveTex. To name a few tests and certifications:

column1: • CPSIA: The Consumer Product Safety Improvement Act
• SVHC: Substance of very high concern by REACH
Our Lab: We’ve mainly partnered with SGS for all fabric-related testing. The SGS report system is a global standard
column2:
it's a Swiss multinational company, headquartered in Geneva, Switzerland which provides inspection, verification, testing, and certification services.

Like many small businesses, Founder James Lee started CottonShower with nothing more than big dreams and humble beginnings, straight out of Korea. Today, we’re proud to bring the highest quality, affordable pillowcases, blankets, and more to people around the world. You could say our dreams have come true. How we got our start?

In the past few years, we launched Dullo Pillows with over 10,000 customers around the globe. This was just the beginning of an incredible journey to revolutionize pillow products. In 2020, in the midst of a pandemic, you, Kickstarter Backers, have helped us build the brand-new manufacturing plant. Thank you so much!

To redeem, we did what we do best
column3:
we pored over research, studies, and customer feedback to see what other products could benefit you. We've created a WaveTex and the pillowcase that we know you'll love. Especially today in tough times, when everyone needs a safe space to feel cozy and relaxed, CottonShower helps make it happen in your home. It’s something we believe all should experience. That’s why we also love to give back to those in need so everyone will sleep easier.

We love to make a difference in your world. Why we love what we do? Because it's Kickstarter! We are so proud to be a part of the Kickstarter community and love to give back to you guys. Thank you for taking another shot at us! 

 

After the long delay of Dullo Plus fulfillment in the midst of COVID-19, we learned so much about international shipping during the postal office crises in many countries. This time, we have arranged for an excellent fulfillment operator to help us with shipping and delivery of rewards. We will be offering these pillowcases to carefully selected regions only:

column1: • Asia: Korea, Japan, Hong Kong, Singapore, Thailand, Malaysia, Indonesia

invention, FLOW™ cutting board, after learning more about pricing in the
U.S. marketplace, creating ECO FLOW™ with every intention of bringing
this now affordable, elite kitchen product to consumers on a domestic and (hopefully) a global scale! With
The World's First Perforated Cutting Board Design!

The FLOW™ and our newly designed ECO FLOW™ by Simpleware® is a revolutionary cutting board sure to solve the countertop mess by enabling liquids and drippings to flow through the cutting surface into the tray beneath, thus keeping your countertops (and kitchen) clean.
What can ECO FLOW™ by Simpleware® do?
10% smaller, and using 30% less material and fewer
manufacturing steps. The new revolutionary ECO FLOW™ cutting board
maintains all of the premium features of the original FLOW™ - minus the
Check out our ECO FLOW™ design renderings:
• Provide ease-of-use to Chefs in commercial setting
• Easily separate foods as required by some faiths (i.e. Kosher, Halal)
• Collects juices to be used in sauces
• Eliminates the drippy mess associated with thawing frozen foods

That means it's  big enough for your holiday ham, roast, and even that beer Turducken you've been wanting to try!

The Concept Is Simple and Works!
By perforating the cutting surface - juices easily pass through, whereas with other cutting boards, juices gravitate to the outer edges, create a wet mess.
Preventing food-borne illnesses can be easy if you have the proper tools for safe cooking. This is especially important when preparing fish, poultry and meats.

Furthermore, by having a interchangeable boards from the tray beneath, you can simply click in a different colored cutting surface, and you're easily on to the next preparation. You keep foods separated while still trapping all of the liquids in the same tray without having to sanitize in between.
Try that with a traditional cutting board!
What's more, these FDA approved, BPA free cutting boards are dishwasher safe, so you can focus on bacteria prevention for even your smaller Chefs wanting to help out in the kitchen, too!
FLOW™ is safer than conventional cutting boards:
Rubberized feet create a stable, safe cutting surface.
• The non-slip tray reduces risk of accidents, making it ideal for young Chefs.
• The interchangeable cutting surfaces reduce risk of cross-contamination.
• The materials used for the board are safe on knives, won't dull your fine blades
Dishwasher safe, designed to fit in any dishwasher for a thorough sanitation.
The choice is Simple. Easy. Baby safe. Mother approved! With the
FLOW™ cutting board in your kitchen, you can focus on food preparation
and not on yours and your family's safety.

How we came about. (It was an ""A-HA!"" moment!)

2010: Peter invented FLOW™.

After pulling the steaks off the grill, setting them on a conventional cutting board to rest, he returned to a dripping mess on the counter, with his dogs licking the kitchen cabinets.

In the days to follow, first prototype was born.

In the several years that followed, FLOW™ underwent design, refinement, and patent protection necessary before it'd be ready for prime time...

2010: Peter met Ola while sharing a electrical outlet to charge their respective laptops, awaiting flight in Hong Kong Airport. After chatting about product development, they knew they'd work well together.

2012: Simpleware® was founded by Ola Ahlmen and Peter Hauser. They launched a successful Kickstarter campaign, which got FLOW™ officially beyond just an idea, but into production. An idea became a reality.
2013: Finalize designs, produce first batch of  FLOW™ - to the delight of faithful (and patient) Kickstarter backers. The backers loved the product.
2014: ""Let's get FLOW™ on retail shelves across the globe."" They chose none other than international home + housewares show Chicago, USA.
There, they consulted leading industry professionals and welcomed feedback by all who met the product in person.

Chefs, Buyers, Consultants, Retailers, and fans alike, supported Simpleware's intentions of bringing ease-of-use to food preparation to kitchens of consumers of all markets. It was just a matter of how FLOW™ would mass-marketed effectively with high production costs in place.

Simpleware retained Business Management Consultant and Household Product Marketing Specialist, Pamela Rossi, to strategically develop their current marketing strategy by analysis of existing organizational structure and bottom-line production costs that could essentially, simply be eliminated in order to look more attractive to big box retailers.
Together, Pamela, Ola, and Peter strategized a plan to reinvented the FLOW™ to invent the new and improved ECO FLOW™ .

The premium nature of the original FLOW™ design remains in tact, but with one major difference. It's available for purchase at $20 - half the original price! This was no easy task. Thankfully, with the help of suppliers (and dozens of design iterations), the new ECO FLOW™ prototype was born!
""10% smaller, and using 30% less material and fewer
manufacturing steps. The new revolutionary ECO FLOW™ cutting board
maintains all of the premium features of the original FLOW™ - minus the
With modern design in mind, provide consumers a safe, conventional, functional cutting board series that will benefit anyone who uses it.
So why do we need YOUR help?

We had to decide what to do with unsold FLOW™ inventory...

So... We are offering it to consumers (YOU) on Indiegogo (HERE) at the equivalent ECO FLOW™ costs that can be put directly toward ECO FLOW™ production, and finally, we can get our ingenious product on shelves across the globe!

By reducing our current stock of original FLOW™ cutting boards from 2012, we will take a financial loss on that inventory in order to free-up precious investment capital for ECO FLOW™ orders. This way, retailers will have the opportunity to carry it in stores nearest you, which was our intention since it's origination.
invention, FLOW™ cutting board, after learning more about pricing in the

this now affordable, elite kitchen product to consumers on a domestic and (hopefully) a global scale! With
The World's First Perforated Cutting Board Design!

The FLOW™ and our newly designed ECO FLOW™ by Simpleware®  is a revolutionary cutting board sure to solve the countertop mess by enabling liquids and drippings to flow through the cutting surface into the tray beneath, thus keeping your countertops (and kitchen) clean.
What can ECO FLOW™ by Simpleware® do?
10% smaller, and using 30% less material and fewer
manufacturing steps. The new revolutionary ECO FLOW™ cutting board
maintains all of the premium features of the original FLOW™ - minus the
Check out our ECO FLOW™ design renderings:
Provide ease-of-use to Chefs in commercial setting
Easily separate foods as required by some faiths (i.e. Kosher, Halal)
Collects juices to be used in sauces
Eliminates the drippy mess associated with thawing frozen foods
Fits right in your cabinets (10"" x 14"")
That means it's  big enough for your holiday ham, roast, and even that beer Turducken you've been wanting to try! The Concept Is Simple and Works!
By perforating the cutting surface - juices easily pass through, whereas with other cutting boards, juices gravitate to the outer edges, create a wet mess.
Preventing food-borne illnesses can be easy if you have the proper tools for safe cooking. This is especially important when preparing fish, poultry and meats.

Furthermore, by having a interchangeable boards from the tray beneath, you can simply click in a different colored cutting surface, and you're easily on to the next preparation. You keep foods separated while still trapping all of the liquids in the same tray without having to sanitize in between.
Try that with a traditional cutting board!
What's more, these FDA approved, BPA free cutting boards are dishwasher safe, so you can focus on bacteria prevention for even your smaller Chefs wanting to help out in the kitchen, too!
FLOW™ is safer than conventional cutting boards:
Rubberized feet create a stable, safe cutting surface.

FLOW™ cutting board in your kitchen, you can focus on food preparation
and not on yours and your family's safety.

column1: CLI-M-IT™ WILL help everyone, young and old, and people of all abilities. It removes the necessity of having a ladder or a dresser under a window. Instead, the CLI-M-IT™ will be fit into your wall, with nothing protruding to obstruct movement in the room. It eliminates the worry of temporary solutions like ladders that go missing and dressers being moved or falling. Parents, landlords and caretakers have peace of mind, knowing there is always a safe way out in emergencies. If the stairs are impassable, climb out. If smoke or darkness limits your vision, the L.E.D. lighting will guide you to the CLI-M-IT™.
• Discount on a package of 3, approximate retail value $195.
• Get a discount coupon for your use, or to give to friends and family.
• Invest in us and get the perks of being a part of a life changing product.For bulk order purchases and / or investment opportunities contact us at (climitstep@outlook.com)
To get this product into production we need to purchase molds, undergo product testing, and arrange packaging and distribution.

CLI-M-IT™ is now in patent pending phase. The next step is to get this product on the market and available to everyone. Feedback from building inspectors, fire departments, homeowners, landlords, care providers and organizations for persons with disabilities has been very positive and encouraging. The videos are getting people excited and there is an urgency to get this life saving product on the market.

Everyone can get involved! Spread the word, share your excitement. Contribute to this campaign by spreading the word. That's right!...grab one of those links beside the ""back it"" button. Use those links, share it on Facebook, tweet about it and most importantly use the hashtag #stepstosafety! You too, can be a supporter of an amazing, life-saving product. Safety should always be a priority.
Check us out for a chance to win $3,500 https://www.facebook.com/stepstosafety/

The Inspiration:

I was cooking with my wife one day when I looked at my sink and had a ""light bulb moment"": dirty water accumulating inside our counter-top containers was an open invitation for germs and mold to grow and spread.

I began to imagine what a better storage caddy would be like, and started researching how to craft a safer and more sanitary system. The Caddy Plex Drainage-Controlling Caddy was birthed from this process, and I couldn't be more proud to see my invention almost ready to enter the marketplace and improve the health and safety of families everywhere!

The Product:

The Caddy Plex Drainage-Controlling Caddy is the ultimate solution to safe and sanitary storage! Our unique system allows moisture to drain off your kitchen and bathroom items, reducing potential germ and bacteria growth. The Caddy is a hygienic and versatile alternative to typical store-bought containers, featuring flexible configuration and a sleek and neutral appearance to complement any home. 

Typical store-bought containers have enclosed bases and fixed compartments, limiting your ability to configure the space to your needs, and making it very difficult to adequately clean inside. With the Caddy Plex Drainage-Controlling Caddy, we've created an innovative and adaptable storage solution, perfect for meeting this challenge head-on. 

Each Caddy Plex system includes internal storage housing that can be divided into two or more compartments to organize your items. The storage housing is mounted on an integrated support, allowing moisture to drain effortlessly off the stored items through drainage aeration at its base. 

The sturdy, custom-designed support gathers any drained liquids into a collection tray, which can be configured to either contain runoff for later disposal or disperse the liquid into a sink. This feature means you'll have a much wider range of areas that you can safely store items, even when damp! 

Its well-planned design and aesthetically-pleasing appearance make the Caddy Plex the ideal kitchen and bathroom storage solution for any home. For just $30 you can pre-order your very own Caddy Plex Drainage-Controlling Caddy today!

Product materials, size and colors

The Protoptype is made of plastic

The final product after manufacturing will be made of plastic

The size:

Overall dimensions: 8"" x 4.75"" x 5.875""

4x compartments with removable dividers: 4.5"" x 2"" x 3.5"" minimum

Colors: White, black, bone, marble, stainless

The Costs:

Since inspiration first struck, I've been hard at work on the process of bringing the Caddy Plex to the marketplace. Naturally, there are some costs involved, and that's why I need your help! Here are the financial goals we are trying to meet:

column2: > Prototype Execution - COMPLETED/PENDING with minor modifications in progress

column3:
> 

Risks and Challenges

I am passionate about Caddy Plex, and have invested my time, effort, and several maxed-out credit cards in pursuit of developing this innovative product. These sunk costs will all be worth it if I can bring Caddy Plex into the marketplace and share my invention with the world!

I trust with all my heart that you will become a part of making Caddy Plex a reality. My gratitude is boundless, and I thank you in advance for helping me to offset these risks and make this dream of mine a reality. 
Transparency and communication are high priorities to me, and I will always strive to keep my backers informed on progress and any setbacks.

Out my deep respect for the contributions of each and every backer, I will strive to honor your investment by giving my best in every area of Caddy Plex's journey to the public. Below is a step-by-step overview of the process of creating, producing, and releasing the Caddy Plex:

column2: > COMPLETED - Prototypes have been developed and selected according to best attributes, all combined into the product we are sharing with you here.

> PENDING - Finessing the development of several Caddy Plex features will including smoothing/rounding of upper corners and increasing adaptability of removable/adjustable space dividers for eased customization and cleaning access.
> PENDING - First production is planned for October 2017, with the help of your generosity and faith.

> 

Join the Caddy Plex Family and Support This Project!

column6: >Did you know that every year around 10% of deaths worldwide are from children between ages 0 and 5? And that most of these deaths are caused by preventable house accidents?
column8: >This is why we have developed BOBOP, the first smart robot that besides being fun, will help you take care of your kids.
column15: >BOBOP follows your kid and watches what your baby is doing from anywhere. Take control of BOBOP from your smartphone at any time and watch through its eyes what your little one is doing. Perfect assistant when you leave your baby with a nanny.
column16: >
column18: >Let your kids reach their maximum potential. BOBOP has an ever growing number of games, stories and activities that besides being fun, stimulate the early development of your children.
column19: >
column21: >Watch the vital signs of your children from your smartphone. You can watch their breathing rate, temperature, sleep cycles and a library of data that will expand over time, so you can rest assured that your child is doing well.
column22: >
column24: >BOBOP is able to interact, react and learn from your kid and the environment. BOBOP can recognize faces, objects and play games.
column26: >BOBOP includes an HD camera with night vision. This will allow you to watch your kid at any time, even when you are not in the same room or during the night.
column27: >
column29: >BOBOP is designed so your baby can't reach its robotic little parts, and it's so durable it will withstand any rough use your kid can give BOBOP.
column30: >
column32: >BOBOP has a double wheeled system that allows it to move and a proprietary computer vision system that will let BOBOP identify your kid and follow your baby anywhere
column33: >
column35: >In order to make it safer for kids, BOBOP doesn't need any wires or plugs to be charged, its induction charging system will allow it to get charged without the need to be plugged in.
column37: >We know how easily babies can get sick and how sensitive their skin can be,  this is why we use hypoallergenic materials that also won't breed microbes so your kid can be safe with BOBOP around.
column38: >
column40: >Through our smartphone application you will get timely notifications that will help you take care of your kids, remembering things like putting them to bed, the best time to feed them and when nap time is due.
column43: >You will also be able to watch your kids, show emotions through BOBOP´s wink system, move BOBOP´s camera, receive and send audio.
column48: >
column49: >BOBOP can become anything, from bunny or bear to a firefighter or cop. BOBOP will have a great variety of costumes available so you can have the perfect partner for your child.
column68: >We´ve been working hard to develop BOBOP, right now the foundations are done, we need your help to finish the details :D

column74: >We are a group of engineers and designers with the dream of making the world a better, cooler and safer place for any living being.
column75: >We´ve been working on this project for almost a year and INDIEGOGO is the logical step so we can finish the development and start mass production.
column78: >We need to raise $25,000 USD so we can get the materials and machinery to go from a prototype to a finished product and deliver it to those who need it.
column79: >We really appreciate all the support you can give us, no matter the budget. With every contribution you make to BOBOP's development, we will give you a very special early stimulation and development manual, constructed with the help of specialists in child development and child psychiatry.
column81: >There is always a risk with any project. In terms of technology we feel very confident, since the prototype we have is pretty much done.
column82: >We are considering a realistic approach to the development of a good product. We are being completely honest with our capabilities and delivery time, and in the case that we don't reach our full goal (depending on the amount we raise) we´ll seek investor funding and government grants to get the rest of the money, and we´ll deliver the full product to those who supported us.
column84: >If you want to help us, but don´t have a budget, you can always share our campaign and our project :D We will be very happy if you decide to support us that way.
column85:
>If you subscribe to our newsletter we´ll keep you informed with news of our project, and we could even become friends :D

","Did you know that every year around 10% of deaths worldwide are from children between ages 0 and 5? And that most of these deaths are caused by preventable house accidents?This is why we have developed BOBOP, the first smart robot that besides being fun, will help you take care of your kids.BOBOP follows your kid and watches what your baby is doing from anywhere. Take control of BOBOP from your smartphone at any time and watch through its eyes what your little one is doing. Perfect assistant when you leave your baby with a nanny.  Let your kids reach their maximum potential. BOBOP has an ever growing number of games, stories and activities that besides being fun, stimulate the early development of your children.Watch the vital signs of your children from your smartphone. You can watch their breathing rate, temperature, sleep cycles and a library of data that will expand over time, so you can rest assured that your child is doing well.BOBOP is able to interact, react and learn from your kid and the environment. BOBOP can recognize faces, objects and play games.  BOBOP includes an HD camera with night vision. This will allow you to watch your kid at any time, even when you are not in the same room or during the night.BOBOP is designed so your baby can't reach its robotic little parts, and it's so durable it will withstand any rough use your kid can give BOBOP.BOBOP has a double wheeled system that allows it to move and a proprietary computer vision system that will let BOBOP identify your kid and follow your baby anywhere In order to make it safer for kids, BOBOP doesn't need any wires or plugs to be charged, its induction charging system will allow it to get charged without the need to be plugged in.We know how easily babies can get sick and how sensitive their skin can be,  this is why we use hypoallergenic materials that also won't breed microbes so your kid can be safe with BOBOP around.Through our smartphone application you will get timely notifications that will help you take care of your kids, remembering things like putting them to bed, the best time to feed them and when nap time is due. You will also be able to watch your kids, show emotions through BOBOP´s wink system, move BOBOP´s camera, receive and send audio.BOBOP can become anything, from bunny or bear to a firefighter or cop. BOBOP will have a great variety of costumes available so you can have the perfect partner for your child. We´ve been working hard to develop BOBOP, right now the foundations are done, we need your help to finish the details :D We are a group of engineers and designers with the dream of making the world a better, cooler and safer place for any living being.We´ve been working on this project for almost a year and INDIEGOGO is the logical step so we can finish the development and start mass production.We need to raise $25,000 USD so we can get the materials and machinery to go from a prototype to a finished product and deliver it to those who need it.We really appreciate all the support you can give us, no matter the budget. With every contribution you make to BOBOP's development, we will give you a very special early stimulation and development manual, constructed with the help of specialists in child development and child psychiatry.There is always a risk with any project. In terms of technology we feel very confident, since the prototype we have is pretty much done.We are considering a realistic approach to the development of a good product. We are being completely honest with our capabilities and delivery time, and in the case that we don't reach our full goal (depending on the amount we raise) we´ll seek investor funding and government grants to get the rest of the money, and we´ll deliver the full product to those who supported us.If you want to help us, but don´t have a budget, you can always share our campaign and our project :D We will be very happy if you decide to support us that way. If you subscribe to our newsletter we´ll keep you informed with news of our project, and we could even become friends :D",60.0,0,"1 Campaign

column3:
>- Hi! We are a company that has invented THRONE - the next big step in home and building automation. Automation as it is supposed to be: accessible, clear and really helpful.

In today’s world computing technology advanced so far, but most of people’s homes still remain dumb. Home automation haven’t yet turned to a mainstream. Currently we see several major limitations preventing home automation from becoming a really wide spread thing. And we have the answers to these challenges.


Challenge 1. User interface

A traditional concept of a smart home UI doesn’t bring anything new to the user experience. In fact, it just collects some switchers within a touch screen. 

The industry needs a fundamentally new concept: clear, efficient, and scalable. An interface which is capable to visualize the control of several IoT gadgets in your home or thousands of systems and sensors in an airport - and keep the control equally clear and intuitive. 

What if you have more than one controlled device at home? Would that be good to have several applications, one for each device? What if you have not 1-3 controlled lights, but 20 or more? In traditional interface it will look as a long list of numbered devices. Is that a convenient way of control your home?

Answer. A Reality Related User Interface
column4:
>

Discover THRONE. A completely different approach to the concept of an interface for smart home or smart building. THRONE’s UI is based on a 3D scheme of the controlled facility. And all the devices are mapped on this 3D scheme. The concept, giving a perfect intuitiveness and having no limitations in scalability.

The best word for a person is his name. The best place for a person is his home. The best way to control your home is to see its scheme - rotateable, zoomable… clear. Years of research guided us to the conclusion: a 3D scheme is the most clear, intuitive and fast way to monitor and manage all things at a facility.
column9:
schema=vimeo"" width=""580"">

That is how we’ve invented THRONE - a smart home control system which has a 3D scheme of a controlled facility as a basis idea of the whole user experience. All devices are binded to their real locations so you can easily reach them. At the same time you can operate groups of devices visible on the screen. This is like WYSWYG concept for your smart home.

column1: Just install THRONE demo app and see how easy it is to switch the lights
or watch the stream of video cameras
or instantly see the triggering of the alarms
THRONE app with a native 3D engine provides an ultimate ease and clarity of control due to the reality-related user interface.

column1:
If you want more than just a demo, you can try a working THRONE system right now. Pay attention to our perks. Some of them allow to try THRONE with 50% discount. These conditions are valid within the Indiegogo campaign only!


Challenge 2. Integration

A true benefit of a Smart home concept is an ability of control the whole house. Not just one bulb, but all the lighting fixtures if differend kinds together. Not just one type of functionality like temperature, but all systems and devices at once. Moreover, the systems and devices should see each other and cooperate providing maximum comfort and security.
column2: >Today’s Connected Home market offers you plenty of options. But if you look deeper, you will find that making a real smart home system is not an easy task.
column3: >You can buy some so-called DIY solutions and install it by yourself. But making these gadgets work together is nearly impossible.
column4: >You can hire professional installers, but they prefer to work with old-school systems which give them more margin. These systems are expensive and inflexible: hard to expand or upgrade. And most of all, this approach makes you completely dependable on the installers' skills and diligence.
column5:
>

Answer. LOCUS Smart Home Hub

THRONE is a system for managing 3rd party smart home devices. Your lighting fixtures, thermostats, alarms, cameras and more. With THRONE you control all of them in a single app. 

THRONE learns how you use electronic stuff at home and gradually makes more and more things happen automatically. It helps you skip routine manual setup and adjusting of your devices. 

THRONE is a smart home hub, a smart home constructor and an app with reality-based user interface. Together they are a Next-Gen Learning Smart Home system.
column7: >Components of the system
column9:
>Discover LOCUS. A smart home hub in a form factor of wall-mount dock-station for iPad. LOCUS supports various protocols of wired and wireless systems. It is a heart of THRONE system. It collects, stores and processes the data from all devices, provides synching and logic. 

THRONE LOCUS works locally in your home that guarantees more security and less delays. For remote access you can use direct VPN connection between your mobile device and your home network.

LOCUS is a smart home hub embedded in a
column10: >wall-mount dock with both a built-in charging unit and air purity sensor. It also has a proximity sensor, so it wakes up when you approach. LOCUS comes in premium-finished aluminium frame.

column3:
>900MHz quad-core ARM Cortex-A7 CPU

MEMORY: 2 Gb LPDDR3 + 16 GB eMMC

WIFI 802.11 b/g/n/ac.
column5:
>IEEE 802.15.4

Z-WAVE Plus, ZIGBEE, THREAD

Proximity sensor for activation on approach. Other sensors: temperature, humidity, CO2, air purity. 

Brushed aluminium finishing.
column10:
schema=vimeo"" width=""580"">

Built-in Logic

There are some solutions that promise you to connect everything. OK, but what’s next? With THRONE your devices are connected AND can interact for cooperation. For example, the lights can automatically turn on if the presence sensor detects someone walking nearby and the lux sensor detects that it is dark outside. Sounds like a PRO system, right? But THRONE allows to make simple IoT devices to work like that. And what’s important - you can easily change the pre-set scripts or set up this logic by yourself.

Learning system instead of programming

We are sure that a modern smart home should be more than just a way of control. It should understand the behaviour of the house inhabitants and offer them the ways to save their time and reach more comfort. The smart home system should strive to minimize the frequency of manual operations of the owner. And surely the owner shouldn’t be a professional to program the scripts of his smart home.

THRONE gives you freedom without staring on the screen of your device. The system memorizes how you use electronic devices at home and gradually makes more and more things happen automatically. It helps to get rid of routine manual switching and adjusting devices. It saves your time… and cuts the bills.

Imagine that you don’t need any switchers anymore. Imagine that the lights are following you while you stroll through your home and automatically turn of where they are not needed. With THRONE this is possible.


THRONE Right Now With Razberry
column11:
>THRONE LOCUS Hub will be developed as a result of this campaign. If you can't wait to try THRONE, you can do it RIGHT NOW!

THRONE LOCUS Hub will be developed as a result of this campaign. If you can't wait to try THRONE, you can start creating your system RIGHT NOW!

Currently THRONE is fully compatible with several Worldwide professional connectivity standards. As the first step towards IoT industry, we have already provided support of Z-WAVE.

This means that right now you can use THRONE with a set of Z-WAVE controllers and sensors. Also you can use EnOcean wireless and battery-free sensors. Looks like a complete wireless smart home system, right?

Just buy the perk THRONE ON Z-WAVE NOW, and receive the detailed manuals on your email. The basic explanation is given in the perks description in the end of the story. This perk is offered with 50% from regular price.
column14:
>Challenge 3. Ease of setup
There are thousands of ‘smart’ devices on the market. When you think of adding some ‘smart’ features to your home, it can be not so easy to pick up the devices that will be compatible with each other. Of course, you can hire an installer company, but that makes you dependent on their expertise. Besides thay can be expensive or brand-biased. That’s why THRONE gives you a simple online Smart Home Constructor.

column1:
We are sure that it’s time to uberize smart home configuration and installation. In the modern world a customer should have an opportunity to choose the systems according to the functionality and design. And the chosen systems or devices should seamlessly integrate with each other irrespectively to their protocol, connection type and the complexity of installation. 

T-Constructor is an online tool for instant confuguration of your smart home. It allows to configure your system having no engineering or programming skills. 

In the constructor, you just select the rooms of your home and the smart home functions you need in them. You don’t have to dig into multiple tech specifications and read engineering forums. The constructor will pick up the equipment according to your demands and conditions. After that you will instanly order the set of devices and installation service if needed.

Easy configuration with Smart Home Drag’n’drop Constructor with UI editor

1. Configure your system in the online Smart home Constructor.

Just choose the functions for your system, and the Constructor will pick up the most suitable devices for your purposes. And will get them delivered to your door.

2. Make a 3D scheme of your home in a simple drag-and-drop editor.

3. THRONE LOCUS hub recognizes devices at your home and helps you to simply create your own reality-based interface. 




Micro geolocation (iBeacons, etc.)
column2:
>iBeacon technology integrated with THRONE 3D concept provides a brand new capabilities of the system. iBeacons will help to display things on the 3D scheme of your home. And that is only the beginning.

Imagine that your home understands that all the family is out and automatically turns off the fixtures, locks the doors and activates the security system. And when you’re back, it wakes up: plays a special playlist and sets up a comfortable temperature.

Micro geolocation in combination with 3D scheme of a facility gives you a smart home with a new level of functionality. None of the other beacons usage concepts can provide such a power of synergy of techonlogies.
column3:
>Our Vision

How would you imagine a perfect smart home? The one you really dream of.

You will need controlled lighting. Not a single bulb, but a system, with functions like dimmable and colored lighting. And presets that you can set up on the go.

You will want to control temperature via thermostats, air conditioners and heating floors. You will want some alarms and video cameras for security. You will want controlled jalousies, door locks and garage doors. And other things.

And all of it in a single user interface. Clear and truly intuitive. Like this one.

A perfect smart home lets you forget the mess, like brand names of the devices you use. It keeps you away from digging into programming and connection protocols. A perfect smart home lets you choose the functions and the design you want.

Most of all, it provides a system tailored for you. A singe coherent system, where devices cooperate and augment each other. A system that learns the way you use it and makes things happen automatically.

Discover THRONE. The first step towards the smart home of your dreams. A coherent and flexible smart home with no restrictions or limitations in scale and types of devices. Find the THRONE Demo app in AppStore or Google Play. Join the community of perfectionists.

Get prepared for the ultimate concept of smart home. Discover THRONE - the Next-Gen smart home platform that is going to become a starting point of the new era.

column1: THRONE is a living system. Today we have a functionality of a professional visualization platform. Tomorrow we will become a system for everyone. We will increase the amount of supported protocols and all kinds of functionality. Here is how we plan to do this.

We are THRONE Systems, a middle-sized European company. We have developed THRONE 3D Control - a smart home / smart building control system. This is a professional solution for premium and enterprise real estate automation projects.

We understand the limitations of professional automation market. Here, everything depends on an installer company. And the installers cost a lot. Now we want to make our technologies available for everyone. The best way to do this is to release our product to a mass market. And make it maximum available in terms of price and ease of installation.
Want to know more? Ask the details in the comments to this campaign.

Currently creating one THRONE project for middle residential facility takes 3-5 working days and requires some designing skills. This is awesome for professional installation field. But our solution for mass market must be even more easy, and the designing if the interface must take not more than it would be a fun for an average person.
Also we need to rapidly integrate even more new devices and protocols to provide THRONE's connectivity with them.
And finally we want to add a special functionality such as smart energy management, access control, and various learning functions.

We are planning to execute these tasks within one year to bring the most sophisticated smart home system to the market. For reaching this speed of development we need to involve more resourses. And besides the funds we crucially need a constant communication with real smart home enthusiasts to meet their demands and expectations. This kind of your participation in our project would have the same value as your monetary contributions.

The perks we offer here are only available within this Indiegogo campaign. All of the pack are offered with significant discounts that will never be accessible in one time and place. Please see the list and choose your perk!

Become a part of community inventing the smart home of the future! We will keep you up to date regarding the milestones of the project via email. So you will be the first one who will be alerted when THRONE products, including LOCUS, will be available for purchase. Also you will be in the list of priority subscribers for our best special offers. Your name will be displayed on a special THRONE supporters page.
Show people your contribution to the improvment of the future. Get the special cap with 'Smart home inventor' caption. Oh, of course this perk also includes all benefits from 'I LIKE YOUR IDEA'.

column2: >Launch THRONE at home on Z-WAVE right now! All backers get immediate access to the current version of the THRONE development kit and THRONE Licence for one Z-WAVE project + All necessary installation instructions via email + Tech support online. THIS PERK IS OFFERED WITH 50% DISCOUNT OFF THE REGULAR PRICE.

column1: You will need RaZberry controller (works on RaspberryPi). Own it already? Cool. Don’t own? Purchase wherever it is convenient. The rest of things are included in the perk price or free.
After purchasing the perk, you will receive an invitation email and register in the system to get access to the THRONE development tools.
Create your project using our step by step manuals:
- draw a 3D model of your premises using SketchUp
- link your equipment with THRONE in the online configurator
- download executable file to launch THRONE server on windows based PC or Razberry.
Our tech support service will guide you when necessary.
Install free THRONE App from AppStore or Google Play. Launch your THRONE project in the application via cloud.
Enjoy the most advanced smart home visualization for your home!
column2: >Share your experience with the THRONE community! Send your feedback to the developers and get involved in the system development process!

column1: Update THRONE application and upgrade your project, add new features and expand your system! All future system updates are free for you. Forever. (Available for Indiegogo backers only.)

Similar to the EARLY ADOPTER perk, this one gives you the acces to the current dev tools, a residential license, and even MORE! Send us the floor plans of any house you want to see in the THRONE App. Our designers will make a 3D model of your facility (up to 4300 sq.feet or 400 sq.m.), including all kinds of controls you want to see: lighting, shading, thermostats, alarms, video cameras, etc.

Get the incredible wall-mount LOCUS Smart Home hub for the special price! In addition, this perk includes Early adopter perk benefits AND Lifetime Premuim account. These conditions are valid within the Indiegogo campaign only.
The more good things you have, the better you feel, right? This perk adds another LOCUS Smart home hub to your THRONE LOCUS pack, so you could install it on another floor of your house.

This perk is for those who expect a maximum from their contributions. The FULL PACK includes everything we can give you right now and ever later: LOCUS Hub (1 pcs.), Residential License, 3D Model of your facility, Lifetime Premium account, Development kit access and Community Membership. Pay once, get all!  THIS PERK IS OFFERED WITH 50% DISCOUNT OFF THE REGULAR PRICE.

Controlling one device from your smart home? What is it besides fun? How can this be really helpful? We are sure that the true value of smart home concept is a capability of monitoring, control, and automatic actions. All these capabilities should provide you security, health, comfort, and energy (money) saving.

In order to be a real system, the devices should cooperate with each other and augment each other’s functionality. The trending today IoT gadgets don’t provide a true system because of several reasons:
<li>not all of them can cooperate between each other
<li>mostly they don’t have common control environment: they operate in different protocols and most of the devices have their own application for control
<li>each new gadget makes you install a new application to your smartphone, and switch between these apps, when you need to change something in your home
• even if you picked up the devices of one protocol (e.g. Z-Wave), they can be incompatible with each other.

So one device, even if it a compicated like a thermostat, is not yet a smart home system. But even professional companies often design a smart home solution around one feature, e.g. security or multimedia.
We researched for a long time to find out the pros and cons of DIY and PRO approaches to home automation. Today we can say that both concepts have their advantages, but problems as well.
THRONE systems lets you take pros only and skip cons. THRONE is compatible with both PRO and DIY types of devices. So you can build your home system combining the best products of both markets.

Also that means that THRONE can turn your set of IoT gadgets to a true smart home system which operates as a professional one. THRONE gives you maximum flexibility for constructing your system. No matter what kinds of devices you have - PRO or DIY solutions work together united by THRONE.
