We are in the process of developing a smart HOME, which has the power to change the future living!
Imagine your current rented home/ living space(s):
• Hate giving away your earnings in rent/ mortgage?
• Is making room for kids / old parents a problem?
• Have a vacant space that can give you rent?
• Still looking for the perfect holiday cabin for the greens?
• Have had enough of big, unmanageable spaces?
• We have a solution to these problems.
Welcome to the world of HAUSTAINER, where we have designed a home that is ...
• a smart home at the cost of a car
• can still be your home, wherever you go
• serves as your cozy nest off the grid
• gives you more time to live life by de-cluttering your life

Green Living and Thinking
We at Haustainer believe in living and thinking green. All the materials used in these homes are used sustainably. From container to insulation to components used in interiors close to all can be reused. Use of traditional clay wall plates lets the house breath naturally and maintains the right level of humidity and temperature inside the house. Use of smart features ensures that energy is utilised in an efficient way.

No Barrier of Location
Haustainer can be put in any location of your choice and can be easily moved across continents as it is a home in a shipping container where the basic features of a container are kept intact. It can be moved by road, rail or ship to the place of choice. Almost no disassembling is required as these are independent plug and play units.

Minimal Living
Haustainer promotes the concept of minimal living. Haustainer is a small and simple house which means less stress, clutter free environment, minimal maintanence and more time for things that matter more. Haustainer allows you to live life as you want on your own terms.

Smart Engineering and Architecture
Haustainer is a product of smart engineering as every cubic inch is designed in such a way that no space is wasted. The room management is the key feature of design and architecture. From front door to multi-functional furniture to use of smart systems everything makes this house a comfortable place to live.
Super Insulated for extreme temperature from 50 °C
....... down to -15° C
Haustainer stands for flexibility and  freedom
Future of our urban cities ....

Family Fuchs

Founders and Mahi, the main reason &

Personal Trainer
CEO Herztakt Personal Training

column1: We have a space to put our prototype. It is our base near Hanover in Wennigsen. We have completed the conception, design, layout and engineering phase. Now we are ready to procure the container and start building. We have a small team of young talent and we are in the process of expanding our team. We are currently working with a lot of consultants, engineers and freelancers who are experts in different genres of construction and building.
Haustainer is a venture of ""Mahi homes"", founded by the name of our daughter, which is also the combination of first two letters of our names.
Sufficient support for finishing the prototype. We need funds to turn our ideas into reality and construct the first Haustainer and test its viability.

Haustainer is more than just putting a house inside a container. It is about smart engineering and design, optimum use of space without compromising on basic features needed for comfortable living and building a product that can be afforded by all.
Our dream is to make Haustainer available to everyone, everywhere. We need Funds to start our prototype in May. We are already through with the design and engineering phase. Apart from funds we need:
Your Support by sharing our campaign with your friends, colleagues &
column2: spreading our idea if you find our idea interesting and worth sharing.

Mentors who are advising and giving us constructive feedback.
• Construction Partners who are helping us turn a dream into reality.
Investors who believe that our idea has the potential to change the current way of living.

Wir entwickeln ein ZUHAUSE, welches unser zukünftiges Wohnen verändern kann!
Klein, intelligent, nachhaltig und mehr als nur einfach zu bewegen.
• Hasst du es Miete oder ein Darlehen abzuzahlen?
• Ist zusätzlicher Raum für die Kinder oder Großeltern ein Problem?
• Wie sieht es aus mit zusätzlichen Mieteinnahmen?
• Spürst du manchmal, dass dich die Größe nicht mehr glücklich macht?

Wir haben eine Lösung zu all diesen Problemen.
HAUSTAINER ist ...
• ein intelligentes Haus zum Preis von einem Auto!
• immer an deiner Seite, wenn du es brauchst!

Grün leben und denken
Haustainer baut ökologisch, auf grün. Nachhaltigkeit ist uns sehr wichtig. Vom Container zur Dämmung bis zur verwendeten Innenausstattung kann fast alles wiederverwertet werden. Der Einsatz von altbekannten, traditionellen Baumaterialien wie z. B. Holzwolle oder Lehm lassen das Haus natürlich atmen (bestes Raumklima) und helfen die Innenraumtemperatur natürlich zu regeln. Der Einsatz von intelligenten Systemen sorgt für eine optimale Energyeffizienz.

Überall einsetzbar
Haustainer kann fast in jeder Ecke der Welt angeschlossen werden und lässt sich trotzdem noch bewegen. Wenn nötig sogar per Schiff, da unser Container seine Zulassung behält. Auf der Straße, mit der Bahn oder dem Schiff zum nächsten Wohnort - kein Problem. Nur Kleinigkeiten sind zu erledigen bevor man erneut auf die Reise gehen kann - alle Anschlüsse sind nach dem ""plug &

Mit Absicht auf kleinerem Fuß leben
Haustainer wirbt mit dem Konzept ""weniger ist mehr"". Haustainer ist ein kleines aber sehr kluges Haus, welches sich zur Aufgabe gemacht hat - Stress für den Eigentümer zu minimieren, weniger Unordnung, einen freien Kopf für die wirklich wichtigen Dinge im Leben! Fast keine Instandsetzungs- oder Reinigungsarbeiten. Haustainer erlaubt dir dein Leben zu führen, wie Du es möchtest.

Innovatives Ingenieurswesen und Architektur
Haustainer ist ein Produkt von intelligentestem Ingenieurwesen. Kein Zentimeter wurde verschenkt. Die Raumaufteilung ist ein Meisterstück der Ingenieur- und Architekturkunst. Von der Eingangstür, zu den multifunktionalen Möbeln, hin zur Vollautomatisierung machen dieses Haus zu einem echten Platz des Wohlfühlen - IHREM ZUHAUSE.
• bezahlbar mit dem Ziel, ein Haus unter 20.000 Euro zu bekommen
• LKW transportierbar, aber eben auch per Schiff (Standard Container)
• umweltfreundlich (1x benutzte Container sind in großer Stückzahl vorhanden)
• Doppelbett (welches sich in die Wand klappen lässt)
• Komfortbereich reicht von -15° im Winter bis hoch zu 50° im Sommer
entwickelt für Temperaturen bis 50° im Sommer
....... oder -15° im Winter mit viel Schnee!
Haustainer ist die pure FLEXIBILITÄT, wenn man es denn möchte.
Innenstädte, die nächste Phase von Haustainer

Family Fuchs

Marc Cirsovius

Architekt und Filmer

Charanpreet Singh

Ingenieur und Fotograf

CEO bei Herztakt Personal Training

column1: Wir haben das Grundstück für unseren Prototypen in der Nähe von unserem Office in Wennigsen bei Hannover. Wir haben die Konzeption-, Design-, Layout- und  Entwicklungsphase abgeschlossen. Wir sind bereit den ersten Container zu bestellen und mit dem Ausbau zu beginnen. Wir haben ein kleines, schwer talentiertes Team und sind dabei dieses sogar noch auszubauen. Auch arbeiten einige Berater, freie Ingenieure und Freelancer für uns, jeder für sich ein Spezialist in seinem Bereich.
Haustainer ist ein Produkt von ""MAHI homes"", gegründet nach dem Namen unserer Tochter, welcher durch die ersten beiden Buchstaben unserer Namen entstand.
Ausreichend Unterstützung um den Prototypen fertig stellen zu können. Wir brauchen das Geld um einen Traum in die Realität umsetzen zu können. Den ersten Haustainer bauen und testen!

Haustainer ist jedoch mehr als nur ""ein Haus in einen Container laden"". Es muss einfach alles stimmen, alles! Es muss für ein Leben in diesen 4 Wänden stimmen, nicht nur für einen Urlaub am See. All dies soll etwas später für JEDEN, theoretisch ÜBERALL verfügbar sein.

Der Traum ist es, Haustainer in Wirklichkeit zu erschaffen und von dort den nächsten Schritt zu gehen, eine Produktion zu erschaffen - welche durch Stückzahl und möglicher Teilmontagen an unterschiedlichen Orten auch dem Endpreis treu bleibt! Helft uns im Mai mit dem Bau zu beginnen.
Sind die ""Perks"" nichts für Euch - dann könnt Ihr trotzdem helfen:
SPONSOREN oder Partner, mit passendem Produkt für den Haustainer
Mentoren die Tipps und Tricks verraten, uns helfen wollen
• Hilfe wärend des Proto - Baus werden wir benötigen
INVESTOREN, welche sich vorstellen können was Haustainer bewegen kann

We are in the process of developing a smart HOME, which has the power to change the future living!
Imagine your current rented home/ living space(s):
Hate giving away your earnings in rent/ mortgage?
Is making room for kids / old parents a problem?
Have a vacant space that can give you rent?
Still looking for the perfect holiday cabin for the greens?
Have had enough of big, unmanageable spaces?
We have a solution to these problems.
Welcome to the world of HAUSTAINER, where we have designed a home that is ...
easily movable, like a ""tiny-house on wheels""
a smart home at the cost of a car
can still be your home, wherever you go
serves as your cozy nest off the grid
gives you more time to live life by de-cluttering your life

Green Living and ThinkingWe at Haustainer believe in living and thinking green. All the materials used in these homes are used sustainably. From container to insulation to components used in interiors close to all can be reused. Use of traditional clay wall plates lets the house breath naturally and maintains the right level of humidity and temperature inside the house. Use of smart features ensures that energy is utilised in an efficient way.

No Barrier of LocationHaustainer can be put in any location of your choice and can be easily moved across continents as it is a home in a shipping container where the basic features of a container are kept intact. It can be moved by road, rail or ship to the place of choice. Almost no disassembling is required as these are independent plug and play units.

Minimal LivingHaustainer promotes the concept of minimal living. Haustainer is a small and simple house which means less stress, clutter free environment, minimal maintanence and more time for things that matter more. Haustainer allows you to live life as you want on your own terms.

Smart Engineering and ArchitectureHaustainer is a product of smart engineering as every cubic inch is designed in such a way that no space is wasted. The room management is the key feature of design and architecture. From front door to multi-functional furniture to use of smart systems everything makes this house a comfortable place to live.
Movable across globe with shipping certification
Environmental friendly (“one-way” containers can be used)
2 main spaces (private / public, sound & view proof)
Extreme conditions proof (comfort range -15°C up to 50°C)
everything IN & OUT through the main entry
Super Insulated for extreme temperature from 50 °C
Haustainer stands for flexibility and  freedom
Family FuchsFounders and Mahi, the main reason & future behind HAUSTAINER
Sami El-BenghaziFitness - Specialist & Personal TrainerCEO Herztakt Personal Training

We have a space to put our prototype. It is our base near Hanover in Wennigsen. We have completed the conception, design, layout and engineering phase. Now we are ready to procure the container and start building. We have a small team of young talent and we are in the process of expanding our team. We are currently working with a lot of consultants, engineers and freelancers who are experts in different genres of construction and building.
Haustainer is a venture of ""Mahi homes"", founded by the name of our daughter, which is also the combination of first two letters of our names.
Sufficient support for finishing the prototype. We need funds to turn our ideas into reality and construct the first Haustainer and test its viability.

Haustainer is more than just putting a house inside a container. It is about smart engineering and design, optimum use of space without compromising on basic features needed for comfortable living and building a product that can be afforded by all.
Our dream is to make Haustainer available to everyone, everywhere. We need Funds to start our prototype in May. We are already through with the design and engineering phase. Apart from funds we need:
Your Support by sharing our campaign with your friends, colleagues & spreading our idea if you find our idea interesting and worth sharing.
SPONSORS or Partners who think their product is best suited to be a part of Haustainer.
Mentors who are advising and giving us constructive feedback.
Construction Partners who are helping us turn a dream into reality.
Investors who believe that our idea has the potential to change the current way of living.
Media for helping us reach to interested people --->  PRESS KIT
Team members who connect with our idea

Wir entwickeln ein ZUHAUSE, welches unser zukünftiges Wohnen verändern kann!
Klein, intelligent, nachhaltig und mehr als nur einfach zu bewegen.
Schränkt dich dein Haus manchmal ein?
Hasst du es Miete oder ein Darlehen abzuzahlen?
Ist zusätzlicher Raum für die Kinder oder Großeltern ein Problem?
Wie sieht es aus mit zusätzlichen Mieteinnahmen?
Spürst du manchmal, dass dich die Größe nicht mehr glücklich macht?
Wir haben eine Lösung zu all diesen Problemen.HAUSTAINER ist ...
einfacher zu transportieren als eine Gartenlaube!
ein intelligentes Haus zum Preis von einem Auto!
immer an deiner Seite, wenn du es brauchst!
dient dir auch in der Wildnes!
bringt dich zurück zum ""dein Leben leben""!

Grün leben und denkenHaustainer baut ökologisch, auf grün. Nachhaltigkeit ist uns sehr wichtig. Vom Container zur Dämmung bis zur verwendeten Innenausstattung kann fast alles wiederverwertet werden. Der Einsatz von altbekannten, traditionellen Baumaterialien wie z. B. Holzwolle oder Lehm lassen das Haus natürlich atmen (bestes Raumklima) und helfen die Innenraumtemperatur natürlich zu regeln. Der Einsatz von intelligenten Systemen sorgt für eine optimale Energyeffizienz.

Überall einsetzbarHaustainer kann fast in jeder Ecke der Welt angeschlossen werden und lässt sich trotzdem noch bewegen. Wenn nötig sogar per Schiff, da unser Container seine Zulassung behält. Auf der Straße, mit der Bahn oder dem Schiff zum nächsten Wohnort - kein Problem. Nur Kleinigkeiten sind zu erledigen bevor man erneut auf die Reise gehen kann - alle Anschlüsse sind nach dem ""plug & play"" ideal gewählt.

Mit Absicht auf kleinerem Fuß lebenHaustainer wirbt mit dem Konzept ""weniger ist mehr"". Haustainer ist ein kleines aber sehr kluges Haus, welches sich zur Aufgabe gemacht hat - Stress für den Eigentümer zu minimieren, weniger Unordnung, einen freien Kopf für die wirklich wichtigen Dinge im Leben! Fast keine Instandsetzungs- oder Reinigungsarbeiten. Haustainer erlaubt dir dein Leben zu führen, wie Du es möchtest.

Innovatives Ingenieurswesen und ArchitekturHaustainer ist ein Produkt von intelligentestem Ingenieurwesen. Kein Zentimeter wurde verschenkt. Die Raumaufteilung ist ein Meisterstück der Ingenieur- und Architekturkunst. Von der Eingangstür, zu den multifunktionalen Möbeln, hin zur Vollautomatisierung machen dieses Haus zu einem echten Platz des Wohlfühlen - IHREM ZUHAUSE.
bezahlbar mit dem Ziel, ein Haus unter 20.000 Euro zu bekommen
LKW transportierbar, aber eben auch per Schiff (Standard Container)
umweltfreundlich (1x benutzte Container sind in großer Stückzahl vorhanden)
Doppelbett (welches sich in die Wand klappen lässt)
Komfortbereich reicht von -15° im Winter bis hoch zu 50° im Sommer
alle Anschlüsse gehen vorne rein & raus
entwickelt für Temperaturen bis 50° im Sommer
....... oder -15° im Winter mit viel Schnee!
Haustainer ist die pure FLEXIBILITÄT, wenn man es denn möchte.
Innenstädte, die nächste Phase von Haustainer
Family FuchsGründer und der Antrieb hinter HAUSTAINER

Hi! I'm Andrea. I am a teacher, artist, and friend.

When I was a kid, I made a killing in allowance because I was the helper of our house. I learned from a young age just how wonderful it felt to spend an entire Saturday cleaning and organizing my room and laying back to take in the atmosphere. Was I a nerd? Absolutely. But that desire for a harmonious living space stuck with me, and now I am ready to put it to work.

My first business was a lemonade stand. I was 8 and in Southern Florida. Even then, I was able to analyze my market and provide a tasty solution--people were thirsty in the 90 degree heat. I marketed by riding my bike around the neighborhood yelling ""Ice cold lemonade on 45th Street!"" . I had product quality measures--every drop had the perfect ratio of  Country Time powder and filtered water. I even hired an employee! She quit when I wouldn't give her 50% or gross earnings, but I knew even then that that wasn't an appropriate rate for a cashier. I made about $15 dollars, largely in change from my peers and a couple of sweaty dads who  just finished yard work. I was rich! I put $10 in my piggy bank, and kept $5 in my wallet for miscellaneous candy items.

In my adult life, I have kept a ""real"" job and put myself through school. I received my Teaching Certificate in English and Spanish in 2011 and have spent the last 6 years in education. I absolutely love helping children and adults to reach their goals. However, that entrepreneurial itch never left. I am ready now to see where it can take me.
At Home with Andrea is my solution to:
• Using my creative talents to beautify and increase aesthetic
• Providing healthy meal solutions for busy families (I love to cook!)
•  Maintaining my freedom to teach, in a 1-on-1 setting
• Increasing giving by offering a 10% discount on ""Pay it Forward"" services-- pre-paid services gifted to someone familiar, or a neighbor in need

Every contribution to this campaign will go directly to supporting the start up of At Home with Andrea. From cleaning supplies, interior design reference books, on-the-go kitchen tools, uniforms, etc., your contribution - of any size - will make a difference.

I am looking to raise $5,000 for the startup costs. Each gift of $30 or more receives a service. See the perks section for more information. These perks make your gift less like a handout and more like a pre-paid service!
• Income padding for career transition while building clients

It will take a lot of work and tenacity to build clientele. I will largely rely on word-of-mouth to promote my new business. I will also need to reflect and refine my marketing strategies to make sure I am offering the right services to the right people at the right time. I am tenacious! I am ready! I am organized!

I plan on beginning my startup marketing campaign with discounts on services rendered within the first 3 months. I also have a Pay it Forward plan in place where services are rendered at a 10% discount when purchased for someone else, which will increase clientele and promote a sense of community.
Short on cash to contribute to capital? No worries! At Home with Andrea will graciously accept likes and shares on social media, and word-of-mouth referrals!
I also have an Amazon Wish List for supplies and uniforms. Check it out here: http://a.co/2xpJfAS

To serve industry and consumers alike in providing an easy and seamless experience in sending and receiving all types of deliveries and packages
column2: safely, securely, and conveniently on a 24/7 basis without anyone ever having to be at their home or office to receive them, pay for them, or stow them. No more Porch Pirates or Missed Deliveries!

column1: eDOR® is a brand-new system designed to solve residential and commercial delivery problems, connecting all parties and making it a simple, easy, and enjoyable process.
Whether you own, rent or lease. Whether you live in a 100 story apartment building, a single family home, or on a farm in the countryside, we have designed an easy to install and use eDOR® for you.

column2: eTETHR® are all part of the same ecosystem and family of products that interface together or as stand-alone products to solve the myriad of issues and problems facing the eCommerce Industry and Consumers alike...in totality.

column1: Whether you own, rent or lease. Whether you live in a 100-story apartment building, a single-family home, or on a farm in the countryside, we’ve designed an easy to install and use eDOR®, eBOX® for eTETHR® device for you.
Check out all the features and ease-of-use that our products offer. We hope you'll agree that they're smart, very smart™.

column2: >Auto Wi-Fi connect w auto alerts sent to the receiver and sender of any delivery
>Back our project today and receive “Early Bird Specials” on these products:
>eDOR1 or eDOR2 with multiple upgrades and styles to choose from
>eBOX® with several different sizes, styles and options to choose from
>eTETHR® upgrade (for an eDOR® or eBOX®), or our Stand-alone eTETHR® version

column1: We understand that the security needs and the design of your home and business is very personal. That’s why we offer both the standard options above and the custom upgrades below. For more details on upgrades, take a look at our Perks &

column2: >2 Way Audio/Video System with cutting edge features

column1: As an external front, side, or back door of a residence or business or in an internal hallway of an apartment or business (with permission from the owner/manager of the building).
You can keep and replace the original door if you don’t own the property.
In a gate, fence, sidewall of a residence or business, or retrofit into a solid and secure door. You most likely need to be the owner of the property to do this type of improvement.
As an upgrade when you buy an eDOR® or eBOX® As a Stand-alone product in case you can’t (or don’t want to), install an eDOR® or eBOX® as in the case of renting or leasing a property.
Are you tired of missed package sticky notes, package thieves, and groceries left out in the hot sun or rain?
According to one industry estimate, 31% of consumers have been victims.
""It eliminates the entire possibility of package theft or missed deliveries, by putting the package in a secure environment where it is easy and convenient for the consumer to retrieve"".

Strategic Innovations, LLC is a Consumer Products Development Company with quantum leap inventions that solve global issues and problems. The eDOR®, eBOX® and eTETHR® devices are U.S. and International patent pending products.
No package delivery solution has been as complete as the eDOR® system. We offer viable solutions at the highest level. They’re not just functional
column2: we integrate that wow factor into our simple package delivery solutions. You can expect revolutionary technology delivered to your doorstep.

column1:
1. eKEY - Delivery person automatically receives an eKEY with every order to open locked eBOX’s. Sensors let eKEY know if there’s anything inside and eBOX’s automatically expand, close, and lock packages securely.

 

2. Alarm System – eBOX’s are alarmed and will send immediate notifications to the user if they’re tampered with. For eTETHR®, flashing lights and adjustable audible alarm alerts neighbors and scares off intimidated thieves, while capturing their cell phone I.D. and activating the 2-way communication system. Alerts are automatically sent to the authorized user.

 

3. High Def Night Vision Camera - An oldie but a goodie. We use high quality camera technology with our 2-way audio Communication System and instant recordings to the cloud of your choice to catch thieves in the act. Also great for knowing the instant your package arrives and monitoring your front door (or wherever our devices are installed).

 

4. Interior Biometric Control Locking System - Have multiple people receiving packages in your home, apartment, or business? Make sure only the intended person has access to prescription medications, alcohol, and sensitive materials by controlling “who” receives an intended delivery. Available on any eBOX®.

 

5. Wireless Lithium-Ion Battery Power System - Nothing to plug in. Nothing to charge. Don’t even worry about power outages. Our specially designed inductive Lithium-Ion battery system will work 24/7 365 days a year. For all our eDOR® &
column3:
Cold eBOX® Upgrade - Receiving medications or groceries in extreme weather conditions or just want them fresh and at their optimum temperature until you can be there to receive them? Don’t sweat not being at your home or office to receive temperature sensitive items! Coming soon!

 

7. Mobile App Connection - Wi-Fi connectivity’s automatic with Bluetooth as a backup in case it’s not available, so you’ll always be connected. If your alarm’s triggered, we can set you up to be connected to emergency services. Our standard App comes with a free download with the option to add-on additional security functions and operate and communicate with your eDOR® System from anywhere in the world.

 

8. Exact GPS Coordinates - Do you live in a remote location, or in a 20-story high-rise? We’ve got you covered with built in GPS technology to locate your designated delivery spot. Automatically gives the exact location of any of our devices (even if it’s on the side or back of your property), so there’s no chance of a missed or delayed delivery.

column1: Whether you rent or own, you can easily replace your existing door on your own or with the help of a handyman or authorized installer. Most doors fit into a standard door frame and can easily be changed out.  If you rent or lease your home or office, make sure to keep the old door and replace it when you move.

In addition to safe and secure packages being delivered conveniently to your home and office, a bonus benefit is the worry-free peace of mind you’ll experience. We understand that some packages are irreplaceable or need special care. We also understand the enormous hassle and anxiety of having to change your schedule in order to accommodate deliveries, and wanting more things to be delivered if there was an easy and hassle-free way to do that.

Our Systems are designed for all types of residential, multi-family, and commercial applications. We are partnering with Industry leading door manufacturers and have many materials to match your building requirements and styles.

We realize that we’re technology innovation leaders and not door manufacturing experts. That’s why through our stratgetic manufacturing partnerships we’re bringing you the latest trends and styles with our intergrated technology and cutting edge systems designed into them to deliver the best of all worlds, that solve problems and create a seamless experience as never before.

The problem of missing, unsecured, and stolen packages has created a huge market for solutions. Some are very simple but not convenient or practical. None of these solutions are as complete, customizable, and advanced as our suite of solutions that the eDOR® System offers.

The eDOR® System offers a suite of secure solutions to both owners and renters of residential and commercial properties in a variety of stylish colors, materials, systems and designs that are Industry 1st products that nobody else has ever thought of or invented.
Most packages received will fit inside our eBOX®’s. For the few times you do receive bulky or large items, we created the eTETHR® which can be used on its own or with the eDOR® or eBOX® system.

Yes, we want to be very transparent and customization does cost extra. We have many options to fit every budget in the areas of style, materials, colors, security, technology, and more. Our standard options fit the majority of our consumers. We also offer the option of customization whereas many of our competitors only offer one mass market model. We are a truly modular solution. Whether you are renting or own your space, we have secure options for your needs.

column2:
International patent pending inventions by Strategic Innovations, LLC, a Consumer Products Development Company.

 

The eDOR® suite of products solves a multitude of problems that are inherent in the everyday process of package and product delivery and pick-up from homes and businesses throughout the world today.

 

eDOR® combines cutting-edge technology with applied science and revolutionary design to deliver a bonafide and well thought out system that enables it's users, as well as the delivery and eCommerce industry, to enjoy immense freedom and control of receiving and delivering packages, products, and items as never before.

column1: eDOR® allows for 24/7 pick-up and deliveries to be made at your home or office, all without ever having to interact with the delivery person in any way, without you being there, and with complete security, track-ability, notifications and control given to you anywhere in the world. There's so much more!

Our Systems Are Modular and May Have Multiple eBOX's, or Just a Single eBOX® if that’s what's preferred.

 

Our eBOX's are designed for both OEM (original equipment manufacturer), to be utilized by our door manufacturer, as well as off-the-shelf to be purchased online and at key brick and mortar outlets in various shapes and sizes that can be retrofitted into a wide variety of property scenarios.
Our built-in and Stand-alone eTETHR® Device provides security and connectivity as nothing else ever invented or on the market.
Our eTETHR® device is designed for any eDOR® or eBOX® and can also be a Stand-alone product with a 2-way Communication upgrade that can be installed anywhere
column2: literally any type of residential or commercial setting or application. This is also a great option for anyone who rents or leases a property and doesn't want to install an eDOR® or eBOX®.

column1:
Each eDOR® has an upgradable 2-way Communication and smart Door Locking System and can be outfitted with multiple eBOX®’s. Each one can serve a different purpose. You can store dry cleaning, packages, and virtually any item. The eBOX® opens with an eKEY, they are automatically sent as a one-time unlocking method on electronic devices like cell phones to whoever’s making a delivery to any of our devices.

 

Anytime an order is sent out and they have an eDOR® or eBOX® then it automatically has an eKEY along with exact GPS location.

When the eKEY is within range of the designated eDOR® or eBOX® it automatically senses it though NFC technology and unlocks the exterior compartment, which when once opened, then expands to accept and protect the delivery. After it's closed it can only be opened from inside. The authorized user can manually re-open any eBOX® remotely from our App in case a mistake was made by the delivery person.

 

Every eBOX® has interior sensors for safety and security that check to make sure there’s nothing inside once a delivery’s removed and then it automatically closes back to its nesting position.

 

We also have high-security eBOX®’s for sensitive and controlled items like prescriptions drugs and medications, liquor, high value items, etc. These include Biometric fingerprint scanners that control “who” receives a delivery. Our Biometric scanners can be put on any type or style of eBOX® (at the factory).
If an item is too big to fit in an eDOR® or eBOX® it can be attached to an eTETHR®.

Our entire eDOR®, eBOX® and eTETHR® product line has full U.S. and International Patents (pending).

 

We’re very pleased to announce that Arrow Electronics, the Industry Leading $26+ billion a year Company, has certified our eDOR® Invention! Arrow only Certifies smart IoT products that go through their rigorous electronics design and schematic review process and that they believe have a high probability of being manufactured and working as designed.
Our products have been lauded by the media as “The Solution” to eCommerce! Check out our Home and News Pages on our website for many examples www.eDORdelivery.com

Brian Johnson is a veteran of the logistics industry, award winning franchise entrepreneur and President of Strategic Innovations, LLC.  Utilizing his passion for service, sales and mainly people, Brian provides strategic leadership to the eDOR®, eBOX® and eTETHR® product suite of products.  Brian believes Strategic Innovations has created game changing products for industry and consumers, providing an all-encompassing solution to the challenges faced in the home and office delivery/pickup landscape.  

 

Born in Saint Louis, Missouri, life would eventually take Brian to the Bay Area California. It is here he found his passion and love of business.  After a brief stint in Corporate America, the entrepreneurial ‘bug’ hit him. He started his first business in 2006 and would go on to start multiple others, culminating in the successful sale of his thriving logistics business.

 

Brian’s expertise is in international logistics, final mile delivery (end consumer and business) and challenges associated with fulfilling package deliveries around the globe.

 

Brian thrives on ‘getting things done’ and delivering results through collaboration, partnerships, and relationships. With an enthusiastic and friendly attitude, Brian radiates a sincere passion for delivering value and results.

 

Brian holds a B.S. in Business Marketing from San Francisco State University. As a singer-songwriter Brian channels his passion and enthusiasm for life through his beat-up old guitar.  He is an avid reader and attributes much of his success to a lifetime learning philosophy.  In his down time, Brian is writing the next New York Times Best Seller. He lives with his two boys in the Central Valley, California.

Royce Newcomb is the primary Inventor and Chief Designer of Strategic Innovations. His creative skills and ability have allowed him to achieve his life’s dream by unearthing his gifts and talents and utilizing them to serve people in powerful ways. With a focus of identifying “black hole” problems and creating quantum leap solutions that serve the masses, it’s apparent this man’s on a mission.

Being born and raised in Oregon and 1 of 6 boys, life was tough, and you had to learn to be tougher in order to overcome the obstacles and temporary realities of life in order to achieve what you wanted in order to maximize your human potential and create significance. As someone who’s overcome incredible challenges, Royce is a shining example of being an overcomer and accomplishing what oftentimes seems like the impossible in order to rise to the top.

With a wide range of business and life experiences, Royce applies his passion and enthusiasm for life into his work on a daily basis in order to bring to life the solutions that he hopes will be relative and disruptive for generations to come.

Omar’s a very enthusiastic individual with over 7 years of hands-on experience in electronic schematics and circuitry design utilizing all the top cutting-edge components for smart IoT projects as a professional Designer and Developer and has substantial experience in product engineering and development.

Omar’s certifications include Hootsuite, Eagle Circuitry, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Psd to HTML, SQL Server and much more. He takes great pride in designing products that “work” and are at the top of their class when it comes to new and current technologies while staying well-informed of new updates and technologies that are relative to our industry with innovative new products such as eDOR®, eBOX® and eTETHR®.

column1: We’d really appreciate your help! If you’re interested in supporting our Campaign and products, could you please pass it along to your friends and family along with your network on your social media pages? You can help us make history and bring these amazing products and solutions to life!
","To serve industry and consumers alike in providing an easy and seamless experience in sending and receiving all types of deliveries and packages
column2: safely, securely, and conveniently on a 24/7 basis without anyone ever having to be at their home or office to receive them, pay for them, or stow them. No more Porch Pirates or Missed Deliveries!

column1: eDOR® is a brand-new system designed to solve residential and commercial delivery problems, connecting all parties and making it a simple, easy, and enjoyable process.
Whether you own, rent or lease. Whether you live in a 100 story apartment building, a single family home, or on a farm in the countryside, we have designed an easy to install and use eDOR® for you.

eDOR®, eBOX® & eTETHR® are all part of the same ecosystem and family of products that interface together or as stand-alone products to solve the myriad of issues and problems facing the eCommerce Industry and Consumers alike...in totality.

Whether you own, rent or lease. Whether you live in a 100-story apartment building, a single-family home, or on a farm in the countryside, we’ve designed an easy to install and use eDOR®, eBOX® for eTETHR® device for you.
Check out all the features and ease-of-use that our products offer. We hope you'll agree that they're smart, very smart™.
Auto Wi-Fi connect w auto alerts sent to the receiver and sender of any delivery
Back our project today and receive “Early Bird Specials” on these products:
eDOR1 or eDOR2 with multiple upgrades and styles to choose from
eBOX® with several different sizes, styles and options to choose from
eTETHR® upgrade (for an eDOR® or eBOX®), or our Stand-alone eTETHR® version

We understand that the security needs and the design of your home and business is very personal. That’s why we offer both the standard options above and the custom upgrades below. For more details on upgrades, take a look at our Perks & Rewards.
Add on eTETHR® for eDOR® & eBOX®
Smart Door Lock upgrade for eDOR®
U.S. Postal Service Mail Pickup & Drop-off Subscription for eDOR® & eBOX®
2 Way Audio/Video System with cutting edge features
Upgradable styles and materials for eDOR®
As an external front, side, or back door of a residence or business or in an internal hallway of an apartment or business (with permission from the owner/manager of the building).
You can keep and replace the original door if you don’t own the property.
In a gate, fence, sidewall of a residence or business, or retrofit into a solid and secure door. You most likely need to be the owner of the property to do this type of improvement.
As an upgrade when you buy an eDOR® or eBOX® As a Stand-alone product in case you can’t (or don’t want to), install an eDOR® or eBOX® as in the case of renting or leasing a property.
Are you tired of missed package sticky notes, package thieves, and groceries left out in the hot sun or rain?
According to one industry estimate, 31% of consumers have been victims.
It eliminates the entire possibility of package theft or missed deliveries, by putting the package in a secure environment where it is easy and convenient for the consumer to retrieve"".

Strategic Innovations, LLC is a Consumer Products Development Company with quantum leap inventions that solve global issues and problems. The eDOR®, eBOX® and eTETHR® devices are U.S. and International patent pending products.
No package delivery solution has been as complete as the eDOR® system. We offer viable solutions at the highest level. They’re not just functional
column2: we integrate that wow factor into our simple package delivery solutions. You can expect revolutionary technology delivered to your doorstep.

column1: 1. eKEY - Delivery person automatically receives an eKEY with every order to open locked eBOX’s. Sensors let eKEY know if there’s anything inside and eBOX’s automatically expand, close, and lock packages securely. 2. Alarm System – eBOX’s are alarmed and will send immediate notifications to the user if they’re tampered with. For eTETHR®, flashing lights and adjustable audible alarm alerts neighbors and scares off intimidated thieves, while capturing their cell phone I.D. and activating the 2-way communication system. Alerts are automatically sent to the authorized user. 3. High Def Night Vision Camera - An oldie but a goodie. We use high quality camera technology with our 2-way audio Communication System and instant recordings to the cloud of your choice to catch thieves in the act. Also great for knowing the instant your package arrives and monitoring your front door (or wherever our devices are installed). 4. Interior Biometric Control Locking System - Have multiple people receiving packages in your home, apartment, or business? Make sure only the intended person has access to prescription medications, alcohol, and sensitive materials by controlling “who” receives an intended delivery. Available on any eBOX®. 5. Wireless Lithium-Ion Battery Power System - Nothing to plug in. Nothing to charge. Don’t even worry about power outages. Our specially designed inductive Lithium-Ion battery system will work 24/7 365 days a year. For all our eDOR® & eBOX® devices. 6. Temperature Controlled Hot & Cold eBOX® Upgrade - Receiving medications or groceries in extreme weather conditions or just want them fresh and at their optimum temperature until you can be there to receive them? Don’t sweat not being at your home or office to receive temperature sensitive items! Coming soon! 7. Mobile App Connection - Wi-Fi connectivity’s automatic with Bluetooth as a backup in case it’s not available, so you’ll always be connected. If your alarm’s triggered, we can set you up to be connected to emergency services. Our standard App comes with a free download with the option to add-on additional security functions and operate and communicate with your eDOR® System from anywhere in the world. 8. Exact GPS Coordinates - Do you live in a remote location, or in a 20-story high-rise? We’ve got you covered with built in GPS technology to locate your designated delivery spot. Automatically gives the exact location of any of our devices (even if it’s on the side or back of your property), so there’s no chance of a missed or delayed delivery.

Whether you rent or own, you can easily replace your existing door on your own or with the help of a handyman or authorized installer. Most doors fit into a standard door frame and can easily be changed out.  If you rent or lease your home or office, make sure to keep the old door and replace it when you move.

In addition to safe and secure packages being delivered conveniently to your home and office, a bonus benefit is the worry-free peace of mind you’ll experience. We understand that some packages are irreplaceable or need special care. We also understand the enormous hassle and anxiety of having to change your schedule in order to accommodate deliveries, and wanting more things to be delivered if there was an easy and hassle-free way to do that.

Our Systems are designed for all types of residential, multi-family, and commercial applications. We are partnering with Industry leading door manufacturers and have many materials to match your building requirements and styles.

We realize that we’re technology innovation leaders and not door manufacturing experts. That’s why through our stratgetic manufacturing partnerships we’re bringing you the latest trends and styles with our intergrated technology and cutting edge systems designed into them to deliver the best of all worlds, that solve problems and create a seamless experience as never before.

The problem of missing, unsecured, and stolen packages has created a huge market for solutions. Some are very simple but not convenient or practical. None of these solutions are as complete, customizable, and advanced as our suite of solutions that the eDOR® System offers.

The eDOR® System offers a suite of secure solutions to both owners and renters of residential and commercial properties in a variety of stylish colors, materials, systems and designs that are Industry 1st products that nobody else has ever thought of or invented.
Most packages received will fit inside our eBOX®’s. For the few times you do receive bulky or large items, we created the eTETHR® which can be used on its own or with the eDOR® or eBOX® system.

Yes, we want to be very transparent and customization does cost extra. We have many options to fit every budget in the areas of style, materials, colors, security, technology, and more. Our standard options fit the majority of our consumers. We also offer the option of customization whereas many of our competitors only offer one mass market model. We are a truly modular solution. Whether you are renting or own your space, we have secure options for your needs.

eDOR®, eBOX® and eTETHR® are US & International patent pending inventions by Strategic Innovations, LLC, a Consumer Products Development Company. The eDOR® suite of products solves a multitude of problems that are inherent in the everyday process of package and product delivery and pick-up from homes and businesses throughout the world today. eDOR® combines cutting-edge technology with applied science and revolutionary design to deliver a bonafide and well thought out system that enables it's users, as well as the delivery and eCommerce industry, to enjoy immense freedom and control of receiving and delivering packages, products, and items as never before.

eDOR® allows for 24/7 pick-up and deliveries to be made at your home or office, all without ever having to interact with the delivery person in any way, without you being there, and with complete security, track-ability, notifications and control given to you anywhere in the world. There's so much more!

Our Systems Are Modular and May Have Multiple eBOX's, or Just a Single eBOX® if that’s what's preferred. Our eBOX's are designed for both OEM (original equipment manufacturer), to be utilized by our door manufacturer, as well as off-the-shelf to be purchased online and at key brick and mortar outlets in various shapes and sizes that can be retrofitted into a wide variety of property scenarios.
Our built-in and Stand-alone eTETHR® Device provides security and connectivity as nothing else ever invented or on the market.
Our eTETHR® device is designed for any eDOR® or eBOX® and can also be a Stand-alone product with a 2-way Communication upgrade that can be installed anywhere
column2: literally any type of residential or commercial setting or application. This is also a great option for anyone who rents or leases a property and doesn't want to install an eDOR® or eBOX®.

column1: Each eDOR® has an upgradable 2-way Communication and smart Door Locking System and can be outfitted with multiple eBOX®’s. Each one can serve a different purpose. You can store dry cleaning, packages, and virtually any item. The eBOX® opens with an eKEY, they are automatically sent as a one-time unlocking method on electronic devices like cell phones to whoever’s making a delivery to any of our devices. Anytime an order is sent out and they have an eDOR® or eBOX® then it automatically has an eKEY along with exact GPS location.

When the eKEY is within range of the designated eDOR® or eBOX® it automatically senses it though NFC technology and unlocks the exterior compartment, which when once opened, then expands to accept and protect the delivery. After it's closed it can only be opened from inside. The authorized user can manually re-open any eBOX® remotely from our App in case a mistake was made by the delivery person. Every eBOX® has interior sensors for safety and security that check to make sure there’s nothing inside once a delivery’s removed and then it automatically closes back to its nesting position. We also have high-security eBOX®’s for sensitive and controlled items like prescriptions drugs and medications, liquor, high value items, etc. These include Biometric fingerprint scanners that control “who” receives a delivery. Our Biometric scanners can be put on any type or style of eBOX® (at the factory).
If an item is too big to fit in an eDOR® or eBOX® it can be attached to an eTETHR®.

Our entire eDOR®, eBOX® and eTETHR® product line has full U.S. and International Patents (pending). We’re very pleased to announce that Arrow Electronics, the Industry Leading $26+ billion a year Company, has certified our eDOR® Invention! Arrow only Certifies smart IoT products that go through their rigorous electronics design and schematic review process and that they believe have a high probability of being manufactured and working as designed.
Our products have been lauded by the media as “The Solution” to eCommerce! Check out our Home and News Pages on our website for many examples www.eDORdelivery.com

Brian Johnson is a veteran of the logistics industry, award winning franchise entrepreneur and President of Strategic Innovations, LLC.  Utilizing his passion for service, sales and mainly people, Brian provides strategic leadership to the eDOR®, eBOX® and eTETHR® product suite of products.  Brian believes Strategic Innovations has created game changing products for industry and consumers, providing an all-encompassing solution to the challenges faced in the home and office delivery/pickup landscape.   Born in Saint Louis, Missouri, life would eventually take Brian to the Bay Area California. It is here he found his passion and love of business.  After a brief stint in Corporate America, the entrepreneurial ‘bug’ hit him. He started his first business in 2006 and would go on to start multiple others, culminating in the successful sale of his thriving logistics business. Brian’s expertise is in international logistics, final mile delivery (end consumer and business) and challenges associated with fulfilling package deliveries around the globe. Brian thrives on ‘getting things done’ and delivering results through collaboration, partnerships, and relationships. He lives with his two boys in the Central Valley, California.

As a career Police Officer, I have responded to most major recent hurricanes to strike the United States, from Hurricanes Katrina in 2005 to Hurricane Florence, last month. I served and led teams in emergency search and rescue, damage assessment and humanitarian relief capacities, where I witnessed first-hand the loss of life and extreme hardship that occurs in the aftermath of a hurricane.

In each of these hurricanes, similar patterns became evident to me. First, hurricane devastation results in days to weeks of 19th Century-like conditions, with loss of electrical power, water, sewer service, cellular service, groceries or fuel. These impacts impact people across all socio-economic boundaries. Secondly, very few people are prepared. Whether they are life-long residents or new to hurricane zones and regardless of income, most people who shelter in place during hurricanes fail to take the necessary steps to prepare. Finally, the ability of the government, utility companies and businesses to restore essential services.

My mission is to solve this problem with Ready2Stay™️.  For families who are members of our service and cannot evacuate ahead of a forecasted hurricane, Ready2Stay will provide members with continuous information concerning the hurricane forecast for their area, as well as specific evacuation notices and instructions. In addition, if members elect to shelter in place, Ready2Stay will ship them the necessary food, supplies and equipment to sustain a family of four, for five days. There are no worries of impossible lines or a run on food and supplies when it's needed most.

Ready2Stay™️ membership is just $10 per month plus a fee of only $200 to activate your $1,000 value of emergency food and supplies, if you are in the hurricane zone, delivered to your door before the storm strikes. We are dedicated to saving lives and easing hardship in the aftermath of hurricanes.

I am a first-time entrepreneur. I see a tremendous need for a truly effective hurricane preparedness service and have developed a unique solution through Ready2Stay. I recognize that most businesses fail and that I don't have all the answers. However, I have surrounded myself with highly successful entrepreneurs that continue to guide and mentor me.

My years as a Police Lieutenant, attorney, former Chief of Staff of Chicago Cook County’s Department of Homeland Security and Emergency Management, as well as my service as a Marine and Army Paratrooper have prepared me for this next step.

A great deal of work has gone into laying the groundwork for the launch of Ready2Stay. From an analysis of the marketplace, forecasting models, logistics capabilities and digital marketing, we are well positioned to launch Ready2Stay and begin making a difference in the millions of lives affected by hurricanes each year.

I am Product Designer and Interior Architect. I have been educated at the Rietveld Academy in the Netherlands and live and work in Amsterdam. I love to travel and nature fascinates me a lot. I get piece of mind being surrounded by nature. The natural space is often inspirational to me. Time becomes irrelevant. A continuous flow in nature. The elements of wood, light, fire, stone, water and air. They live together and respond to each other.  They addept and change each other to maintain a certain balance.  A balance we people also need but is increasingly avoided by hectic livestyles. See the Rising Balance candleholder perhaps also as a symbol for improved personal balance and relaxation. Just take 30-60 minutes to relax and watch the movement.
With your help and support we can further develop the Rising Balance candleholder and prepare for production on a larger scale.
The funds from this campaign will be used to develop a new production method and create a distribution network.

So if you buy one or more candle holders we say thank you very much for your support to produce the Rising Balance candleholder and we will work very hard to deliver on time and keep you informed on new developments and give you the first options to buy new products at best price.
If we reach the $30.000 goal, we will use the funds as follows:
- product development and new production method for large scale production
- travel to production facilities and making sure we deliver best quality and products shipped in time to you.
- setting up a website, marketing and distribution network

If we don't reach the full amount it will depend on the number of Rising Balance candleholders sold wether we can deliver the product for the price mentioned in this campaign. The minimum number of Rising Balance candleholders to be sold in this campaign in order do so is 600 pieces.

We need your contribution and support to reach this goal. If you like the product, please inform your friends and family via the Indiegogo links about the Rising Balance candleholder and help us to make it happen.
We already have the production facilities selected and tested and we are confident we will deliver your Rising Balance candleholder before april 2018.

Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks &
column3:
Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution? We, Sifa Asani Gowon and Oluwatosin 'Tosin' Olaseinde, were inspired to start KoKo's Kitchen because of Sifa's flair and passion for all things 'baking' and Tosin's skill and love for financial analysis and business. We saw an opportunity in the growing confectionery market and decided to take a leap and begin creating mixes to rival those of imported competitors. Also, one of the more personal aspects of KoKo's Kitchen comes from the desire to commemorate Sifa's father, fondly known as 'KoKo' which is Grandpa in Swahili, after he passed away.

Each mix is specially created from a base and then crafted to suit the taste of consumers, as Sifa  learned from her 20+ years of baking (5+ on a professional level).  Tosin has been able to craft a business model for KoKo's Kitchen using her sharp knack for numbers and we have taken steady steps and growing the business.

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

In order to get to a stage where the business can adequately grow to break even and begin to fund itself we will need the sum of $30,000. This will go towards:

Renting a proper facility (12 months) and redesigning it to suit government requirements for production- approx. $7000

Government licences per product (we have 3)- $1200

Machinery (mixer, auger filler, generator)- approx. $12000

Employees- Salaries for 10 employees for 5 months- approx. $3000

Marketing and Distribution:- Adverts,

column1:
Firms, Distribution) for 6 months- $3000

Inventory - (ingredients, factory items, miscellaneous)-  approx. $4000


YOU get:

Special tokens of appreciation
column2:
gifts from us specially made and branded for you! We've got a few to offer, as you'll see further on...


The Impact

Our campaign is all about being able to inject our business with the funds needed to give it a fighting chance in the Nigerian economy today. Getting bank loans and engaging investors in this climate isn't very favourable to SMEs. This is why every dollar we get from you counts, and can go a long way.
column3:
>We believe that our project is not only viable, but can have a great social impact as well. Our production takes place in northern Nigeria, an area that has a large number of Internally Displaced Persons (IDPs) and camps. There is such a camp in Bauchi, where we hope to situate our factory. We plan on hiring such persons and equipping them with skills to work for us. We also source all our ingredients within Nigeria, thereby strengthening the economy by buying locally.

We believe in creating wonderful products and having fun as we do so! We want to be able to build a strong base within the confectionery industry in Nigeria, which is growing, and we want to have something unique, with value for money. As women, we want to build a dream for ourselves, our families and form a large network of other women within the industry.

Risks &
column4:
Challenges

The Nigerian economy is experiencing a recession and as such, the business climate is risky. The fluctuation of prices makes pricing our products difficult from month to month as well as affects overall costs. We also have to structure a proper distribution/supply chain and secure returning customers. All these are risk factors.

We believe that with all the proper structures in place, we can overcome these hurdles and minimize risks. If we can get all the necessary permits and get our products on the shelves of major supermarket chains, hotels, eateries and in home pantries, at a good price, then we're in good business!

As we mentioned, we would have to ensure that we have the proper equipment in place to have smooth and steady production, government backing and a reliable distribution chain to ensure that the process moves from one stage to another as seamlessly as possible.

Other Ways You Can Help
column5:
>We understand that you may have other ways you'd like to help us and we truly appreciate that!

Could you share this campaign with friends and/or interested individuals? Could you help us spread the word?

Please use the Indiegogo Share tools to do so!

Thank you so much!
