Let people know that you are in someone’s heart!
If you have any other questions, please email us at contact@reserveplaceinmyheart.com
Even if you can't contribute money. No Problem! There are other ways to help. We appreciate every effort! Share us and tell about us - Spread the love",17.0,0,"1 Campaign

Hi everyone! My name is Andreea Egli and I'm the founder and creative director of House of Egli and I manufacture luxury scented soy candle. I' m actually a jack of all trades since the company is comprised of me, myself and I.

In real life, I have nothing to do with candle making. I work for a company in an unrelated business field. You could say that I'm a double agent, a 9 to 5 office worker by day and an entrepreneur by night. I call myself a sidepreneur.

Leaving all the that aside, I can tell you that I've always loved scented candles. Loved loved them. The idea came up to me on a rainy day, last December. Quite poetic but true. Don't remember exactly but I was going through some YT videos and I stumbled upon one that was explaining how commercial candles are made and how toxic they can be. I was a bit shocked and since I was regularly burning them I went on and did some research. It was all true. Commercial candles are all made of paraffin wax, a petroleum based mineral wax that consists of a mixture of hydrocarbon molecules. Even the very big luxury candle brands use toxic waxes in their products. The wax I will be using is made of soy beans. Soy wax is a vegetable wax made of the oils of soybeans and is 100% natural.

Long story short, I decided to buy some supplies and try make my own. I realised that I not only found a hobby but stumbled upon an idea. I said to myself, why not, I love the business side of it and I love candles. And if they are ""healthy"" for you, why not share them with the world to enjoy. I'm not a doctor or a shrink but this is my way of helping people. This might sound corny but imagine you are on a romantic date and somewhere in the background, a beautiful candle is burning quietly, filling the room with amazing scents or, you come home from a terrible day at work, prepare yourself a luxurious bath and light up a candle and you just drift away. Well, I call that escaping presence because my candles do just that.
Here is a breakdown of the prototype from start to finish:
This is the signature glass I will use for all four candles, with a capacity of 30 cl.

This is the signature box I will use to pack the candle in.
Here are the label samples and a short description of the fragrances:
Alpine Forest luxury scented candle

The clean fresh invigorating smell of a snowy winter's day. This fragrance begins with top notes of fresh lime and menthol, middle notes of Douglas fir and lavender, and full-bodied base notes of eucalyptus and pine.
Arabian Nights luxury scented candle
Top notes of green leaf, citrus and mint, heart notes of ginger, patchouli and jasmine, followed by base notes of vanilla, musk and sandalwood.
Paradise Beach luxury scented candle

column2:
>

Escape to paradise. This stunning fragrance combines fresh bergamot, bright orange and rich amber with warming notes of exotic coconut, vanilla and almond.

column1: Delicious Pomegranate luxury scented candle

Top notes of plum, pomegranate and Rose with heart notes of patchouli, cedarwood, violet leaf and Spice, and base notes of musk, amber, vanilla and leather.
And last but not least, the label that will go on the container:
The finished product will look as per below:
Please bear in mind that this is just a test candle.
One of the two tissue papers will be used to pack the candle. This will be wrapped around the candle to keep it safe and amazing looking.
The ribbon will be wrapped around the box. I cannot decide at this point whether I will go with four different colours or use just simple black or maybe gold.
Good for you &
I hope that this breakdown helps you to get a feel of the product and get excited about it as I am!

This campaign is important to me because it will help me build something incredible that I strongly believe in. From a business point of view, I want the company to be socially responsible. I plan to run a green work studio and use natural supplies (where possible, i.e. the fragrances used are not essential oils) when creating my candle collections. A certain percentage of the annual profits will go towards the animal shelters here in Cyprus. My little cat, Maya has inspired me and helped me decide. In the future, I hope to help other not for profit organisations.
Now coming down to the business part of the campaign, I need your contribution. I need you to back me up on this venture.

I have been working from my bedroom testing, testing and... yes more testing since January. It has been extremely difficult and frustrating to create amazing candles since there is no space in my apartment and there is no other place to work from at the moment. Also, since there are no candle making suppliers in Cyprus, I had to look overseas for these. The shipping its quite expensive but there is no other way to procure my supplies. I've been funding my venture from my own personal money with no help from others. Its been a rollercoaster, from excitement to frustration.
I've vetted many suppliers and I now found the ones am ready to work with.

So, the funding that I will receive from YOU, my backers and contributors will partly go towards leasing a work space, studio for at least 6 months if not 1 year and partly towards buying all the supplies I need in bigger quantities. This will help save a lot of time.
If I don't reach my entire funding goal, depending on the amount, the funds will go towards buying the supplies I need.
I will launch the brand in September so I need to make sure that I have everything that I need beforehand.
Now, what's in it for you! Well, some amazing perks!
This is greatly appreciated and you will be mentioned on the company's Facebook page.
You will receive an amazing thank you card  designed by me with a handwritten personal message.

You will receive one of the four luxury soy scented candles part of my first collection.  Since there is no way to test their fragrance here, I will e-mail you a short description of each so that you can chose your favourite+ you will receive a 10% discount on any purchase you make during the month of November.

Thank you! Thank you! You will receive three luxury soy scented candles part of my first collection. Each candle is 200 g. Since there is no way to test their fragrance here, I will e-mail you a short description of each so that you can chose your two favourites. You will be also mentioned on the company's Facebook page as one of the contributors and receive a 10% discount on any purchase you make during the months of November and December.

Thank you! Thank you! You will receive the whole collection of luxury soy scented candles made of four candles. Each candle is 200 g. Since there is no way to test their fragrance here, I will e-mail you a short description of each so that you can chose your two favourites. You will be also mentioned on the company's Facebook page as one of the contributors and receive a 10% discount on any purchase you make during the months of November and December.
I have been planning the launch of House of Egli since January. I'm aware of the challenges ahead but I'm sure I can overcome them.

With regard to the fulfilment of this campaign and getting all the perks out to all my contributors, the main challenge I might have will be to get all my supplies in time to produce all the candles. If there is a chance that the production might be delayed, I will let everyone know.
I will keep you updated every step of the way!
If you cannot contribute to this campaign, please do share it on your social media channels. That would mean the world to me.

Thank you in advance for your contribution and interest in this campaign and venture.

Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks &
column3:
Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

What is this?

Hello internet, name is john from Jbit retro.

Jbit Retro came to life in a small town over some pizza and friday night video game hang out and nerd out. Being a gameboy collector, i would search the internet and learn as much as i could about nintendo products and how to fix them. One day i came across the modding world and found this cool little mod about taking a Nintendo DS phat and turning it into a GBA. After making my own a few years back i would complain to my gamer friends that i wish i had one but completely solid. A sleek hard plastic manufactured body versus a hand modded one and painted. I wish someone with the manufacturing knowledge would make these i would say. It all began with my buddy commenting ""why don't you be the one to do it"". Thus Jbit retro was born.

What we are trying to do is Fund the process to manufacture our custom shells for use of the mod in different colors. This crowd fund is to pay for the first step in the process and some promotional material. We know we wont get rich with this, that is not the intention, but I personally love nintendo products so much that I want to see this through till the end. Many ups and downs we have had while the project has been alive. The reason why we keep going is because heck, I want one, and we know someone out there is probably thinking the same too. Our future goal is to start a retro manufacturing company, that specializes in revamping of old nintendo hardware. We hope to revisit everything we possibly can and create new aftermarket parts. What will set us apart is the fact that we want to be involved with you. We believe that feedback is important and we hope to do all of our projects on a backed and voted way. We plan to propose projects and bring them to life as soon as there is enough backing for them. It all sounds nice in writing, but in order to get there, first thing is first.

What We Need:

After contacting many manufacturers for a while and doing research we finally know the steps we need.

  • Step one - Precision 3D CAD model to scale
    Manufacturing requires a mold of the part to be made. This involves super precise measuring so the shell can fit and function from digital to the real world. we have been trying to fund this ourselves but your contribution would make it faster. (goal of $1,000)
  • STEP 2 - Shop around for manufacturer
    We can not get total cost of manufacture until we have the cad model, we would then try to find a manufacturer that can handle our order quantities. we would fund this in the form of pre orders and crowd funding yet again.
  • Step 3 - Prototyping and testing
    Testing the manufactured shell for accuracy and stress testing for quality. Upon approval our order would be placed and packaging and shipping would occur.

The Impact

Your contribution no matter how small will make it so the Macro project can continue and soon see the light of day in the form of a manufactured part versus a hand made modification. Every year about 50 million tons of electronic waste ends up in our landfills. Electronic devices contain harmful materials and chemicals that pollute the environment and our water supplies. By supporting this project, you will contribute to a small part of that waste being repurposed. Broken nintendo DS consoles could be converted into beautiful GBA gaming devices.

column2:
Challenges

 In the event that our funding would not be completed, the funds would be held until we can reach the goal by other means. We have a bit of cushion in the event that this occurs. 70 to 75 percent of funding if possible, we could offset the balance. The other 500 dollars would go toward creating promotional items and thank you gifts for people who fund step one. ( thank you gifts could be in the form of stickers and jbit retro keychains)
This project has been coming for some time but we finally have all the necessary things in place. The plan is well defined and now needs funding to proceed.

column1:
Can't Donate? You Can still Help

Indiegogo has tools you can use to share our campaign. Word of mouth is the most powerful form of advertising there is. If you believe in what we are doing we would urge you to help, tell your gamer friends and share us on social medial. thank you guys for your time and we hope you can be with us as we try to bring the MACRO to the gaming community.

Social:

Short Summary

We've been working to build the best rural high-speed system possible. Crave Technologies was created for the sole purpose of bringing city-grade High-Speed Internet to the rural consumer. We have succeeded, but we're not done.

With the new fiber optic based Internet systems, once again the rural consumer is lagging behind. It doesn't have to be that way. We now have products available to us that can reach similar speeds to fiber, at a fraction of the cost.

Our network covers about half of Grand Manan with good quality Internet, however Grand Manan has a shortage of bandwidth. This campaign will fund not only a new wireless link to the mainland, but it will add more coverage to the network. Also it will allow upgrades to the existing system to allow for the new 100+mbps customer connections.
We can solve the Rural Internet issues, together.
We need about $100,000 USD to complete the project. Where does all that money go do you ask?
1.) A radio system consisting of a tower on Grand Manan, and a transmitter site either in Black's Harbour or St. George.
2.) Two 1gbps wireless links. These will both be operational, but if one fails, the other will carry the load. Full redundancy.
3.)1 Mile of fiber, to bring the internet we need to the Blacks Harbour site..
4.)Shelters at each tower to house electrical and networking components.
5.)Wireless links to feed the new bandwidth into the heart of our existing network, turbocharging the entire system.
6.)New Routers and switches to bring the network up to 1gbps for backbone links every point on the network.
7.) New wireless equipment to bring the capability for customers to get over 100mbps to their homes and businesses. Our mid-range package is forecast to be 25mbps, over 3 times faster than Aliant.
8.) Two new towers for increased coverage of the island. (Pending funding)
The entire amount will be put into new equipment, and the new link to the mainland.
1.) You will be helping rural users around the globe to bridge the digital divide
2.)The people of Grand Manan Island will finally have true, ultra hi-speed internet.
3.) You will allow us to build and test the system and iron the bugs out.
4.) We will create a network system that anyone with some knowledge and skill can implement, anywhere.
What if you don't reach your goal?

If we do not meet our goal, what we will do depends largely on what we do raise. One of the goals is to build the link to the mainland. We will use the funds we raise to build this link first. We will upgrade what we can with whats left.
If we aren't successful in raising enough to build the link, we will perform upgrades to the network with what we do raise.

column5: >The people of Grand Manan Island will no longer lag behind when it comes to speed and technology, they will lead.

column1: The impact for the island will be immediate, and powerful. We are losing out on business by not having a first class network to use. We can attract new business and keep what we have.

As for the impact of a pre-packaged network solution, think of this. Say a disaster happens and communications are knocked out. (Sound Familiar?) This system will be able to be containerized and deployed rapidly and cheaply for disaster relief, or providing affordable connections in the developing world.

I have spent 9 years building this network from nothing, to what it is today. We have customers such as Canadian Coast Guard, University of Maine, Bowdoin College, Coastal Transport Ltd, just to name a few.
This is very doable, for this cost. I can do it, all I need is your help.

column5: >As with anything, there is risk. Here are the ones I am concerned most with.

>1.) The regional Telecom, BellAliant could swoop in and run fiber all over the island, squeezing me out. However, their investment would be about $15 million. Our system is much better suited for our low population (2500+-).

>2.) Competition from other players. This is possible, but it's a small market and there are really only 2 major players, Crave Technologies and BellAliant. I do not see anyone else trying to tap this market.

>3.) Engineering challenges. Is it good digging, or have we got ledge to worry about? Something broke, where can I get it welded? I have 30 years in the computer field, 18 years in welding, 23 years in mechanics, holder of a Power Engineering license, Millwright/ Industrial mechanic, Licensed Auto Mechanic. 10 years in networking, 10 years self-employed. Any challenges I can handle them, and if I can't, I know who to call, and who gets the job done, on time and on budget.

column1:
If you can't help financially, share the campaign!  The more people who know, the better chance we have of being funded!
Indiegogo has some great sharing tools, give them a try!
","Short Summary We've been working to build the best rural high-speed system possible. Crave Technologies was created for the sole purpose of bringing city-grade High-Speed Internet to the rural consumer. We have succeeded, but we're not done.

With the new fiber optic based Internet systems, once again the rural consumer is lagging behind. It doesn't have to be that way. We now have products available to us that can reach similar speeds to fiber, at a fraction of the cost.

Our network covers about half of Grand Manan with good quality Internet, however Grand Manan has a shortage of bandwidth. This campaign will fund not only a new wireless link to the mainland, but it will add more coverage to the network. Also it will allow upgrades to the existing system to allow for the new 100+mbps customer connections.
We can solve the Rural Internet issues, together.
What We Need & What You Get
We need about $100,000 USD to complete the project. Where does all that money go do you ask?
1.) A radio system consisting of a tower on Grand Manan, and a transmitter site either in Black's Harbour or St. George.
2.) Two 1gbps wireless links. These will both be operational, but if one fails, the other will carry the load. Full redundancy.
3.)1 Mile of fiber, to bring the internet we need to the Blacks Harbour site..
4.)Shelters at each tower to house electrical and networking components.
5.)Wireless links to feed the new bandwidth into the heart of our existing network, turbocharging the entire system.
6.)New Routers and switches to bring the network up to 1gbps for backbone links every point on the network.
7.) New wireless equipment to bring the capability for customers to get over 100mbps to their homes and businesses. Our mid-range package is forecast to be 25mbps, over 3 times faster than Aliant.
8.) Two new towers for increased coverage of the island. (Pending funding)
The entire amount will be put into new equipment, and the new link to the mainland.
1.) You will be helping rural users around the globe to bridge the digital divide
2.)The people of Grand Manan Island will finally have true, ultra hi-speed internet.
3.) You will allow us to build and test the system and iron the bugs out.
4.) We will create a network system that anyone with some knowledge and skill can implement, anywhere.
What if you don't reach your goal?

If we do not meet our goal, what we will do depends largely on what we do raise. One of the goals is to build the link to the mainland. We will use the funds we raise to build this link first. We will upgrade what we can with whats left.
If we aren't successful in raising enough to build the link, we will perform upgrades to the network with what we do raise.
The people of Grand Manan Island will no longer lag behind when it comes to speed and technology, they will lead.
The impact for the island will be immediate, and powerful. We are losing out on business by not having a first class network to use. We can attract new business and keep what we have.

As for the impact of a pre-packaged network solution, think of this. Say a disaster happens and communications are knocked out. (Sound Familiar?) This system will be able to be containerized and deployed rapidly and cheaply for disaster relief, or providing affordable connections in the developing world.

I have spent 9 years building this network from nothing, to what it is today. We have customers such as Canadian Coast Guard, University of Maine, Bowdoin College, Coastal Transport Ltd, just to name a few.
This is very doable, for this cost. I can do it, all I need is your help. Risks & Challenges
As with anything, there is risk. Here are the ones I am concerned most with.

1.) The regional Telecom, BellAliant could swoop in and run fiber all over the island, squeezing me out. However, their investment would be about $15 million. Our system is much better suited for our low population (2500+-).

2.) Competition from other players. This is possible, but it's a small market and there are really only 2 major players, Crave Technologies and BellAliant. I do not see anyone else trying to tap this market.

3.) Engineering challenges. Is it good digging, or have we got ledge to worry about? Something broke, where can I get it welded? I have 30 years in the computer field, 18 years in welding, 23 years in mechanics, holder of a Power Engineering license, Millwright/ Industrial mechanic, Licensed Auto Mechanic. 10 years in networking, 10 years self-employed. Any challenges I can handle them, and if I can't, I know who to call, and who gets the job done, on time and on budget.
Can't Contribute? You can still help!
If you can't help financially, share the campaign!  The more people who know, the better chance we have of being funded!Indiegogo has some great sharing tools, give them a try!",0.0,0,"1 Campaign
Huge time savings - New lifestyle - Free at last!

It was meant to happen! There is too much time lost in cooking at home and the burden most often falls on the lady of the house. If at the same time she has to work the burden can become a nightmare. No more! On the other hand, as builders of technologically advanced homes, specialising the last decade on zero energy housing, we have watched many of our clients spending large amounts of money in kitchen furniture and equipment, only to confess most of them that they would scarcely use what they invested on and, having to work on full time jobs, they would have to live mainly on deliveries and takeaways. It seemed as a natural conclusion to us that an automated robotic kitchen, that would not cost more than what our clients spent anyway on a classic kitchen, would get them out of thus vicious circle. Prometheus Robotic Kitchen would be the answer.

We set up a team and research centre almost two years ago and, started with the concept and ended with a fully featured working prototype of a fully automated kitchen which not only meets our original expectations but through the experience acquired on the way went far beyond them. Costs were thankfully kept within our original forecasts without compromising quality. The robotic kitchen working prototype presented in the accompanying video and photos has gone through exhaustive tests proving the durability and integrity of the system beyond doubt even though some prototype parts had to be printed on 3Ds instead of the titanium on the production model.

We are also very proud for the software system we proprietary developed by which recipes are coded. It is extremely user friendly, works as a simple puzzle game and using it we are able to code thousands of recipes in only a few steps.
A life changer, not just a high tech kitchen

Our automated kitchen intents to liberate households from the burden of cooking, elevate the quality of living and allow families and individuals, in case they need to, to use their newly acquired free time to increase their household income as well. They will just have to supply the fresh ingredients for any recipe in the integrated refrigerator of the kitchen and off to their jobs, The robots need only to know when the meal should be ready, for how many servings and specific taste preferences. These instructions are sent to the system via WiFi from anyplace. Home or office, via smartphone, tablet or laptop or desk top computer.
A fully fledged kitchen who's got it all

All you need in a kitchen is there. And more! Check out the full list at Prometheus Kitchen website. And just in case you get an urge to cook on manual like in old times please go ahead and rest assured that the robots will take no offence. You are their master and they know it!
Robots never forget - And they always do it right

On another tone, what is really nice about robots is that whatever they are taught they never forget. And as such, a recipe they cook for a thousand times will always be as delicious as they cooked it the first time, provided of course the ingredients a user supplies will not be inferior, The delta robots can move with an accuracy of as little is one tenth of a millimetre! This will be evident in the video especially when replacing pot lids to pots and pressure cookers.This precision in robotic behaviour guarantees excellent and consistent results, no more burnt food, too salty, too spicy, All of these will be apparent in the full story video we provided that records from start to finish the complete process of preparing one of the most demanding recipes which includes 15 ingredients

I am an engineer, not a chef. But even with the fully functional working prototype of our robotic kitchen I can assure you I can pick up the best recipe from a grandmaster's chef cookbook and cook it the exact same way the grandmaster did in the first place.
Why we need you to support the the Robotic Kitchen

Our company has a long successful record in home building with a large score of happy customers who keep us going by word of mouth and we have been a few of the companies that stood steady even during the financial crisis a few years back. For this reason we have been able to be debt free all along and our relations with our bank is only depositing and withdrawing.This is why we could curry the financial burden of researching and prototyping from our own pocket up to this moment and still have the means to go a few steps forward, but not for long. This is a venture with worldwide impact and need people who look to the future come and walk with us.

With a fully working prototype and the firmware/software we developed we are in fact ready to start setting up production ourselves on a small scale within the financial framework of our own company. But that is not our intention. Small scale production will not guarantee the low cost that would make our product accessible to the average household and we do not want to sell it just to the very rich. We intend to go into mass production and come out strong with at least one plant in Europe and others in the United States and Asia so as to  keep the shipping costs as low as possible. We also intend to co-operatre with established home appliance manufacturers  who can provide us with the appliances our robotic kitchen uses, such as refrigerators, hobs, ovens, electric pressure cookers, etc. This way we can use the distribution network and their representatives worldwide to install and service the robotic kitchen to as many regions and countries as possible.

This is why we need your help and our gratitude to you will be in the form of promissory share notes for the brand new company that will be established by the day this company ends with 20 million total shares of one USD each at a discounted price, of which a great part will be offered to contributors in perks of various values. In addition, each contribution over $1000  will carry a 10% discount on the ex-factory price of each robotic kitchen the contributor may want to purchase when the product is out on the market. Just bring to your mind those lucky fellow that believed in other unique ideas of success giants like Apple, Google and Microsoft and the smile on their faces when one day they found they were suddenly rich!

We are targeting high for the reasons already explained, and it is very reasonable for one to ask: what if you fell short in funding. What happens with the funds you already got? We hope we will not have to, but if we do we go to plan-B: set up production to the scale our own funds and contributor funds allow and seek for industrial investors or a sort of franchising. We did file for patents which are now pending and we are protected even if they are not issued yet. However the best way to make sure you stay way ahead and that any possible future competition will have hard time to reach you is to come out strong and fast. If you fail to do that and there is hot demand for your product then you are infected with overtrading and you become an easy prey for future competition which steps in to fill the gap.

Look what happened with electric pressure cookers. Not to mention names or brands, but famous electric  pressure cooker fell short in supplying their product to several continents for months while hot in demand and dozens of new brands  found the chance to emerge, some even probably better and cheaper!

Is walking with us a gamble? We are absolutely confident it is not! Especially if you consider what a life changer Prometheus Kitchen is destined to become for scores of households all over the world!

Your help to our goal is valuable in any form. Even spreading the word around to friends and people you know, or passing on links to this campaign page, the robotic kitchen's website, to our facebook page and you tube channel would be an enormous help and would make us feel forever grateful.

We are a design company from Romania called Renderistic. The team is made of a product designer, interior designer, architect and a 3D artist. You can find out more about us on our website  www.renderistic.com
A small plastic factory, Highplast came and asked us how to improve the shoes organizer from the market to save even more space in homes. Their website: www.highplast.ro/en

The brief was clear and simple, to help people declutter, organize their shoes and keep them clean. After a quick research we found out that the existing products on the market right now are very basic, without too many features to accommodate higher footwear, stacking or hanging.
After months of research, brainstorming and improvements we came with a concept that is saving more than 80% of space. The concept was 3D printed and tested in real life.
1 - Can be stacked on top of each other for as tall as you want
2 - Can be hooked on a nail in the wall, so just a single nail can hold more pairs of shoes!
3 - Fits even the highest shoes, like mountain boots and heels!
The best part? You don't need to buy a shoe cabinet for them!
No extra money spent, no extra space needed.
No other product has these advantages right now!
The space or design of your lobby are not relevant since ShoeSpace is available in many colors!
sport areas, schools or any places where people need to take off their shoes.
At this moment the concept is finished. We printed more than 40 3D pieces to test them in different environments and with many types of shoes.

The next step is to order the injection mold for mass production, which is quite costly. It is made of steel that has the mold of the product inside, in which the melted plastic is injected with high pressure.
Why are we confident in this idea?

In the last few years, the market for home accessories promising space saving started to grow. Nowadays, you can find shoes supports everywhere, both online and offline, even in local supermarkets. People need this kind of products because the spaces are getting crowded and houses all around the world.
We like the idea of helping people to have their homes more organized, but we want to do this in the best possible way.
There is no big challenge to this moment. The injection mold takes two months to be made and right away we can deliver your orders.
The second challenge after the money can be the shipping. We are discussing with several good companies to accommodate this. We will be in touch with you for every step of the process.
For the product idea with all the futures of it, we have
Please share it to the world and help the campaign to grow bigger and bigger.

column2: >  Why the idea to build the most advanced Alarm Clock ?

>The idea came to us two years ago when with friends having a general conversation and alarm clocks became the main subject.We discussed how we liked to wake up , and go to sleep , down falls and health risks of other devices  and agreed that there is no perfect alarm clock to suit everyone.

column1: Alarm clocks may seem like a thing of the past , people who use cell phones to wake up are missing out on a great luxury plus could be a health risk.
Downfalls of other alarm clocks and devices
Starting with the fear that if the battery from the smartphone has no charge then no alarm is triggered.
With the traditional alarm clock, the power can fail, the wake-up sound is terrible, the LCD display is too bright, there is only one wake-up time setting  and functions are often complicated,
The rays of smartphones can be unhealthy and if a smartphone is defective it will not function correctly.
There was so many reasons to decide to start this project and to add what was needed to fit specific needs.

Why did we spell Pharao the way we did , to go back to the original spelling. English at first spelt it ""Pharao"", but the King James Bible revived ""Pharaoh"" with ""h"" from the Hebrew.The word Pharaoh has many meanings all being of the highest,greatest, up to King and the Pharao is all of these. The king of all Alarm Clocks in Hi - Tec and Design.
• Resistive  full colour touchscreen / Retractable stylus Pen
• Fully Operational with no Internet connection
• 15 languages (English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese, Polish, Dutch, Swedish, Turkish, Russian, Arabic, Chinese, Korean)

column2: >A 3D printer was used to create our Pharao prototype in three-dimensional.
>This process is layers of material  which are formed under computer control to create an object.
>Hydrographics water transfer , also known as immersion printing, is a method of applying printed designs to three-dimensional surfaces.This technical process makes each Pharao very unique.

column1: Simply press the flag symbol for your choice and the whole menu will appear in your required language.
English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese, Polish, Dutch, Swedish, Turkish, Russian, Arabic, Chinese, Korean.

Beautifully Designed. The exterior is made of a special Hydrographic process — a technology also called Water transfer — which makes it possible to print the Pharao in five distinctive three-dimensional design that would compliment any room in your home.
No need to reset when moving rooms
as the LiPo battery has an  intelligent special charging system which enables  uninterruptible Power Supply which holds all stored information.
PHARAO IS NOT JUST AN ALARM CLOCK TO WAKE YOU UP
With a choice of meditive videos and sound you can be sure to relax and enjoy a perfect night´s sleep.
Enjoy and relax to mesmerising Ocean themes and sounds
Stress relief sounds and breathetaking worldwide scenery videos
Ease and clear your mind with beautiful sounds and ocean views
WAKING UP AS NEVER BEEN SO EXCITING.
One of the highlights of the Pharao is the choice of 30 alarm tones
column2: whether it is the sound of ocean waves, exotic birds, or the sound of a dragster.

column1: Let us show you just how user friendly and easy it is to set up Alarm time.
DO YOU AND YOUR PARTNER NEED MORE THAN ONE ALARM SETTING ?
No problem Pharao can programme up to 14 wake-up settings to suit you and your partner’s needs , or to suit your busy scheduel with numerous wake up times needed.
With Pharaos inbuilt Hi-Fi sound amplier you are sure to wake up prompt and on time.
With just a swipe across the top of Pharao snooze time is deactivated.
Specially adapted for those who enjoy waking slowly and at ease.
Snooze times can be set for up to an hour.
Just one touch will activate and dim the light for a perfect ambience.
With the next alarm the  brightness will automatically return to normal.
Rest assured - Pharao is free of any radiation concerns so you can enjoy a healthy nights sleep.
Doctors advise not to have cell phones on your night stand?
Studies from the Technion University in Haifa even suggest that keeping your cell-phone at arms-length can drastically reduce the quality of sperm.
Pharao was put to test and given to selected friends and
The results or better should we say  the feedback through our testers experiences

column2: >Feedback of  people who tested PHARAO in 10 Days
>I've never been so gently awakened, just what I need to start a new day.
>As a  Pilot, I have to rely 100% on my alarm, with the intelligent charging system, I will also wake up if there is a long power failure, awesome.
>It is really fun to browse through the menu and choose an exciting wake-up tone, the quality of the loudspeaker is really great.
>An alarm clock with as many extras as Relaxing videos to fall asleep and a display with a dimmer function, you have thought of everything.

>There are really many details that make the Pharao unique, you can see everything in your language and the weekday is written out in full ,  the way the 3D laser crystal lights up when the alarm starts, very impressive.
>Unfortunately we only got 1 day with the Pharao, for the remaining 9 days my children throughly tested it,  they were so enthusiastic about all functions and loved playing the games.
>All my life I had a boring alarm clock, black and red big digits. With the Water tranfer print design and the full color display, the Pharao looks extremely luxurious and fits into my bedroom.
>We have to have two Alarm clocks as we worked different shifts , the Pharao is amazing , you can set up to 14 alarms on it.

column1: First stages of the Pharao project in our office 2014

column2: >Can I use the Pharao in any Country?
>Yes. Just let us know in which country you reside while ordering, and the Pharao will be delivered with the appropriate adapter.
>Software, development and design comes from Germany. The technical components are produced in the US and UK (Adafruit, Rasperry Foundation) and final assembly is done in Spain.
>Should I be concerned about radiation similar to my cell phone, where Doctors advise not to have them on your night stand?
>No. There is absolutely no health concern. Studies from the Technion University in Haifa even suggest that keeping your cell-phone at arms-length can drastically reduce the quality of sperm.
>Is the display not too bright when I am trying to sleep?
>With a single touch to the display you can set the display to Sleep, which will dim the display until the next alarm.
>Is the Pharao available in different colours ?
>The 5 unique designs are hand-crafted through an intricate process called water transfer printing. This is the only way for Pharao to maintain its’ one-of-a-kind Design.
>What is the purpose of the hologram on the top-side?
>Every Pharao has a unique 3D holographic serial number, which is integrated in every original pharaotec product. Additionally, every owner can register his serial number on our website.
>You can select between the 12-hour and 24-hour clock.
>The Pharao will continue functioning for several hours using the extra strong built-in 3000mAh Battery.
>My home power experiences voltage peaks above 230V?
>No Problem. Thanks to our intelligent uninterruptable power supply, the Pharao alarm clock compensates these peaks and continues normal operation
>You can accurately synchronize the time over an active internet connection. You can set the time manually, should no internet connection be available.
>In the current version (v2.4.0) 15 langauges are available (English, German, Spanish, Italian, French, Dutch, Polish, Swedish, Turkish, Portuguese, Russian, Korean, Japanese, Chinese and Arabic).
>Can I wake up to my own music?
>You can connect your smartphone via bluetooth and stream your favourite music directly to the Pharao. Can I set two alarms? You can even set 14 different alarms.

• 15 languages (English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese, Polish, Dutch, Swedish, Turkish, Russian, Arabic, Chinese, Korean)
A 3D printer was used to create our Pharao prototype in three-dimensional.
This process is layers of material  which are formed under computer control to create an object.
Hydrographics water transfer , also known as immersion printing, is a method of applying printed designs to three-dimensional surfaces.This technical process makes each Pharao very unique.
Simply press the flag symbol for your choice and the whole menu will appear in your required language.
English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese, Polish, Dutch, Swedish, Turkish, Russian, Arabic, Chinese, Korean.

Beautifully Designed. The exterior is made of a special Hydrographic process — a technology also called Water transfer — which makes it possible to print the Pharao in five distinctive three-dimensional design that would compliment any room in your home.
No need to reset when moving rooms
as the LiPo battery has an  intelligent special charging system which enables  uninterruptible Power Supply which holds all stored information.
CHOOSE ONE OF OUR 5 UNIQUE DESIGN
PHARAO IS NOT JUST AN ALARM CLOCK TO WAKE YOU UP
With a choice of meditive videos and sound you can be sure to relax and enjoy a perfect night´s sleep.
Enjoy and relax to mesmerising Ocean themes and sounds
Stress relief sounds and breathetaking worldwide scenery videos
Ease and clear your mind with beautiful sounds and ocean views
WAKING UP AS NEVER BEEN SO EXCITING.
One of the highlights of the Pharao is the choice of 30 alarm tones
column2: whether it is the sound of ocean waves, exotic birds, or the sound of a dragster.

column1: Let us show you just how user friendly and easy it is to set up Alarm time.
DO YOU AND YOUR PARTNER NEED MORE THAN ONE ALARM SETTING ?
No problem Pharao can programme up to 14 wake-up settings to suit you and your partner’s needs , or to suit your busy scheduel with numerous wake up times needed.
With Pharaos inbuilt Hi-Fi sound amplier you are sure to wake up prompt and on time.
With just a swipe across the top of Pharao snooze time is deactivated.
Specially adapted for those who enjoy waking slowly and at ease.
Snooze times can be set for up to an hour.
Just one touch will activate and dim the light for a perfect ambience.
With the next alarm the  brightness will automatically return to normal.
Rest assured - Pharao is free of any radiation concerns so you can enjoy a healthy nights sleep.
Doctors advise not to have cell phones on your night stand?
Studies from the Technion University in Haifa even suggest that keeping your cell-phone at arms-length can drastically reduce the quality of sperm.
Pharao was put to test and given to selected friends and
supporters in more than various countries.
The results or better should we say  the feedback through our testers experiences
Feedback of  people who tested PHARAO in 10 Days
I've never been so gently awakened, just what I need to start a new day.
As a  Pilot, I have to rely 100% on my alarm, with the intelligent charging system, I will also wake up if there is a long power failure, awesome.
It is really fun to browse through the menu and choose an exciting wake-up tone, the quality of the loudspeaker is really great.
An alarm clock with as many extras as Relaxing videos to fall asleep and a display with a dimmer function, you have thought of everything.

There are really many details that make the Pharao unique, you can see everything in your language and the weekday is written out in full ,  the way the 3D laser crystal lights up when the alarm starts, very impressive.
Unfortunately we only got 1 day with the Pharao, for the remaining 9 days my children throughly tested it,  they were so enthusiastic about all functions and loved playing the games.
All my life I had a boring alarm clock, black and red big digits. With the Water tranfer print design and the full color display, the Pharao looks extremely luxurious and fits into my bedroom.
We have to have two Alarm clocks as we worked different shifts , the Pharao is amazing , you can set up to 14 alarms on it.
First stages of the Pharao project in our office 2014
Can I use the Pharao in any Country?
Yes. Just let us know in which country you reside while ordering, and the Pharao will be delivered with the appropriate adapter.
Software, development and design comes from Germany. The technical components are produced in the US and UK (Adafruit, Rasperry Foundation) and final assembly is done in Spain.
Should I be concerned about radiation similar to my cell phone, where Doctors advise not to have them on your night stand?
No. There is absolutely no health concern. Studies from the Technion University in Haifa even suggest that keeping your cell-phone at arms-length can drastically reduce the quality of sperm.
Is the display not too bright when I am trying to sleep?
With a single touch to the display you can set the display to Sleep, which will dim the display until the next alarm.
Is the Pharao available in different colours ?
The 5 unique designs are hand-crafted through an intricate process called water transfer printing. This is the only way for Pharao to maintain its’ one-of-a-kind Design.
What is the purpose of the hologram on the top-side?
Every Pharao has a unique 3D holographic serial number, which is integrated in every original pharaotec product. Additionally, every owner can register his serial number on our website.
Will there be a 12-hour (am/pm) time display?
You can select between the 12-hour and 24-hour clock.
The Pharao will continue functioning for several hours using the extra strong built-in 3000mAh Battery.
My home power experiences voltage peaks above 230V?
No Problem. Thanks to our intelligent uninterruptable power supply, the Pharao alarm clock compensates these peaks and continues normal operation
You can accurately synchronize the time over an active internet connection. You can set the time manually, should no internet connection be available.
In the current version (v2.4.0) 15 langauges are available (English, German, Spanish, Italian, French, Dutch, Polish, Swedish, Turkish, Portuguese, Russian, Korean, Japanese, Chinese and Arabic).
Can I wake up to my own music?
You can connect your smartphone via bluetooth and stream your favourite music directly to the Pharao. Can I set two alarms? You can even set 14 different alarms.

Multiple problems presented by traditional outlets, plugs and cords:
column2: >-   They’re so ugly!   We’re tired of looking at that unsightly mess of tangled black cords clashing with white walls.​
column3: >-   They’re just too big!  Enough already with plugs and cords that block furniture and  create gaps that prevent us from pushing furniture flush against the wall.
column4: >-   They can create serious fire hazards!  Wedged against furniture, the pinched, pierced, bent or otherwise damaged plugs and cords can create serious fire hazards.
column5:
>-   They’re a danger to curious toddlers and little loved ones!  Current overpriced child proofing devices fall far short of the protection you desire, until now.

Benefits of the Socket Wizard:
column6: >-   A clear upgrade to your home décor and aesthetics around the electrical outlet, combining both function and style for the modern home.
column8: >-   The ultra-thin plug is literally as thin as a pencil on top of an outlet and now you can push furniture flush against the wall.
column10: >-   The sleek design completely conceals outlets and plugs as well as reduce potential hazards associated with traditional cramped plugs and cords.
column12: >-   The Socket Wizard with Enhanced Protection, it includes superior child proofing features that address the risk of curious little loved ones and pets from chewing exposed cords.  Comes with 6 long high strength adhesive cord clips to conceal the cord.
column14:
>

 

The Socket Wizard with 5 port USB charger an quick charge technology for your tablets and smart phones and detachable stand!

The 5 port USB charge includes 8A total and maximum of 2.4A for a single USB port for fast charging (typical smart phone charges provide only 1A per USB port).  This 5 port USB charger also includes auto identification to intelligently detect and maximize charging requirements for universal compatibility.

   

Options to select at no additional cost at checkout:

 Every Socket Wizard is either a ""Standard size"" or ""Oversize"" that can be selected at purchase. There is no difference in cost between these two sizes.  Here are differences in uses:

The ""STANDARD"" Socket Wizard is compatible with the following outlet and outlet cover types:

column1: Round socket receptacles, having a single center screw.

Standard size outlet cover measuring  2 3/4 inches wide x 4 1/2 inches long.

The ""OVERSIZE"" Socket Wizard - same as the ""Standard"" Socket Wizard PLUS compatible with
Mid-size outlet cover measuring 3 1/8 inches wide x 4 7/8 inches long.

Oversize outlet cover measuring 3 3/8 inches wide x 5 1/16 inches long.

Technical specifications of the Socket Wizard with 3 outlet power strip:
column4: and maximum watts is 1625 (13A, 125V, 1625W).  SPT-2 cord thickness
column6:
3 core wire.

Safety Specifications:

The Socket Wizard products have been designed to conform to UL safety standards, including UL Standard 817 (Safety Cord Sets and Power-Supply Cords) and UL Standard 94 (Standard for Tests for Flammability of Plastic Materials for Parts in Devices and Appliances).  Before use, read the Socket Wizard packaging documentation and both sides of the label and follow all safety precautions.

Returns
column7:
30-day money back guarantee 

We truly want all of our backers to be happy with the Socket Wizard products.  As such, we offer a 30-day money back guarantee on all products. If you would like to return an item, please contact us to request a return authorization form and instructions on how to send the item(s) back. Shipping charges are not refundable.

Shipping date and countries we ship to:

We expect to start shipping as soon as possible in September 2017.  We ship to anywhere in the U.S. and Canada.

Why we are launching on Indiegogo:

We require additional capital to purchase the remaining amount of inventory we need to get the Socket Wizard products to the market.  This process has been more expensive that we had expected.  Almost 2 years from the idea stage to the present and it has been quite a journey.  From our family to yours:  thank you for your support.   

Patents:

The devices are protected by three issued U.S. patents (nos. 9,509,080
column10:
international patent applications pending, including Canada.

Invaluable Socket Wizard contributors:

Design engineer:  http://www.conceptseng.com

3D Animation:  http://www.KaleidoSKY.com

Legal representation:  http://www.tripplawfirm.com/

 

In appreciation,

The Socket Wizard team

support@socketwizard.com

column2: >We all know that owning a car (unless it is electric) means we are personally damaging the environment. Fuel emissions are a major contributor to climate change but electric vehicles are not an option for the majority of society at this point (cost, limited driving range etc). Reducing emissions isn’t the only way you can reduce your carbon footprint as a car owner. At Auto-Max we have developed an innovative eco-friendly solution for car care...
>Meet the all new water soluble refill Eco-Capsules.

>The core concept behind our cleaning solutions is that we have created concentrates that do not contain water. Your conventional cleaning solution consists of up to 95% water, making it bulky and requiring storage in plastic containers. Taking the water out of the equation provides a much more convenient and eco-friendly solution in the form of super concentrates contained in water soluble capsules. Not only does this mean you are reducing the amount of plastic you use and have to dispose of, our products will also reduce the volume of delivery trucks required to get our product to market.

>Once our capsules come into contact with water they will start dissolving. This means if you are using the car screen wash capsules all you need to do is pop one into your car screen wash reservoir and add some water. The concentrate is held in a soluble film which will also dissolve completely.

column1: • Suitable for use at any temperature above zero
• Removes dirt, grease, traffic film and insect deposits easily from your car windscreen

column2: >
>One 5ml ECO CAPSULE per 2 L of water

>Drop one eco capsule (DO NOT TEAR OR CUT) per 2 L of water into the car screen wash tank and fill with the appropriate amount of water. Close the tank and allow the eco capsule to dissolve. The capsules will dissolve in just a couple of minute after which the screen wash solution is ready to use.
>The products are fully soluble and stable regardless of the hardness of water.
>""Just add water, wash and drive off!”

column1: • Suitable for use on all types of metal, paint and colours
• Breaks down dirt and road grime without the need for harsh chemicals
• Dries quickly giving a nice gloss to the bodywork of the car
• Suitable for cars, motorbikes, caravans, and boats

column2: >
>One 9ml ECO CAPSULE per 8 L of water
> Drop one eco capsule (DO NOT TEAR OR CUT) into a bucket then fill the bucket with water and allow the eco capsule to dissolve. After a few minutes the car wash shampoo solution is ready to use.
>The products are fully soluble and stable regardless of the hardness of water.
>We operate out of our our own laboratory, based in Scotland. We are a small team of talented and creative chemists with a passion for developing new world changing products.
>We have already completed the development, testing, of the windscreen solution, washing and waxing capsules. These products are now ready for mass production.

column3: D team is continuing its work on developing new car care products using water soluble eco-capsule. Some of the products they are currently working on include:

column2: >Car Wash Tunnels are already a very large market across Europe. We are developing chemicals in capsule form for to make the washing and treating of cars in this market much more environmentally friendly as well as saving in costs for tunnel operators and tunnel users. Our goal here is to achieve 5% of this market`s share with our new concept.

column1: • Formulations for Car Interrior Cleaner (Upholstery and Seats).

column2: >Our simple idea could have a huge impact on the world. We are currently a self-funded start-up and to truly revolutionise the cleaning sector we need your help!

>By supporting our campaign you will be assisting us to get the products we have ready to market. We require a custom made capsule filling machine for this to happen. Since the concept of eco-capsules is quite a novel one, such machines are not readily available and need to be custom -made to meet our specific requirements. This will allow us to become less dependent on 3rd parties for parts of the production process and will enable us to keep our costs down and maintain our competitiveness in a highly competitive market for car care products.
>You can support us by pledging and sharing our campaign on social media.
>Purchase any (or multiple) of this packages and we will ship it to you right after the campaign has ended.

column1: ","We all know that owning a car (unless it is electric) means we are personally damaging the environment. Fuel emissions are a major contributor to climate change but electric vehicles are not an option for the majority of society at this point (cost, limited driving range etc). Reducing emissions isn’t the only way you can reduce your carbon footprint as a car owner. At Auto-Max we have developed an innovative eco-friendly solution for car care...
Meet the all new water soluble refill Eco-Capsules.

The core concept behind our cleaning solutions is that we have created concentrates that do not contain water. Your conventional cleaning solution consists of up to 95% water, making it bulky and requiring storage in plastic containers. Taking the water out of the equation provides a much more convenient and eco-friendly solution in the form of super concentrates contained in water soluble capsules. Not only does this mean you are reducing the amount of plastic you use and have to dispose of, our products will also reduce the volume of delivery trucks required to get our product to market.

Once our capsules come into contact with water they will start dissolving. This means if you are using the car screen wash capsules all you need to do is pop one into your car screen wash reservoir and add some water. The concentrate is held in a soluble film which will also dissolve completely.
Just add water and drive off!""
Suitable for use at any temperature above zero
Removes dirt, grease, traffic film and insect deposits easily from your car windscreen
One 5ml ECO CAPSULE per 2 L of water

Drop one eco capsule (DO NOT TEAR OR CUT) per 2 L of water into the car screen wash tank and fill with the appropriate amount of water. Close the tank and allow the eco capsule to dissolve. The capsules will dissolve in just a couple of minute after which the screen wash solution is ready to use.
The products are fully soluble and stable regardless of the hardness of water.
Just add water, wash and drive off!”
Suitable for use on all types of metal, paint and colours
Breaks down dirt and road grime without the need for harsh chemicals
Dries quickly giving a nice gloss to the bodywork of the car
Leaves a glossy water repellent finish
Suitable for cars, motorbikes, caravans, and boats
One 9ml ECO CAPSULE per 8 L of water
Drop one eco capsule (DO NOT TEAR OR CUT) into a bucket then fill the bucket with water and allow the eco capsule to dissolve. After a few minutes the car wash shampoo solution is ready to use.
The products are fully soluble and stable regardless of the hardness of water.
We operate out of our our own laboratory, based in Scotland. We are a small team of talented and creative chemists with a passion for developing new world changing products.
We have already completed the development, testing, of the windscreen solution, washing and waxing capsules. These products are now ready for mass production.
Our R&D team is continuing its work on developing new car care products using water soluble eco-capsule. Some of the products they are currently working on include:

Car Wash Tunnels are already a very large market across Europe. We are developing chemicals in capsule form for to make the washing and treating of cars in this market much more environmentally friendly as well as saving in costs for tunnel operators and tunnel users. Our goal here is to achieve 5% of this market`s share with our new concept.
Formulations for Car Interrior Cleaner (Upholstery and Seats).
Our simple idea could have a huge impact on the world. We are currently a self-funded start-up and to truly revolutionise the cleaning sector we need your help!

By supporting our campaign you will be assisting us to get the products we have ready to market. We require a custom made capsule filling machine for this to happen. Since the concept of eco-capsules is quite a novel one, such machines are not readily available and need to be custom -made to meet our specific requirements. This will allow us to become less dependent on 3rd parties for parts of the production process and will enable us to keep our costs down and maintain our competitiveness in a highly competitive market for car care products.
You can support us by pledging and sharing our campaign on social media.
Purchase any (or multiple) of this packages and we will ship it to you right after the campaign has ended.
All your support is highly appreciated!",8.0,1,"1 Campaign

column3: >Cool Runnings is an iOS and Android mobile app that will connect homeowners with top-quality pre-screened technicians that specialize in their various trade (Starting with HVAC services with this initial launch). Cool Runnings will provide its users instantly with the best, safest, and most affordable professionals, at the touch of their fingertips. Cool Runnings comes with complete with a seamless booking process, simple and sleek interface, and  100% customer satisfaction guaranteed. Cool Runnings aims to eventually streamline every contracting service for customers and technicians.

column1: We are asking for $60,000, which is the cost of this initial launch of Cool Runnings. We believe in the idea, which is why we have already started on this journey. The $60,000 will allow us to recover what we have spent so far, and be able to go beyond the current launch of Cool Runnings to something more. The initial launch as described before will only be fully usable from an HVAC Technicians perspective. We hope to go beyond this capability to Electricians, Plumbers, Appliance Repair, Refrigeration, Insulation, Cabinetry, General Contractors, and so very much more. Again we are now entering Alpha Stages of the App which will begin to develop the functionality of the app. We believe in full visibility, so we will periodically update and reward based on the following:

column2: >Without being overly presumptuous on what kind of interest we may spark here, we know where we want to expand as far as services. So, why not share with you where the money will go to? If we achieve this goal and  the expected cost of adding services, we have exciting plans to continue to grow. column1: We face many hurdles along the way
column2: however, BCIT Mechanical and our partners are ready to tackle each and everyone of those hurdles. There are a lot of ""lead"" generators out there. This is not that, nor do I want you to treat it as such. If anything, use it to document each piece of equipment respectively. This is to not only help you and the customer but to help the next technician that has to touch that same piece of equipment. Not every company is run the same, and not every technician or user has the same issues. But we will work with each of you to ensure a smooth working communication between technician to customer, and customer to technician. We want to hear your voice loud and clear as to what you believe would be a great addition and what will make your company thrive. Your success is our success!

Cool Runnings is an iOS and Android mobile app that will connect homeowners with top-quality pre-screened technicians that specialize in their various trade (Starting with HVAC services with this initial launch). Cool Runnings will provide its users instantly with the best, safest, and most affordable professionals, at the touch of their fingertips. Cool Runnings comes with complete with a seamless booking process, simple and sleek interface, and  100% customer satisfaction guaranteed. Cool Runnings aims to eventually streamline every contracting service for customers and technicians.
• User-friendly inquiry form for customers to request for a technician
• Option to rate the quality of service
• Option to accept / reject the task
• Option to view customer reviews and ratings
And so very, very much more
TONS of Features after initial launch to vote on what is next. Join our Exclusive List to do so. Just donate $15-$25 or more to reserve your spot.

(Will Periodically add more to this list as Beta Stages draw near, and we have a better Idea on when we can add these and much more. Giving you the power to vote on what comes first!)
What We Need & What You Get:

We are asking for $60,000, which is the cost of this initial launch of Cool Runnings. We believe in the idea, which is why we have already started on this journey. The $60,000 will allow us to recover what we have spent so far, and be able to go beyond the current launch of Cool Runnings to something more. The initial launch as described before will only be fully usable from an HVAC Technicians perspective. We hope to go beyond this capability to Electricians, Plumbers, Appliance Repair, Refrigeration, Insulation, Cabinetry, General Contractors, and so very much more. Again we are now entering Alpha Stages of the App which will begin to develop the functionality of the app. We believe in full visibility, so we will periodically update and reward based on the following:
Technical Specifications of Initial Launch and Support:
The application will develop with the following:
Screen Size (iPhone 5s, 6, 6 plus, 7, 7 plus & 8 as well as X)• The app will work and support API Level 11 and above i.e. Android version Jellybean and above

If we achieve this goal and  the expected cost of adding services, we have exciting plans to continue to grow. We have the graphics in place so it will be much easier adding on additional services and industries. Alas, the programming is always where we fall short and the bulk of our expenses. We are asking you, how far you want this to go. Whether it takes us many years on our own or less than one, we ask for your support.

TechTrack The first IoT security device that keeps track of when your property is being tampered with. Developed originally for the protection of expensive saddles and tack rooms in the equestrian world, TechTrack™ texts the owner as soon as your property is moved.

Help us raise manufacturing funds to make the first 1000 TechTrack™ devices.....
column3: >

column2:
>

The beauty of TechTrack is that its innovative and groundbreaking technology is simple to use...
column4:
>

The benefits of this technology are endless. 

If you have expensive property that you need to protect and track should it be stolen, then TechTrack™ is the answer.
column8: >BE PART OF OUR JOURNEY
column9:
>

Iota-Tech is an innovative tech company based in Herefordshire and California. Our passion is in designing, developing and manufacturing security devices in the ‘IoT’ (Internet of Things). We are creators, inventors and problem solvers and to this end, we are very proud of, and excited by, our latest product, TECHTRACK™. 

The Iota-Tech team consists, at its core, husband and wife team, Ian and Denise Cullimore, who are responsible for the concept and technology of TECHTRACK™. 

The Cullimore family have a long history with the equestrian community in the UK, and TECHTRACK™ was initially designed originally to secure tack. 

However, market research within the UK rural community highlighted the need for a dynamic mobile security device that could be used across the sectors to include quad bikes, farm machinery, caravans, tool sheds, boats, motorbikes, bicycles and so on….

The scope for this is incredible device is endless and we are very proud of its innovative technology, which we know is unrivalled. Now you can be part of our Indiegogo journey…
column10: >
column13: >DON'T FORGET TO CLICK ON THE PERK YOU WANT, TO BUY THE UNIT!
column16: >WHAT WILL THE MONEY RAISED

column1: We can't go in to production without you.

We have invested huge sums so far in developing the technology and getting the first prototypes through production and user tested. The success of this stage of the process has led us to this point and we are ready to go in to production. To make the jump to manufacturing our TechTrack device in large numbers, we really need you. The money raised via our Indiegogo campaign will bring the first 1000 units into production, seeing the official launch of TechTrack into the security market.
We are committed to ensuring that your investment will see delivery of the TechTrack units by the end of January 2018.

All the financial, support and contribution you show us, will go into delivering you a TechTrack device that will protect the expensive property you want to keep safe. You will be the first people to have The TechTrack device in your hands.

In simple terms, as soon as the TechTrack device is moved, even slightly, it will activate and establish an Internet connection with Iota-Tech’s Cloud servers, which will then send a text to your chosen mobile number to tell you that a disturbance has been detected. You can also choose to have alerts sent to our Android and iPhone apps, and even your social media platforms.

No. You still need to use your normal method of locking your tack room or, for example, your bicycle. TechTrack gives you warning that someone is tampering with your item or premises but does not lock them.
How is it different from other similar sounding devices?
Most other movement detectors need Wi-Fi to work so are not suitable for rural locations or for use on items that may be used in different places. Many also need to be wired into an electric supply.

As long as you can secure the TechTrack to your chosen item you can use it anywhere where there is any mobile signal. Iota-Tech uses a special multi-carrier SIM which means you are extremely likely to have a good signal, even in remote areas, as the SIM will connect to any available carrier.
Can I use it to protect anything?
Yes! Although the GPS version does need to be securely fixed to your item or it could be removed, and therefore can’t track it for you.
How do I fix it to a door?
You can hang TechTrack on a simple hook, or fix it with Velcro to the back of a door. As soon as anyone even tries the door the movement will cause the TechTrack to text you.
How do I fix it to a saddle?

The best method we have found so far is to fix it via a combination lock to one of the D-rings. This means any thief cannot simply take it off and disable the GPS. We are currently in talks with several saddle makers regarding inserting the GPS part into saddles at the point of manufacture.
Can I use one TechTrack for different items?
On what items can I use TechTrack?

You can use it on tack room doors, locker doors on your lorry, sheds, garages, store rooms or your room door if you are a student in halls for example. Moveable items such as saddles, quads, bicycles, motorbikes, classic cars, tractors, ride on mowers, trailers etc can all be protected by TechTrack as long as the device is securely attached to the item by, for example, your normal padlock.
If I have more than one TechTrack, how will I know which one is alerting me?
When you register your device online you will have the opportunity to ‘name’ it eg “Polly’s saddle”, so when the text alert arrives it will say it’s from Polly’s saddle.
Do I need a specific mobile service provider?
No. TechTrack comes with a non-removable multi SIM which will automatically use the strongest mobile signal provider available.
What if the mobile signal is variable or weak?
The SIM card can switch from one provider to another if the signals are problematic.
How does the alert message get to me?

The TechTrack device connects to Iota-Tech’s Cloud servers via in Internet connection. Our servers can then text your mobile phone, message you using our Android and iPhone apps, or even connect to you via Social Media channels.
How do I set up TechTrack to text my number?
You can do this on your personal page on our website when you register your TechTrack. You can have up to three numbers notified.
What if I change my mobile phone number?
Just log in and change the number.
What if the best mobile signal in my locality is out of action?
The multi SIM will find the next best signal available.
What if there is no mobile signal at the site I want to protect?

If you wish to check the coverage for the location where you will be using TechTrack, here are the links to do this. Remember the multi SIM in the TechTrack will use the strongest signal available from ANY provider.  This has nothing to do with the provider for your mobile phone. Our multi-carrier SIM is extremely likely to be able to find a signal, better than normal mobile phones which are attached to one service provider only. We can provide you with information on Quality and Strength Of Signal at your location. TechTrack requires only a 2G connection, not 3G or 4G, so it is highly likely to be able to establish this.
TechTrack can contact you wherever you are in the world where there is a mobile phone signal. We recently moved an item in the UK and the message was received in California!
What if there is a power cut?

The TechTrack does not need mains electricity to work so a power cut is not a problem. It is battery operated with a large rechargeable battery which lasts a long time. It also uses advanced low power management techniques in software and hardware to extend the battery life.
What if I accidently set it off?
Unlike house alarms the TechTrack will not cause a loud noise disturbance or text anyone else other than you, unless you wish up to two other people to be notified too.
Typically several weeks, depending on how often the device is set off.
How will I know if the battery needs charging?
The servers at Iota-Tech monitor the TechTrack device and check on things like battery levels. They will text you to let you know if the battery is running low.

You just need to plug it in just as you would your mobile phone, using the suppled USB cable which is compatible with many mobile phones on the market. It will charge in the cigarette lighter of a car too, with a standard USB charging adapter.
How do I know if it’s working?

When you come to move something that you have protected with your TechTrack device it will naturally be set off, and will text you. This is deliberate so that you know it is working. Of course if someone is trying to steal your property you will also be alerted. You will be periodically texted to say that no activity has been detected, and that all is well with the device, or that it needs charging. There is also a blinking LED to let you know it is alive and armed.
How do I set it to work?

There is a small button you press to turn it on. You (or a thief!) cannot turn it off until it has been activated and alerted you. You can leave it turned on all the time if you wish. If you do want to turn it off, just hold the button down for five seconds.
Can I be alerted I another way other than text?
Yes, you can download our iPhone and Android apps, and on your user area of our website you can also select various Social Media platforms on which to be notified should you wish.
The TechTrack device has sophisticated anti-jamming detection technology and will do all it can to circumvent any jamming.
Iota-Tech is working with the Police to see if this would be a viable option.
Do all the TechTracks in an area communicate with each other?

They don’t talk to each other but our server software can detect if a number of TechTracks have been disturbed in a particular area and then all devices in that locality can be texted to say it has seen unusual activity and to take care.
What do I get for the £5.99/$7.99 monthly charge?
Just like your mobile phone you have to pay for data which covers all the texting (alerts and telling you it’s working), the battery monitoring and reminders.
