My husband and I went looking for a project we could do together. Never in our wildest dreams did we envision that we would own not just one heritage church but two of them on the same property. Having said that, it is something of a passion project to renovate and convert two fallen-down buildings into a home we can be proud to call our own.

We are newly married, and starting from scratch all over again. Being that we are in our 40's, it does seem a bit daunting to take on two buildings that originate from 1883 and 1914. But one thing we do well as a team, is to have big dreams and work really hard to make them come true.

Adam is an Architect with a heart-of-gold, and has a passion for heritage buildings. Lin is a Historical Romance Author, and loves the idea she is helping to save a piece of local history as well as doing something very unique.
This campaign is about helping the Aussie couple to restore these vacant buildings, to keep them from deteriorating, and give them a chance to be alive with life again as a new loving home.

Without donations, we will lose an important part of Australian history of these two churches that sit in a little old mining town in Queensland.  As nobody was willing to take on such a mammoth and costly job as restoring the churches, without Lin and Adam's dedication, these buildings will fall into ruins.

We are after $10,000 to help us put on a new roof, restumping the churches, install a kitchen and bathroom, fix the deteriorating stain-glass windows, new septic system and plumbing, painting (everything needs repainting), new stairs for the back and repairs on the front porch as it is dangerous to use the steps right now.  Plus a multitude of other necessary restorations. We are putting in a lot of our own money but need help to get us started. It will take a lot more than $10k but we are in this for the long haul with a 6 year plan. We are putting in a lot of sweat equity as we are doing as much by ourselves as we can. Your money will only be going towards specialist contractors and restoration materials.
If we don't reach our fund goal
The funds we do get will go into painting the church as it costs a lot to paint 22 ft ceilings. Lin loves to paint and will be doing most of it herself along with the help of Adam, her husband.
You can watch our restoration journey as we vlog on our YouTube Channel here.
So you can see exactly where your donations go. Pretty cool eh?

We are renting at the moment and would like to move into our new ""church"" home before our lease runs out. This will save us money and we can put more into renovations. We have many challenges to overcome and have described them all in a YouTube video here. Note: This video also has cool history of the two churches.

Adam and Lin are used to big projects that expands expectations on a grand scale of passion and creativity. They aren't afraid of hard work. They aren't afraid of getting their hands dirty. Side by side, they will explore the ups-and-downs of creating a new home from two amazing heritage churches on one property.
So please donate to our campaign. Every little bit helps and is much apprecaited.

We understand if you can't contribute right now, but that doesn't mean you can't help. Please use the Indiegogo share tools and make some noise about our campaign. We appreciate all the help in spreading the word about our heritage churches restoration into a home.

I’m L, the founder of Ardor Bin Candle Co. My journey to clean living has been an amazing experience! After a major life shift to becoming a vegan and a stout advocate for healthy living, I began to observe other elements in my environment that were harmful to both myself and my family. Home fragrances create a warmth and stillness within the home and can alter the mood and “personality” of any space. Considering both health and wellness, Ardor Bin’s candles are made with all natural essential oils that produce relaxation and therapeutic qualities. I am a serious candle lover and quickly learned that traditional candles can be highly toxic, often releasing harmful chemicals into the air that may have severe long-term consequences on the body.

In keeping with my healthy living journey, I decided to create my own candles from scratch. After research and much trial and error, I created something special.  And I was honored to know that my friends and family members were fans as well. This knowledge inspired me to get involved with local farmer’s markets and soon, Ardor Bin was born. I have fallen in love with the true craftsmanship that is needed to produce a clean, healthier option to candle burning that does not lack in fragrance or scent quality. My main mission is to promote eco-friendliness and well-being through candle-making.

Clean burning and plant based, Ardor Bin candles are elegantly crafted and hand-poured with 100% all natural soy wax, premium essential oils and all natural wooden wicks that are ethically sourced from sustainable forests. Every aspect of Ardor Bin candles is formulated to be free of harmful toxins, phthalates, and GMOs. Our candle making process is truly artisan focused, natural and handmade with the environment and your health in mind.

I am asking for your help to expand Ardor Bin into traditional retail markets. Though much interest has been demonstrated, we want to ensure that we are prepared to meet an increasing demand for products without compromising the quality of our handmade production process. Proper funding would allow us to continue with plant-based product development and to scale up on retail collaborative efforts. My goal is to be a leader in the area of sustainability and to impact the world by changing the way that we source, package, and process consumer goods.

Ardor Bin started in a small workspace in my home and I feel strongly that it is time to progress and enhance our production systems to better serve our current customers. If you are not able to contribute a monetary gift,  Ardor Bin could definitely use your voice to help introduce our brand to a broader marketplace! Spread the word, share, talk about us and continue the conversation towards better, cleaner, and healthier living.

We spend a lot of time sleeping because it is the basis of our well-being. More than 70% of people have a specific thermal problem during sleep, that compromises the quality of rest. There are those who always have cold feet and a warm chest, or who have a cold chest and very warm legs and feet.
+ me is the answer to this problem

+ me is a very high quality joinable duvet modules with different levels of warmth retention  that can be combined and recombined at any time to meet your specific thermal needs and those of your partner.
By ensuring exactly the warmth you both want in every part of your body, + me improves the quality of your life, because sleeping well means living better!
Warmth custom-fit for you and your partner
<li>it maintains exactly the temperature you want, thanks to the different duvet's weight
• it retains heat evenly and thermoregulates, thanks to the composition of large squares of fine cotton padded with 100% goose down, each other isolated by stitching.
+me - the double duvet version - is composed of 6 modules that satisfy 3 levels of warmth, to easily reach your desired comfort in any part of the body (chest, legs, feet).

Our body is warmer than the bedroom. At night, we delegate the duvet to protect us and retain heat. There are complex systems to measure this property and since these are completely personal sensations and needs, we preferred to describe our products by creating a scale from 1 to 5, aware that it remains a suggestion, an indication, the result of our research and experience.
Level 1 (80 gr/m2) = light, to cover the hottest area of the body
Level 3 (130 gr/m2) = medium, to cover the body area with medium temperature
Level 5 (180 gr/m2) = heavy, to cover the cold parts of the body
Prior to +me the choice of the best duvet was extremely difficult because:
1. long discussion between you and your partner about the level of heat
2. assess the exact warmth needed in every part of your body
3. avoid heavy duvet to get enough warmth
4. one duvet could not match all seasons needs (autumn/winter/spring)
Today, with +me years of compromise come to the end.
1. you customize your +me duvet according to your and your partner needs
2. you exactly match the warmth you dream on chest, legs and feet
3. +me weighs less than 2 kg, due to the high quality of goose down
4. you can change the panels' combination whenever you want, whenever the season changes
5. you wash +me into the washing machine by splitting the panels.

Regulations: Class 1 European Standards EN 12934- 100% Natural Product. Dedust, washed and sterilized in compliance with Italian Presidential Decree 845 23/1/75 and D.M. 315 10/11/76. Contains non-textile parts of animal origin.
Warranty: 2 years
Composition: 3+3 panels with a dimension of 250x220 cm and 40 buttons
• heats in a differentiated way, thanks to the different weight of goose down

• retains heat evenly, thus carrying out its thermoregulatory action with great effectiveness, thanks to the particular composition of fixed squares with through stitching (large square of fine cotton padded, each other isolated by stitching).

The down is the most precious part of the goose plumage, a soft and light cluster, which ensures a perfect thermal insulation, keeps moisture under control and offers maximum comfort.  The down used for +me comes from geese raised for food purposes, in cold  countries such as Siberia, Canada, Greenland and North Eastern Europe (Hungary and Poland). These geese have a tick, soft and precious down that once arrived in Italy is subjected to washing, sterilization and finally deducted to be absolutely hypoallergenic, according to the highest standards and in compliance with national and European regulations and laws.

The plumage of the geese is not always white, sometimes darker but guarantees the same thermal properties. Our products are not subjected to chemical bleaching so we tolerate the presence of few darker flakes to preserve the quality of the raw materials and your health.

+me is made up fo large square of fine cotton. The square are isolated from each other through a seam to allow the padding to be distributed evenly, thus carrying out its thermoregulatory action with great effectiveness. The sheets are easily joined on the edges  and coupled by buttons.
Fabric of +me is made of cotton for three good reasons:

+me filling power is at least 750 Cuin. Higher Cuin, only possible with high quality goose down, means lower weight. What is the filling power? It is the ratio between weight and volume of the geese plumage and it is measured in cubic inches (CUIN). It is the product quality index. If the down is bulky and the weight is light, the filling power is higher. This is because the larger the down, the less they are needed to obtain the same volume needed to reach the desired heat levels.

You can build and tear down your +me whenever you want according to your needs and climate changes. This is possible due to buttonholes and twin buttons. The gap between the assembled modules makes +me fully breathable.

Once the cold season is over storing the duvet is as important as using it. For this reason +me comes with an original breathable bag, which can be easily stored in the wardrobe or to bring it with you while traveling.
+me is modular to be customized by you, made up of panels with different insulation, which can be assembled using the friendly buttons provided.
+me consists in 6 panels and 40 buttons. To compose +me, lay the panels on the mattress and unlock the buttons, separating the male from the female.
Insert the button with the tip (male) into the buttonholes from below, so that the button comes out of the buttonhole with the tip facing up.
Couple the female of the button with the male, exerting pressure. The panels are now locked. Pay attention to the intersections of the 4 panels (see the picture above).

+me is in the transition phase from prototype to production. We have completed the product development, prototyping and testing phase. We have selected the best suppliers to obtain a high quality and reliable duvet.
We made the modules structured in squares that will house the down goose of the duvet and we have found the ideal buttons to assemble the panels once completed.

We are read to carry out the second production phase, consisting in filling the modules with the precious geese down. This is the most capital intensive part of the project, requiring an investment of € 115.000.

We need to finance this phase and we have already found the raw material supplier and booked the quantity required so that we can promptly get it. In return, we offer +me at special price made available to Indiegogo members throughout this campaign.
The price after the campaign will be more than double.
+me is patented and made in Italy.

Each module is divided into large squares of fine cotton, filled with 100% goose down. A grid of seams allows the heat to be distributed evenly. +me is available in the version of double bed (6 modules). You can assemble +me in a completely personalized way, combining panels according to your and your partner desired warmth and to the season (autumn, winter, spring).
• 6 panels that you can choose from three levels of warmth (1, 3 or 5)
• 40 buttons, that are used to assemble +me as you want
• 1 breathable bag to store +me when not in use.
+me double duvet fit for any season. It includes:
• 6 panels that you can choose from three levels of warmth (1, 3 or 5)
• 2 additional panels to adjust +me to the climate
• 60 buttons, that are used to assemble +me as you want
• 1 breathable bag to store +me when not in use.
• 6+6 panels that you can choose from three levels of warmth (1, 3 or 5)
• 40+40 buttons, that are used to assemble +me as you want
• 1+1 breathable bag to store +me when not in use.
+me was born from an idea of Caterina Policardi and Pietro Parmeggiani backed by industry experts.
If you can't help, let your contact help us
If you can't contribute get the word out and make some noise about this campaign using also Indiegogo tools.

","We spend a lot of time sleeping because it is the basis of our well-being. More than 70% of people have a specific thermal problem during sleep, that compromises the quality of rest. There are those who always have cold feet and a warm chest, or who have a cold chest and very warm legs and feet.
+ me is the answer to this problem

+ me is a very high quality joinable duvet modules with different levels of warmth retention  that can be combined and recombined at any time to meet your specific thermal needs and those of your partner.
By ensuring exactly the warmth you both want in every part of your body, + me improves the quality of your life, because sleeping well means living better!
Warmth custom-fit for you and your partner
it maintains exactly the temperature you want, thanks to the different duvet's weight
it retains heat evenly and thermoregulates, thanks to the composition of large squares of fine cotton padded with 100% goose down, each other isolated by stitching.
+me - the double duvet version - is composed of 6 modules that satisfy 3 levels of warmth, to easily reach your desired comfort in any part of the body (chest, legs, feet).

Our body is warmer than the bedroom. At night, we delegate the duvet to protect us and retain heat. There are complex systems to measure this property and since these are completely personal sensations and needs, we preferred to describe our products by creating a scale from 1 to 5, aware that it remains a suggestion, an indication, the result of our research and experience.
Level 1 (80 gr/m2) = light, to cover the hottest area of the body
Level 3 (130 gr/m2) = medium, to cover the body area with medium temperature
Level 5 (180 gr/m2) = heavy, to cover the cold parts of the body
Prior to +me the choice of the best duvet was extremely difficult because:
1. long discussion between you and your partner about the level of heat
2. assess the exact warmth needed in every part of your body
3. avoid heavy duvet to get enough warmth
4. one duvet could not match all seasons needs (autumn/winter/spring)
Today, with +me years of compromise come to the end.
1. you customize your +me duvet according to your and your partner needs
2. you exactly match the warmth you dream on chest, legs and feet
3. +me weighs less than 2 kg, due to the high quality of goose down
4. you can change the panels' combination whenever you want, whenever the season changes
5. you wash +me into the washing machine by splitting the panels.

Regulations: Class 1 European Standards EN 12934- 100% Natural Product. Dedust, washed and sterilized in compliance with Italian Presidential Decree 845 23/1/75 and D.M. 315 10/11/76. Contains non-textile parts of animal origin.Warranty: 2 years
Composition: 3+3 panels with a dimension of 250x220 cm and 40 buttons

>OUR INSPIRATION

On a mission to develop wildfire fighting technologiesWe used fluid dynamics to re-invent the firefighting nozzle, achieving 2X faster fire suppression rate Leveraging this research and firefighting nozzles design we created the best-in-class nozzles for your home and garden.
column11:
'>THE PROBLEM

Big-box store nozzles have clunky and confusing settings. Have you ever wondered why all big-box stores nozzles look the same?
column16:
>OUR SOLUTION

Our nozzles are easy to use with one hand operation... Our Ultimate All-Purpose Nozzle has a long-range AND a wide stream at the same time Perfect for watering wide areas Switch from short to long-range with the flick of a thumb   Clean those hard to reach places It’s the perfect solution for washing your car So simple to use, that you can enjoy your coffee while washing your car! Clean that dirty truck bed Or your patio And your furry friend's home
column21:
>NEED MORE POWER?

For those extra-stubborn stains, get our Ultimate HIGH-PRESSURE NozzleUltimate High-Pressure Nozzle is perfect for cleaning moldy surfaces And those dirty stairs Easily reach that second-floor window And if needed, get the same lower pressure with a flick of your thumb It's time to get rid of those confusing old nozzles and get the nozzles you deserve!

column1: Foundations for Divergent Minds is a Texas registered 501(c)(3) nonprofit corporation based in Plano, TX. We are a small organization with a big mission to change the way all Autistic and other Neurodivergent children are supported in their homes, schools, communities and eventually their workplaces. Our model provides a framework to do that by focusing on five distinct but interconnected areas to enhance their quality of life.

While training is our primary means of achieving this goal, this campaign focuses on providing families with materials and tools in all five foundational areas. The Reimagined Home Kit does just that with sensory tools, routine cards, basic communication cards, social interaction bracelet and emotions cards.
• Routine cards, including morning, afternoon and evening routines

By pledging to this campaign, you are not just getting a kit that will improve the life of a neurodivergent person. You are also helping us expand our educational content and services. As a small volunteer nonprofit, every dollar has a much greater impact as it is invested back into providing more to the public.
If you cannot pledge monetary support for this campaign, you can still help by sharing it with your family, friends, followers and other networks.

Thank you from the bottom of my heart to everyone reading and supporting us,

Rent a Person it's the bussiness I have in mind to change the world and try and make possible for everyone who's interested to digitally visit anything they want, in real time, without having to access an old video or image or see a part of the things they want.

I would call this digital tourism and it should be available to anyone for a small fee where they can visit whatever they want and do what they like for the time frame.

I know myself, I can't afford to visit some beautiful countries and I know that there are alot of people like me who would like to see it as if they where there and that's what I am trying to unlock through my project.

A big THANK YOU to everyone who's supporting my dream, it's that one thing I know for sure I was born to do and I would enjoy doing for the rest of my life but without the support of people we are nothing and that's where I need you, it doesn't matter with how much you can contribute but it's extremely important to me if you do because it would make me a step closer in achieving this bussiness I've invested everything.

The Oaks, our 12-bedroom residential training centre, will be opening in the new year. Designed for those who are looking for a fresh start in life and wish to become part of our team at the Message Enterprise Centre, it is currently undergoing a major refurbishment.
Soon, it’ll be time to start making the house a home, and, like any couple starting out together, that means buying plates and cutlery, pots and pans, linen and more.
That’s why we’d love to invite all our supporters to get involved by buying an item from our Oaks ‘Gift List’. It’s an amazing way to show your support for The Oaks, whatever you can afford.

Who will benefit and how?

The Oaks will be part of our Message Enterprise Centre, which provides a genuine opportunity of a new start for individuals whose lives are currently chaotic but who are serious about making a change. These individuals may have a background of drugs, criminality, gangsterism or other life-controlling issues that have prevented them living the full life God intended for them.

Our Message Enterprise Centre currently helps people through the provision of a job that pays a real salary, vocational training, a home, life-skills, Christian community and intensive supervision. The great news is, it is working. During our first three years of operation, fewer than 10% of those we have worked with have reoffended, and over 70% are still in employment either with us or elsewhere. Considering over 60% of prison leavers are normally back behind bars within two years of being released, this is a remarkable result.

However, despite these successes and the encouraging feedback we get from those we work with, we sensed something was missing. The gospel is about more than our personal restoration – it catches us up in God's project of restoring the whole world. We therefore do not want those that come to the Message Enterprise Centre to simply work through their issues and leave
column2: we want them to be mobilised into mission, going out to serve the most vulnerable in society. Put simply we want to move them from maintenance to mission.

column1: This is what The Oaks will do. During the day, those on our programme will work and train in our Enterprise Centre and in the evening and weekends they will take part in accredited courses, study groups and structured leisure activities at The Oaks, preparing them to serve their community. We believe that those who have been a problem for society will genuinely become part of the solution.
The Oaks is well on the way to being fully refurbished. We now need to furnish the house with all the usual items – kitchen appliances, linen, white goods and more.

column2: >As we approach Christmas and you are buying gifts for friends and family, why not purchase an additional gift for The Oaks to support young people looking to rebuild their lives?

column1: On the right hand side, you can see all the items we need and their cost. Indiegogo calls these 'Perks' but unlike other crowdfunded campaigns these are 'Perks' for the young people. Think of it like a wedding Gift List.
Please could you click one of the items and donate the sum here so that we can purchase it for The Oaks?

NB: while we really appreciate people who offer to donate physical items, what is most helpful to us right now are cash donations so that we can purchase the items ourselves. This will allow us to buy things of the right style and durability to last for years to come. We want to create a home environment that looks and feels like a genuine second chance for these young people, and small things like fresh, matching homewares will make a huge difference to how our team members feel about their new home.

Thank you so much for visiting this page and supporting us in this way. If you have any questions at all, please contact our Head of Fundraising Stuart Chell on (0161) 946 2327 or stuart.chell@message.org.uk

Short Summary

Fanstel is a small telecommunications company founded over 20 years ago, evolving from the original Caller ID boxes to VoIP solutions for enterprise, and specialized phones for the hearing impaired.

About two years ago, we started to look beyond telecom, and began exploring ways to leverage our technical expertise into new and exciting areas. Our latest product is the BrewGenie - a smart, Bluetooth enabled coffee maker for everyone. With our app and smart coffee maker, we can help you:

column2: >Use our iOS and Android apps to start brewing a pot of coffee using your Bluetooth enabled smartphone
>Alerts from your phone when your coffee has finished brewing so you are the first one in line

column1: • LED notifications when the water tank is empty
• Water level alert messages can pop up on your phone
• Program the BrewGenie using the hardware buttons or in-app. Set your keep warm times from 10 minutes to 120 minutes to make sure everyone gets a mug
• Once you pair your phone to the coffee maker, you are all set!
• Use the app to monitor your coffee usage so  you get alerts when its time to buy more beans
• In the future, we plan to offer discount codes for participating local and online retailers
The BrewGenie will be available for purchase on November 10th, 2015. But for us, making a better coffee experience doesn't just end with a product launch
column2: we are already hard at work on BrewGenie 2, and that's where we need the help of all of you, our fellow coffee lovers.

>We are offering big discounts on the BrewGenie for all early adopters, because we need your feedback to help us make a smart coffee device that meets your needs. In exchange, YOU get a Bluetooth-connected, smartphone controllable coffee maker that helps solve your mornings.

The Impact

Your feedback will directly help us design the BrewGenie 2. As of today, we have already started working on integrating:

column1: • Precise temperature control to maximize the flavor for different roast levels
For us, the BrewGenie is an experiment, and a significant investment. We want to work with you, our fellow coffee lovers, to make the best product that meets your needs.

Overall, your risks are very low. We have FCC and ETL (safety) approvals for the BrewGenie (model BG120). The BrewGenie will be available for delivery from our Scottsdale, Arizona warehouse on November 10th, 2015.

For BrewGenie 2, we plan to incorporate all your feedback to launch by December, 2016. With any new product, there are risks that there may be delays in production, but we plan to leverage all of our experience and resources to ensure we get you the best Bluetooth controlled coffeemaker by the next holiday season.

If you made it this far, thanks! If you are interested in supporting our work, but want to wait for the BrewGenie 2, we have a perk that allows you to join our interest list and provide us feedback and your coffee maker wish list. Together, let's solve your morning!

column1:
Let us know which country you would like to order from at hello@darksteve.com

 If you're a member of the press looking for info or media assets, please download our press kit here, or contact us at hello@darksteve.com

 

Do I need a PayPal account to pay?

No. You can simply make your payment using your credit card or debit card without having a PayPal account.  

I need help with my payment process 

Contact us at hello@darksteve.com and we will help you in minutes!  

Will the light bulb work in my light fitting?  

The led bulb works in all standard light fittings. It is in E26 / E27 screw base and is applicable on 110V / 220V. 

How do I select my led bulb style and set?  

We will send you a survey where you can select bulb style and set  

Will you provide plug?  

If you choose our desk base or holder socket, a plug will be included.  

Is the sales tax or VAT included in my perks?  

Yes. All item includes any sales tax in perks.  

Do you ship worldwide?  

Yes.

Is the shipping fee included?  

Yes, the shipping fee is included.  

What is your return policy?  

Once the lamp is delivered, you have 14 days to decide whether to keep it. If you decide to return it contact our support at hello@darksteve.com. You need to send the lamp back in the same condition as you've received it. Our return policy covers the lamp itself but not the shipping costs.  

Does it come with a warranty?  

Yes, 2 years of manufacturer warranty. Lamp only.  

I'm a business owner and would like to sell our products in my store. 

Contact us at hello@darksteve.com  

My question isn't listed here, what should I do?  

Send it to us at hello@darksteve.com.

 

Risks and challenges

We bring two years of design and manufacturing experience to this project, and have a strong relationship with our manufacturing partners. We currently have a functional prototype of the collection that is ready for mass production. However, we are aware that there may be necessary changes to meet manufacturing requirements. Our policy is to make sure that our backers are continuously informed of any updates or changes. We plan to keep our campaign as transparent as possible, and we also promise to do our best to overcome any challenges we encounter on the way. We are looking forward to the day we deliver the bulbs to the hands of our backers.

 

 

*Patented technology

Introduction

I started PlexUnits in 2016 to facilitate financial freedom for my family. We knew about subletting and how much money it could bring in to help us meet our monthly expenses but my mom couldn't qualify for a second mortgage to renovate our basement.  We decided that I would rent and renovate her basement and in turn sublet it to guests on the Airbnb platform and ultimately get our money back. This was the beginning of the journey of PlexUnits that has since expanded to help 2 other families get started in subletting.

Our Ask

We are asking donors to support our campaign. If we achieve our fundraising goals we will be able to streamline many of our processes and add additional households to our portfolio. See below for important fundraising milestones.

1. $ 30,000: We will be able to add another family to our program

2. $ 50,000: We will be able to add 2 families to our program

3. $150,000: We will be able to get 10 families in our program and celebrate a major milestone in our company.

We appreciate every dollar that is donated.

 

Our Impact

 

We transfer homeowners unused space into rentable space. Our goal is to not only to transform space but to transform the lives of our owners and guests through our use of space.

Our Success:

First Apartment: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/17908474

Second Apartment: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/22823466

Third Apartment: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/25898050

Your support will help us help more families achieve financial freedom 

Risks and Challenges

In each and every project there is a risk of human and monetary capital. We assess the family, cost, and location before deciding to move forward with a potential customer. We also use different legal agreements to ensure our investment is protected and give homeowners options to change the agreement so they are comfortable.  Our goal is to have a clear expectation with our homeowners and guests so everyone is comfortable and confident in our process.

We have completed 3 projects thus far and we are confident in our ability to expand and help more families. 

Help us spread the word

You can reach us at our website at www.plexunits.com or visit our facebook page at facebook.com/plexunits Help us spread the word. Thank you for your support.

""It looks like shining fireflies taking a rest on a stone."" -- Catherine G.

Why Firefly Light?

It's been half a year since I got my master's degree.  I was so lucky enough to find a job that I really love while many of my classmates were still struggling. I'm an adult now, and I'm so excited that I eventually can try my best to make a difference to the world. Everything seemed to be going well in my world.

There was something missing, however. I'm an adult now, responsible for my family, my work, and myself. I'm excited about it while I feel I lost something important in my life, the connection to my childhood.

When I walked through the meadows in a summer evening and tried to figure out what I lost, one image hit my mind suddenly: the arrival of the fireflies!

They have always been special to me because their arrival marked the end of classes and the start of summer. What could be more magical? For someone like me who loved walking through meadows, this was like an explosion of nightlights, a fireworks display just for me!

So, I decided to create something could relive the magic of our childhood summer -- a stone light that reminds me of the dancing fireflies.
column2:
>Inspiration

The shape of the light was inspired by the stones along the river. Breaking the traditional regular design of a light, we choose the perfect natural shape of stones.

The lovely little indentions which make the fireflies lights possible are irregular in different sizes. It's just like a lot of fireflies are taking a rest on a stone in the night.

In the night, turn on your firefly light and relive the magic of childhood summer in your room! The beautiful lights penetrate through the indentions and dance like freely fireflies.
column3:
>Fireflies

When I was a little kid, my brother and I would fetch a few jam pots from my father's workshop to go firefly hunting. The hunt always began at dusk, without a net. We had to capture them with our bare hands. Now, with the shining firefly light, I relive the magic of holding beautiful fireflies in my hands.

Put it on the bed table, it's so convenient to take it with me when I wake up in the late night for something. The light is soft and beautiful, and comfortable for eyes.

Shining like fireflies on your shelf.

It's a perfect companion while reading.  

The lights are so beautiful, just like small fireflies! I can help to touch it, it's like touching a beautiful memory of childhood. So warm!

Just one click to turn on the light. So easy and so simple.

It matches well with the sink, giving you a sweet and soft feeling when you are brushing your teeth before you go to sleep.

It's bright enough for your midnight stroll. The light is soft and comfortable. It will not drive away your sleepiness.
column4:
>Handcraft

How could we help people relive the magic of childhood summer? How could we keep these beautiful little fireflies in a ""jar""?  I thought about it for a long time. Why not design a light giving out firefly lights and help people relive the magic of childhood summer?

After dozens of iterations, paper and 3D mockups, we settled on a natural shape of a stone. I looks really cool!

The prototype is much more difficult than we had expected. We made a mold with gypsum.

Then we moulded by slip casting, made firefly marks with special tools, and glazed the surface. We chose the ultra- high-temperature porcelain to make our light. This kind of material is sintered under the temperature around 1300 °C which makes the glaze crystal much denser and stronger. The surface is lustrous, smooth, and translucent like white jade.

The light needs to be sintered twice under 1280 °C in order to get the best finish. It was firstly sintered for nearly four hours, and then lower the temperature for three to four hours. After that, it needed to be sintered for nearly ten hours, and then lower the temperature for five to six hours. The whole sintering process takes 23 hours!

Inside the porcelain shell is a simple, efficient LED light that is battery powered. You can take the light with you anywhere and the bulb will last for 10,000 hours or more.

Pledge now and help us bring this beautiful firefly light to life. It helps me relive the magic of my childhood summer, I'm sure it will also help you this way. :) Thank you for your support!

Thank you to BackerPoints for supporting us :)

Bailey's Burgers

Bailey's Burgers was established in April 2011. 

We were located inside Central Texas Speedway for 4 years.  In 2015, we decided we wanted to bring our amazing burgers closer to ""town"".  We have been looking for the perfect opportunity to reopen and we think we have finally found it.  Yes folks, we are opening a food trailer!!

Small business can be tough, especially when you add in relocating and a couple of bumps along the way.  We are more than ready to re-open.  We miss the food, but we really miss our customers!  We(especially Frank) can't wait to start cooking for y'all again!  But to do that, we need your help! 

By helping us get our trailer rolling, you will be introducing an amazing burger to the rare few who haven't had the opportunity to experience the magic of a Bailey's Burger.  And the sooner we are open, the sooner we can start giving back to our community!  Our community is the reason we exist. 


What We Need &

We need to raise $6500 in two weeks!  This will enable us put the finishing touches on what we have been tirelessly working on.  It will also help us cover unexpected costs that have arisen and our permits to open.  Why so fast?  Things are moving quickly and the sooner we get the funding, the sooner we can open.
- POS system (This means we will be able to accept credit cards!)
- Last minute touches on the trailer
BUT we aren't asking for you to give us something for nothing!

We have some really fun ""perks"" waiting for you!

  

The Impact

This will have a huge Impact!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, we completely understand!  But that doesn't mean you can't help!!

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!  Use ALL social media to our advantage!

which has great capabilities to change the market of transport logistics:
Capable to lift and to dump payloads -

column2: Hook Lift Bins - with a max. weight of tremendous 80 tons (!)

column1: and with telescopically extended lengths up to 18 mtrs. -, the Range CHU-40 is the first and only Hook
Lift Device worldwide playing in this league and opening unexpected
opportunities for your operations now, because for the first time, a
Hook Lift Range is available on the markets for those payload weights
Be one of the first discovering the enormous advantages of the self-loading/unloading &
column2: dumping ISO Container Handling Unit ContiLift CHU-40 - designed for the trouble-free handling of 40' &amp
column3: 45' Containers, Flat Racks etc. Fast Loading &amp
column4: Unloading cycles of full/empty containers are possible now within only 45 seconds and you're ready to go on. This will boost your business - ultimately profit your operation !

column1: After hard work, we're happy to present you a powerful transport logistics system, which is capable to lift and to dump payloads with a max. weight of tremendous 80 tons and with lengths up to 18 m with one unit. To ensure a long durability and to withstand extreme tensions, the sturdy Rotating Lift Arm &
column2: the Sliding Cart are made of wear resistant, high-tensile Steel DOMEX. The EOS-ContiLift CHU-40 is available as a prefabricated Mounting Kit for an easy self-assembling onto a locally provided semi-trailer chassis on site or fully fabricated with semi-trailer as one unit = Fit for Purpose !

column1: For the first time, it's possible to handle all transportation steps with one and the same device. Full or empty containers can be loaded by the EOS-ContiLift CHU-40 by itself without the necessity to wait for reach stackers, forklifts etc. Do it easily &
column2: quickly by yourself without wasting time. And, if the container should be dumped by the solid tipping cylinder, you must not reload them to container tilters or to forklifts with rotator. Now, you can do all with one unit in a shorter time !

column1:
Yes, we've also listened to our potential users and the result is a convenient and safe transport system, which significantly eases the daily work of the driver/operator. With the EOS-ContiLift CHU-40 all necessary operations are executed by the strong hydraulics and are Radio Remote Controlled by the driver in the cab or in a safe distance near by. Due to the absence of chains, no manual actions of the operator are required and containers can be also safely handled during windy conditions.

Our modified ""Double T"" ISO Spreader connects automatically into the upper corner castings, whilst both

corner castings at the bottom are embraced and closely locked by the hydraulically operated crossbar. To ensure absolute stability during dumping operations and to reduce stress on the chassis by loading, we've integrated 2 hydraulically driven Rear Roll Stabilizers to the undercarriage - giving you always the safety you need !
The first Hook Lift for Waste Bins with 75 cbm Volume &

During the recent process of product development and due to demands, we've decided to lay out the EOS-ContiLift CHU-40 Range to a modular system - enabling us to fulfill easily our customer's requirements on a basic standard design. As a result, we engineered the strongest &
column2: longest Hook Lift ever and can also answer customer's requests with the EOS-ContiLift CHU-40 COMBI or TBS 40 Version - equipped additionally with a hook device -, which can be also supplied as a straight Hook Lift TBS 40 only for Waste Bins with max. 75 cbm volume &amp

column1: Therefore, the Combined Heavy Duty Hook Lift Version TBS 40 is the first choice of enterprises requiring a versatile device for the trouble-free handling of 40'/45' Hook Lift Bins, Flat Racks, Rigs, Tank Containers, ISO Containers and for whatever you need it !

EOS-ENVIRO ISO Container Handling Units - Series ContiLift CHU-40 - are supplied serially
with lifting function enabling the equipment to load and to unload full
and/or empty 40' or - optionally - 45' ISO Containers within approx. 45
seconds each. On request, the units are provided with an additional
tipping cylinder, which allows also a fast emptying of bulk containers
with a tipping angle of 45°.
The hinged ISO Container Spreader at the boom top
section is forced to connect automatically with the upper sea
container's corner castings by integrated locking pins whilst both
corner castings at the bottom are embraced at first by the extended,
hydraulically operated crossbar with locking pins and then safely
connected to the Spreader - after retracting of the crossbar – by the

automatically inserted locking pins.

Extra long loads with a length of 13,716 mm/45' (by
standard semi-trailer) or up to 18,000 mm (by hydraulically
extendible/telescopic semi-trailer !) are also lifted and placed onto
the ground safely and trouble-free, because no lateral lifting cranes
(as seen at Sideloaders/Sidelifters) reduce the available payload width,
which you require.
activating the rotating Extension Hook Arm with the hinged Crossbeam
Spreader upwardly, the container is pulled by the Front Carriage onto the
semi-trailer chassis and also simultaneously moved in the horizontal
direction forwards - respectively for unloading in the opposite way.
By being fixedly mounted onto the Sliding Cart, the hydraulically operated, Rotating Lift Arm is moved forwards &
column2: backwards by the integrated belt drive - installed inside the semi-trailer skeleton. Either the prime mover's P.T.O. or an auxiliary Diesel engine supplies the necessary drive to operate the strong power unit beneath the chassis frame.

column1: During the dumping mode, the Front Carriage with Spreader, to which the payload is
fixedly connected, is tilted max. 45° by a frontally installed hydraulic
cylinder upwards in order to achieve a total emptying. Whilst tipping
the ISO Containers are secured on the Foldable Rear Roller Bearings with twist locks and also by the front
carriage to avoid an accidental release of the payloads.
<span><span>During transport the ISO Containers are immovably
connected to the Spreader and Twist Locks. Due to that stable fixation,
payloads can be safely transported on rough terrain.
The hydraulically operated Rear Roll Stabilizer makes
the loading/unloading procedure safe by giving also stability on - a
little bit - uneven ground during lifting and dumping of payloads, which
is secured during transport with 4, integrated Twist Locks. Foldable Rear Roller Bearings on the left &amp
column2: right side of the rear ensure a smooth loading/unloading without jams. Equipped with twist locks &amp
column3: pins, the Rear Roller Bearings enable also a safe tilting by being folded upwards and whilst transportation in the horizontal position.

column1: • Max. Lifting Capacities: 35 tons (Optionally: 40 tons/50 tons/80 tons)
• Overall Length: 13,505 mm (18,000 mm)/Overall Width: 2,532 mm/Overall Height: 4,000 mm
• Length of Container: Max. 12,191 mm/40' (Option/45': available on request)
• Hydraulically Operated Corner Casting Lockings with Locking Pins (at the bottom of Spreader)

Q: What's the Minimum Order Quantity (MOQ) of the ContiLift CHU-40 ?
A: 1 unit per order is absolutely sufficient for us.
Q: In which colours are the units delivered ?
A: Please, choose any of your desired colour(s) acc. to the RAL list (available on request).
Q: How is the ContiLift CHU-40 driven ?
A: Either by the prime-mover's P.T.O. or by an auxiliary Diesel engine.
Q: Is it possible to install the EOS-ContiLift CHU-40 Module - delivered as a Mounting Kit - onto a locally provided semi-trailer chassis ?

A: Yes, no doubt. We supply the prefabricated module with subframe for an easy installation on your site. However, it's mandatory, that the chassis frame of the semi-trailer has to be reinforced acc. to our detailed, written instructions.
Q: Can be the EOS-ContiLift CHU-40 Module only supplied being mounted onto a ""standard"" semi-trailer chassis ?
A: Not only - So far a low bed semi-trailer is needed for your purposes, the
CHU-Range is also prepared to be mounted onto Gooseneck Semi-Trailers as
well as for the usage with B-Double Semi-Trailers.
Q: How do you supply the EOS-ContiLift CHU-40 ?

A: The EOS-ContiLift CHU-40 is available as a prefabricated Mounting Kit for self-assembling onto a suitable semi-trailer chassis at a skilled workshop on site or as a fully installed unit with semi-trailer = Fit for Purpose.
Q: Do you give support by achieving the local/national licence ?
A: Yes, of course, all necessary documents for obtaining the required homologation - in terms of the semi-trailer chassis - are provided by us.
Q: What's the estimated delivery time of an EOS-ContiLift CHU-40 ?
A: The first unit will be finalized &
column2: tested within 3 months - further orders will be accomplished within 4 weeks after date of order confirmation.

your specific questions about the exciting EOS-ENVIRO 40'/45' ISO Container Handling Unit CHU-40 and its technology !
EOS-ENVIRO ISO Container Handling Units ContiLift CHU-40
which has great capabilities to change the market of transport logistics:
Capable to lift and to dump payloads -
such as ISO-Containers & Hook Lift Bins - with a max. weight of tremendous 80 tons (!)
and with telescopically extended lengths up to 18 mtrs. -, the Range CHU-40 is the first and only Hook
Lift Device worldwide playing in this league and opening unexpected
opportunities for your operations now, because for the first time, a
Hook Lift Range is available on the markets for those payload weights

Be one of the first discovering the enormous advantages of the self-loading/unloading & dumping ISO Container Handling Unit ContiLift CHU-40 - designed for the trouble-free handling of 40' & 45' Containers, Flat Racks etc. Fast Loading & Unloading cycles of full/empty containers are possible now within only 45 seconds and you're ready to go on. This will boost your business - ultimately profit your operation !

After hard work, we're happy to present you a powerful transport logistics system, which is capable to lift and to dump payloads with a max. weight of tremendous 80 tons and with lengths up to 18 m with one unit. To ensure a long durability and to withstand extreme tensions, the sturdy Rotating Lift Arm & the Sliding Cart are made of wear resistant, high-tensile Steel DOMEX. The EOS-ContiLift CHU-40 is available as a prefabricated Mounting Kit for an easy self-assembling onto a locally provided semi-trailer chassis on site or fully fabricated with semi-trailer as one unit = Fit for Purpose !

For the first time, it's possible to handle all transportation steps with one and the same device. Full or empty containers can be loaded by the EOS-ContiLift CHU-40 by itself without the necessity to wait for reach stackers, forklifts etc. Do it easily & quickly by yourself without wasting time. And, if the container should be dumped by the solid tipping cylinder, you must not reload them to container tilters or to forklifts with rotator. Now, you can do all with one unit in a shorter time !

Yes, we've also listened to our potential users and the result is a convenient and safe transport system, which significantly eases the daily work of the driver/operator. With the EOS-ContiLift CHU-40 all necessary operations are executed by the strong hydraulics and are Radio Remote Controlled by the driver in the cab or in a safe distance near by. Due to the absence of chains, no manual actions of the operator are required and containers can be also safely handled during windy conditions. Our modified ""Double T"" ISO Spreader connects automatically into the upper corner castings, whilst both

corner castings at the bottom are embraced and closely locked by the hydraulically operated crossbar. To ensure absolute stability during dumping operations and to reduce stress on the chassis by loading, we've integrated 2 hydraulically driven Rear Roll Stabilizers to the undercarriage - giving you always the safety you need !
The first Hook Lift for Waste Bins with 75 cbm Volume & a Length of 12 m !

During the recent process of product development and due to demands, we've decided to lay out the EOS-ContiLift CHU-40 Range to a modular system - enabling us to fulfill easily our customer's requirements on a basic standard design. As a result, we engineered the strongest & longest Hook Lift ever and can also answer customer's requests with the EOS-ContiLift CHU-40 COMBI or TBS 40 Version - equipped additionally with a hook device -, which can be also supplied as a straight Hook Lift TBS 40 only for Waste Bins with max. 75 cbm volume & with 12 m !

Therefore, the Combined Heavy Duty Hook Lift Version TBS 40 is the first choice of enterprises requiring a versatile device for the trouble-free handling of 40'/45' Hook Lift Bins, Flat Racks, Rigs, Tank Containers, ISO Containers and for whatever you need it !

EOS-ENVIRO ISO Container Handling Units - Series ContiLift CHU-40 - are supplied serially
with lifting function enabling the equipment to load and to unload full
and/or empty 40' or - optionally - 45' ISO Containers within approx. 45
seconds each. On request, the units are provided with an additional
tipping cylinder, which allows also a fast emptying of bulk containers
The hinged ISO Container Spreader at the boom top
section is forced to connect automatically with the upper sea
container's corner castings by integrated locking pins whilst both
corner castings at the bottom are embraced at first by the extended,
hydraulically operated crossbar with locking pins and then safely
connected to the Spreader - after retracting of the crossbar – by the
automatically inserted locking pins.Extra long loads with a length of 13,716 mm/45' (by
standard semi-trailer) or up to 18,000 mm (by hydraulically
extendible/telescopic semi-trailer !) are also lifted and placed onto
the ground safely and trouble-free, because no lateral lifting cranes
(as seen at Sideloaders/Sidelifters) reduce the available payload width,
activating the rotating Extension Hook Arm with the hinged Crossbeam
Spreader upwardly, the container is pulled by the Front Carriage onto the
semi-trailer chassis and also simultaneously moved in the horizontal
direction forwards - respectively for unloading in the opposite way.

By being fixedly mounted onto the Sliding Cart, the hydraulically operated, Rotating Lift Arm is moved forwards & backwards by the integrated belt drive - installed inside the semi-trailer skeleton. Either the prime mover's P.T.O. or an auxiliary Diesel engine supplies the necessary drive to operate the strong power unit beneath the chassis frame.
During the dumping mode, the Front Carriage with Spreader, to which the payload is
fixedly connected, is tilted max. 45° by a frontally installed hydraulic
cylinder upwards in order to achieve a total emptying. Whilst tipping
the ISO Containers are secured on the Foldable Rear Roller Bearings with twist locks and also by the front
carriage to avoid an accidental release of the payloads.
During transport the ISO Containers are immovably
connected to the Spreader and Twist Locks. Due to that stable fixation,
payloads can be safely transported on rough terrain.
The hydraulically operated Rear Roll Stabilizer makes
the loading/unloading procedure safe by giving also stability on - a
little bit - uneven ground during lifting and dumping of payloads, which

is secured during transport with 4, integrated Twist Locks. Foldable Rear Roller Bearings on the left & right side of the rear ensure a smooth loading/unloading without jams. Equipped with twist locks & pins, the Rear Roller Bearings enable also a safe tilting by being folded upwards and whilst transportation in the horizontal position.
Max. Lifting Capacities: 35 tons (Optionally: 40 tons/50 tons/80 tons)
Overall Length: 13,505 mm (18,000 mm)/Overall Width: 2,532 mm/Overall Height: 4,000 mm
Tare Weight: approx. 5,200 kg/Tilting Angle: 45°/Lifting Angle: 16°
Length of Container: Max. 12,191 mm/40' (Option/45': available on request)
8 pcs. Twist Locks/ISO Container Spreader (Crossbeam) & Sliding Cart made of DOMEX
Hydraulically Operated Corner Casting Lockings with Locking Pins (at the bottom of Spreader)

Pressure Relief Valves/Connecting Pipes 3/4”/Danfoss Distributor with Lever Controls & Radio Spools
All Hydraulic Cylinders with Double Plating = High Resistance (Salt Spray Test)
2 Hydraulically Operated Rear Roll Stabilizer/2 Foldable Rear Roller Bearings
Pressure Filters, Sliding Cart Cylinders,Clamping Basket Cylinders,
Rotating Arm Cylinders, Telescopic Arm Cylinders, Tipping Cylinder &
Coating (2 Epoxy Bi-Component) on your demand acc. to RAL-List

A: All prices are calculated on basis EURO, because the entire production process is made by our contractual manufacturer in Italy/EU and therefore, we can minimize a possible exchange rate risk and are also able to keep prices longer unaltered.
Q: What are the Standard Payment & Delivery Conditions reg. the EOS-ContiLift CHU-40 ?
Letter of Credit (L/C) –  payable at sight before
delivery/after factory acceptance test (FAT). All costs to Buyer's
75%  before shipment = by transfer on our
denominated bank account or via irrevocable, transferable & confirmed Letter
of Credit (L/C) – payable at sight. All costs to Buyer's account.
More info required concerning Payment & Delivery Conditions ? Please, refer to our website: http://www.eos-enviro.com/payment--delivery-conditions.html
Q: Do you grant a warranty ?
A: Yes, a warranty period of 1 year on hydraulic & structural parts is granted by us, which
covers only the defective part(s) itself and without   any
reimbursement of possible costs of labour and of additional materials
to the Distributor or his Subdistributors in order to meet warranty
A: The purchaser is solely responsible for paying all local taxes, where applicable
(including but not limited to sales tax, VAT, GST, customs duties etc.).
Q: Can I become your local distributor or agency ?
A: Of course, you can become a member of our distributor network - We'd be more than happy to send you on request a draft of our Distributor or Agency Agreement for review.
Q: Can I get a refund ?
A: Please, refer to Indiegogo's policy here.
Here, you can get answers to more frequently asked questions !
Then, please, don't hesitate to contact us - Our friendly team is happy to help you !

Our skilled team members have a combined experience of more than 70 years in creating, developing, producing and selling hydraulically operated material handling products - used in the environmental & transport logistics industry worldwide. Therefore, we have worked deliberate and very hard to engineer that exceptional Container Handling Unit and also to minimize the risks and

challenges to this project. Although, there is always something that comes up, that could delay processes, we have the absolute goal to follow up the chart. Whatever happens, we will keep you updated along the way and ask for your patience in advance, so far an unexpected problem would occur - however, we need to realize the first unit for demonstration of its outstanding, technical features in the reality to convince  potential customers definitely.....
The provision of the rewards & perks is subject to best efforts and
not guaranteed, if - unlikely - the funding goal could not be fully
In the case of further queries, just drop an email & we’ll be happy to answer
your specific questions about the exciting EOS-ENVIRO 40'/45' ISO Container Handling Unit CHU-40 and its technology !

Overview

ARDEN: THE ALL-IN-ONE SMARTHUB

The Arden smarthub is the all-in-one smarthub that connects to any device with an HDMI input. Once connected, it loads its own interface freely customizable by the user. Arden displays information and content from a variety of different sources like media services, applications, cable boxes, and more. At startup, the device will boot into its dashboard where you will find an on-screen informational display showing date, time, weather and other customizable icons and widgets. You can encounter a notification window which displays any active and ongoing notifications associated with any smarthome devices being integrated within the system. Arden is compatible with multiple different smart home solutions, and once integrated all of the features packed inside will come to life.

VIDEO SURVEILLANCE OVERLAY

Motion detection and voice commands allow you to view your camera at any time without disrupting any task.

PAIR ARDEN WITH ALL YOUR SMARTHOME DEVICES

Arden is designed to pair with all smart devices. We've designed custom Amazon Echo skills to control all of Arden's features via voice. Devices like the Ring Doorbell can be paired to your Arden smarthub to bring additional functionality.

VOICE COMMANDS

With Arden just use your voice to control all of the apps you love to use rather than using a remote. Below is the list of apps we currently support with plenty more to come in the future.

NOTIFICATIONS

Unobtrusive notifications display information from paired smart devices as well as important information pertaining to your area such as severe weather alerts.

VIDEO CALLING

Connect any webcam to Arden and start chatting with a friend or conferencing with an office across the world.

What's In The Box

Specs

Our Team

Our mission is to provide technology solutions that outshine any potential competition. We strive to give consumers the best product for their money and we take pride knowing that our system improves a users day-to-day life. From revolutionary home automation solutions to business services unlike any other, Jetsons Living will be your first step into the future.

Our Progress

","What is Bottlight Bottlight is the first high-tech design lamp made with recycled bottles and enhanced with innovative Touch Gestures technology.There are two versions of Bottlight v1: Classic and Colors. Bottlight Classic reproduces the color of your favorite drink.Bottlight Colors allows you to switch between different colors.And we are already working on the Bottlight v2!Bottlight's Main Features

Bottlight has innovative high-tech features.By just touching on the top with a finger, you can turn the lamp off and on, jump  to full light, switch between colors, and dim the light to your preferred intensity!Bottlight can be charged with a simple USB cable that we will provide in the package. You can plug the USB cable directly into the glass and connect it with your computer, charger or power port!For collectors, all the original Bottlights are unique and sensor-tracked to prevent unauthorized copies.Creative Lamp Design for the HouseBottlight is made for regular and stylish people like you who want to decorate their houses with a special high-tech design lamp
column2: or perhaps for those who want to remember a special toast and never forget a glass of great wine!Bars and Venues DécorBottlight is also especially designed for restaurant, bar and venues that want to have beautiful eye-striking bottle shelves. Bottlight is just perfect if you want to create the right atmosphere for the right party. Give your place a unique style!

column1: Each Bottlight is numbered with a unique code. The numbering will looks like [Model]-000351.

By scanning the QR code placed on the label, or by putting your smartphone just next to the RFID sensor placed inside the bottle, you will be redirected to the official website page of your unique bottle.
Here you will find all the information about the piece you own. Of course, the early bird catches the worm.
If you want to secure the first numbers you need to move fast!
The top is the controller of your Bottlight.
Touch once to power on and off
Hold the finger on the top to dim the light and set your favorite intensity.
Touch twice to go to full light.
On “Bottlight Colors"" Version you can also swipe the finger on the top to swap between different colors.
You can get free Bottlights by sending us your empty bottles! Recycle the glass with us and you will have an on-going stream of Bottlights coming to you to make your place just amazing!
For more info see our Partner Program Page.
Maybe you know the bar owner where you go to get a drink or take a coffee. Let him/her know about The Bottlight project. This could also be a good deal for you both!
You spent a lot of resources to create the perfect bottle for your drink. So, why not giving it a new life now, actually a new… light?
Place your branded newly lit-up bottles everywhere: venues, bars, restaurants, art installations
We created the Producers Program for you.
Join our Producers Program and gain access to incredible discounts.You will receive thousands of Original Bottlights with Your Brand that you can resell or just give to your best customers as gifts.
Visit our Producers Program Section and check out if your bottle is eligible to become a Bottlight.

This is just the beginning. We have tons of ideas already for the next generations of Bottlights. Every single day we work to add new features. With the Bottlight v2 version you will be able to connect all the bottles and control lights, colors, animations with the Bottlight App that we are going to launch.
Don’t miss our v2 perks and you will get coupon discounts on the second generation of Bottlights to be released in spring 2017.
Check out the Bottlight Timeline for more info.Also, please share your ideas with us. We love to receive suggestions.
What We Need & What You Get
We need at least 40.000€ to reach the minimum order quantity needed to buy the necessary parts and begin the production of Bottlight v1.
The Bottlight v2 is under development. We will use the v2 preorder coupon funds to prototype it and begin the production.

We've made perks for all tastes and budgets. We make Bottlights out of every kind of bottle, beer bottles, vodka, wine, olive oil, liquor, rum and so on. The bigger the size, the higher the price! Choose the perk you like, and we will send you a survey to choose your favorite bottle to transform into a bright Bottlight. Then we will ship it to your place.
Bottlight Is Made In Italy. Handmade.

We love art, design, technology and… well, drinking. We mixed all these things to create a lamp design that is beautiful and unique, a work of art. We do this with love. Bottlight is Made in Italy. Handmade. Every single piece. Take advantage of our temporary special prices until the end of the Indiegogo campaign. Get a Bottlight now and save. Get a unique, low-numbered piece! See below the perks that is most convenient for you.

This secret perk allows you to get your Bottlight at the lowest price possible! Just 29€ for a small ""Bottlight Classic"" and 39€ for a big ""Bottlight Classic"".Search for the Bottlight secret perk around the web or on the website! Only 30 available.
Get a small Bottlight at a discounted price. Choose between “Colors” or “Classic” version. Only available for the first 30 Small Bottlights!” Price 34€
Get a Big Bottlight (0.75lt or more) at a discounted price. Choose between “Colors” or “Classic”. Only available for the first 30 Big Bottlights!” Price 59€

These perks apply to all buyers after the 1000 th one. But don’t be discouraged. Our Indiegogo prices are still very convenient compared to Bottlight prices after the campaign. We want to make Bottlight available for everybody!
Transform your brand jam into a bright and juicy Bottlight. Just 34€!
Get a Small Bottlight now and choose between “Colors” or “Classic” version.” Price 39.
Get your Big Bottlight now and get to choose between “Colors” or “Classic” version. Price 89€
We've also created some special perks:
Get 3 Small Bottlights (“Colors” or “Classic”) at a discounted price. Just 98€
Get 3 Small Bottlights (“Colors” or “Classic”) at a discounted price. At 239€
Get 3 Big Bottlights plus 2 Small Bottlights, and choose between “Classic” and “Colors”. Price 299€
Get 7 Big Bottlights plus 3 Small Bottlights. choose between “Classic” and “Colors”
Get 10 Big Bottlights and 5 Small Bottlights. Choose between “Classic” and “Colors”.
Get 30 Big Bottlights and choose between “Classic” and “Colors”.
Are you a drink producer and want your bottle to become a Bottlight? Starting from 50 pieces up to 1000. You'll get amazing discounts made just for you on quantity.
Collect all the n. 1 pieces of all the the Bottlights produced during the entire life of the Bottlight Project.

How Can I Choose My Favorite Brand? At the end of the campaign we will get in touch with you to let you choose your brand ready to be produced. However, when you choose your perk you should already know which bottle you want, so that you can choose a perk appropriate to the size of your bottle.

We hope to reach our campaign goal. This will give us all the resources that we need to produce and reinvest a good part of this income in research and development, to produce newer and cooler Bottlight versions.

If the campaign is successful we will expand our team and improve our facilities. If the campaign goal is reached, we’ll give priority to the production of all the Bottlights sold during the Indiegogo campaign.
Then we will use the remaining budget for more research and marketing projects.
Bottlight started years ago as a free-time passion.
We since then honed the product to a point where we dream of making Bottlight our daily job and creating a cutting-edge design and technology company.
We believe that Bottlight is already one of the most innovative bottle lamp ever made. And most beautiful.
Achieving these goals cost us time, hard work and commitment. But today we are so proud of our work that we want to see light up the world with it!
We are a small company at the moment. If things go too well, as we hope, and the number of orders goes over 10,000 pcs, we fear not to be able to complete the production on time (December 2016).
However, we are confident that we will be able to manage this challenge too. We will expand the team faster than we thought and improve the productivity.
By the way. We’re always hiring talents, want to be on board? Contact us
If you like The Bottlight project, even before you buy a perk, please share it with your friends. Your sharing is very important for us!
You can share The Bottlight Projects with the Social Media Indiegogo Tools, or just following us on our social media pages.
Then, if you also want to purchase a Bottlight, you will make us very happy! We will do our best to make you happy too, with an amazing Bottlight!
We thank you all for your great support!
**All the other trademarks cited herein are the property of their respective owners. We just apply our technologies to the bottles.",9.0,0,"1 Campaign
