We’ve all lived with and tried to adapt to small or busy kitchens with limited counter space. Imagine your kitchen in the middle of meal preparation, with food ready to prep, kitchen tools, spices, and pot lids covering every inch. Where is that bit of extra space to put the cutting board to slice the veggies or for the bowl to mix the condiments? The LidSitter is here to help organize your kitchen space. LidSitter's unique design allows you to place lids, ladles, spoons, and other kitchen utensils securely on pot rims when not in use and quickly and easily place them back on the pots when the lids are needed.

The LidSitter consists of a stainless steel wire-form and a nylon handle. One end of the wire-form design engages with the pot lid handle while the other snuggly attaches to the cooking pot’s rim. The LidSitter’s unique shape is fabricated from spring-steel that provides a secure attachment combined with flexible mobility. The spring-steel and nylon materials allow heat to dissipate from the device at a much faster rate than other metal surfaces, including the cooking pot and lid, ensuring that the LidSitter can be safely used on a gas stovetop.

LidSitter Details
• Materials: Nylon Handle and Stainless Steel Body

Hold Cook Book,iPad or Tablet on Counter Top . Keep cooking recipes organized and easily accessible by sitting cooking book, iPad or tablet right on the counter top using LidSitter. In addition, have your favorite cooking channel or show on while cooking.

Keep Pot Lids within Reach. For the first time, LidSitter allows lids to sit on the rim of any cooking pot. Once placed on rim, the LidSitter has the ability to slide to the left or right with a small push.
Easily move and place lid anywhere on rim for convenience
Reduce Back Strain. Reduce unnecessary back strains from over reaching and repetitive twisting and turing to pick up lids. Reaching for lids has never been easier with lid right within arm reach.

column2: >It's OK. Keep all 4 lids on the rims of the 4 cooking pots. For the first time, you can do it.Keep Cooking Lid/Utensils within Reach. LidSitter can accommodate ladles, stirring utensils, and other cooking utensils. Once a lid is attached, a large spoon can slide between the lid and the LidSitter, and a ladle can be placed on the cooking pot's rim for quick access.

column1: Reduce Accidental Burning. Never touch a hot lid or lid handles anymore and keep lids off hot surfaces. LidSitter’s unique handle provides a safe and heat resistant surface safe enough to touch.
Without the LidSitter, you will touch that HOT lid one way or another
With the LidSitter on, you are in the clear of hot surfaces on the stove

No More Dripping Messes. Whether the lid is sitting on the rim, or closed for cooking, the condensation gathered on the lid will drain back into cooking pot, conserving liquids and avoiding drippy messes.
Use the LidSitter and make dripping messes history.

Fits Majority of Lids. LidSitter's unique design fits majority of all pot lid styles that are available at QVC, Walmart, Target and other popular big box retailers. Whether you have knob or wire-form handles, you can be ensured that the LidSitter will fit snug and secure.

There are 1.5 billion families worldwide with hot pots and lids to coordinate. That’s a lot of lids and pots that people are juggling every day! We’ve estimated that 3 to 6 billion lids could find homes in LidSitters. Please join me in making this dream a reality and together we can make everyone’s cooking experience a little easier and more enjoyable.
We work extremely hard to to get to this point and intend to do everything within our power to deliver our promises to you as seamless as possible.

Your pledge amount brings us one step closer to our goal. Help us bring Lid Sitter™ to your door step by clicking the ‘Back This Project’ button at the top of the page, or by helping us spread the word by sharing our page.

My name is Khanh Bui, and by day I’m an Assay Development Scientist working at a biotech company in the San Francisco Bay Area. In my free time I’m an inventor, creating solutions to everyday problems, and I have several patents pending for my inventions.
I am humbled by your interest and say THANK YOU for your help!

I developed the LidSitter in response to a dilemma that my wife and I faced working in a kitchen with limited countertop space. Following a recent back surgery, my wife’s mobility was limited. She wasn’t able to stand for long periods, turn from side to side, or move quickly in the kitchen. Cooking has always been a passion for my wife, even while living with chronic back pain. Because our house has a small kitchen with limited surface space, my wife has struggled to find places to put pot lids and tools while cooking. If she placed items on the stovetop, she risked burning herself when reaching for a lid or utensil. If she put a lid on the limited counter space, she inevitably covered up spices or knives that were then out of sight or steamed by a hot pot lid. If you’ve prepared a meal in a small kitchen, you’re familiar with this scene.

Knowing my passion for inventive problem solving, my wife asked me to create a device to keep pot lids and ladles in easy reach, ideally on a pot’s rim. As I worked night after night on the design, I lost sleep and began engineering lid holders in my dreams. As it happened, early on an April morning in 2015, the current LidSitter design came to me in a dream that woke me from sleep. I got up at three in the morning, gathered my prototyping tools, and got to work. By morning I had a functional LidSitter!

Since that morning in April, I’ve invested thousands of dollars to secure IP and the support of an experienced engineer to work out 3D plans. After six months of investing my personal time and finances, we’ve created a solid design that is functional and affordable. I’ve researched the options, and I realize that I’ll have to bring the LidSitter to life on my own. After producing prototype batches, I’m now prepared to ask for your help to bring the LidSitter to market. Your financial support will fund the next stages of product and packaging design, website development, advertising, and securing distribution venues.

","We’ve all lived with and tried to adapt to small or busy kitchens with limited counter space. Imagine your kitchen in the middle of meal preparation, with food ready to prep, kitchen tools, spices, and pot lids covering every inch. Where is that bit of extra space to put the cutting board to slice the veggies or for the bowl to mix the condiments? The LidSitter is here to help organize your kitchen space. LidSitter's unique design allows you to place lids, ladles, spoons, and other kitchen utensils securely on pot rims when not in use and quickly and easily place them back on the pots when the lids are needed.The LidSitter consists of a stainless steel wire-form and a nylon handle. One end of the wire-form design engages with the pot lid handle while the other snuggly attaches to the cooking pot’s rim. The LidSitter’s unique shape is fabricated from spring-steel that provides a secure attachment combined with flexible mobility. The spring-steel and nylon materials allow heat to dissipate from the device at a much faster rate than other metal surfaces, including the cooking pot and lid, ensuring that the LidSitter can be safely used on a gas stovetop.LidSitter Details
Materials: Nylon Handle and Stainless Steel Body

Hold Cook Book,iPad or Tablet on Counter Top . Keep cooking recipes organized and easily accessible by sitting cooking book, iPad or tablet right on the counter top using LidSitter. In addition, have your favorite cooking channel or show on while cooking.

Keep Pot Lids within Reach. For the first time, LidSitter allows lids to sit on the rim of any cooking pot. Once placed on rim, the LidSitter has the ability to slide to the left or right with a small push.
Easily move and place lid anywhere on rim for convenience
Reduce Back Strain. Reduce unnecessary back strains from over reaching and repetitive twisting and turing to pick up lids. Reaching for lids has never been easier with lid right within arm reach.

It's OK. Keep all 4 lids on the rims of the 4 cooking pots. For the first time, you can do it.Keep Cooking Lid/Utensils within Reach. LidSitter can accommodate ladles, stirring utensils, and other cooking utensils. Once a lid is attached, a large spoon can slide between the lid and the LidSitter, and a ladle can be placed on the cooking pot's rim for quick access.
Reduce Accidental Burning. Never touch a hot lid or lid handles anymore and keep lids off hot surfaces. LidSitter’s unique handle provides a safe and heat resistant surface safe enough to touch.
Without the LidSitter, you will touch that HOT lid one way or another
With the LidSitter on, you are in the clear of hot surfaces on the stove

No More Dripping Messes. Whether the lid is sitting on the rim, or closed for cooking, the condensation gathered on the lid will drain back into cooking pot, conserving liquids and avoiding drippy messes.
Use the LidSitter and make dripping messes history.

Fits Majority of Lids. LidSitter's unique design fits majority of all pot lid styles that are available at QVC, Walmart, Target and other popular big box retailers. Whether you have knob or wire-form handles, you can be ensured that the LidSitter will fit snug and secure.

There are 1.5 billion families worldwide with hot pots and lids to coordinate. That’s a lot of lids and pots that people are juggling every day! We’ve estimated that 3 to 6 billion lids could find homes in LidSitters. Please join me in making this dream a reality and together we can make everyone’s cooking experience a little easier and more enjoyable.
We work extremely hard to to get to this point and intend to do everything within our power to deliver our promises to you as seamless as possible.

Your pledge amount brings us one step closer to our goal. Help us bring Lid Sitter™ to your door step by clicking the ‘Back This Project’ button at the top of the page, or by helping us spread the word by sharing our page.

My name is Khanh Bui, and by day I’m an Assay Development Scientist working at a biotech company in the San Francisco Bay Area. In my free time I’m an inventor, creating solutions to everyday problems, and I have several patents pending for my inventions.
I am humbled by your interest and say THANK YOU for your help!

I developed the LidSitter in response to a dilemma that my wife and I faced working in a kitchen with limited countertop space. Following a recent back surgery, my wife’s mobility was limited. She wasn’t able to stand for long periods, turn from side to side, or move quickly in the kitchen. Cooking has always been a passion for my wife, even while living with chronic back pain. Because our house has a small kitchen with limited surface space, my wife has struggled to find places to put pot lids and tools while cooking. If she placed items on the stovetop, she risked burning herself when reaching for a lid or utensil. If she put a lid on the limited counter space, she inevitably covered up spices or knives that were then out of sight or steamed by a hot pot lid. If you’ve prepared a meal in a small kitchen, you’re familiar with this scene.

Knowing my passion for inventive problem solving, my wife asked me to create a device to keep pot lids and ladles in easy reach, ideally on a pot’s rim. As I worked night after night on the design, I lost sleep and began engineering lid holders in my dreams. As it happened, early on an April morning in 2015, the current LidSitter design came to me in a dream that woke me from sleep. I got up at three in the morning, gathered my prototyping tools, and got to work. By morning I had a functional LidSitter!

Since that morning in April, I’ve invested thousands of dollars to secure IP and the support of an experienced engineer to work out 3D plans. After six months of investing my personal time and finances, we’ve created a solid design that is functional and affordable. I’ve researched the options, and I realize that I’ll have to bring the LidSitter to life on my own. After producing prototype batches, I’m now prepared to ask for your help to bring the LidSitter to market. Your financial support will fund the next stages of product and packaging design, website development, advertising, and securing distribution venues.",27.0,1,"2 Campaigns

Hearts Bio was founded to create a foundation where our customers would be able to share theirs hearts to us.  What is in their hearts? Usually it's the happiness and health of their families.  We strive to change the world by increasing the comfort of those who have disorders or other ailments.

Our Founder, Joseph Kim has his background in software, biomedical, mechanical and electrical engineering from UCLA. He started Hearts Bio with the mission to make products that help people live happier, healthier and more organized lives. With the right tools, we believe everyone can take control of monitoring their own health. Ultimately, we want to create a seamless integration between our Hearts medical modules and and life itself.

ABOUT US 

Geo Shelter is a company founded by Scott Gerber, a business entrepreneur, inventor, and designer based in Sarasota, Florida. Scott was the president of several successful custom yacht design and manufacturing companies. Scott has used revolutionary construction technology to make some of the strongest, lightest, and most efficient modern nautical crafts on the market. He has also built military-grade boats used for special projects by the Navy Seals. 

 

GEO SHELTER’S STORY 

In 2010, while he was developing ballistic panels that used different combinations and densities of materials, such as kevlar and carbon fiber, to build the reinforced Navy Seal boats, he saw the effects of the earthquake that devastated Haiti. As time went on and many disaster relief efforts by various institutions failed to efficiently aid the people affected by the earthquake, Scott came up with his latest and greatest venture, Geo Shelter, a concept for a quick-response shelter primarily intended for use in emergencies and for disaster relief. He saw the potential in  the material he using and took his experience in the construction of reinforced structures to design a shelter that could be a long-lasting response to the inevitable disasters that affect millions of people each year.  

 

GEO SHELTER VS OUR COMPETITORS 

Various concepts for disaster relief exist already, but what separates our design is that our structure is made up of  tessellating, triangular, extruded panels that interlock with simple joinery which requires no construction experience or tools to assemble. The panels are made from a rigid material that insulates the structure to protect its inhabitants from inclement weather. When fully assembled, the panels create a geodesic dome, which is scientifically proven to be the most structurally sound form in architectural design. It evenly distributes pressure and it has an absolute certainty of superior strength independent of extraneous structural supports. The form also has superior aerodynamic properties making it resistant to high-speed winds. Geodesic structures are actually encouraged for dwellings that are in areas prone to earthquakes, hurricanes, mudslides, and other such natural disasters. 

 

ENVIRONMENTAL BENEFITS 

Not only is our design beneficial for structural purposes, but it also has major environment benefits. The general shape allows for more efficient air circulation, in turn using only one-third of the energy needed to cool and heat similar sized dwellings. In the event that there is any damage caused to part of the dome, our patented design of interlocking panels makes it so that individual panels are easily and quickly replaced. In less than an hour, we can have a fully functional shelter again which is much more efficient than replacing an entire structure. Our design’s ability to disassemble and reassemble these domes to be reused many times over. The individual panels also allow us to create specialized domes. For example, solar panels installed on a Geo Shelter could collect renewable energy, while glass panels could make greenhouses designated for growing food, and solid panels made exclusively from our insulated material can make perfect climate controlled storage units for perishable items. The combinations of specialized panels are endless which not only makes our design effective, but extremely versatile. With a team of two people to assemble these domes, we can build a town that is essentially self-sustaining making our design by far the most eco-friendly solution to disaster relief to date.  

 

SHIPPING 

The entrance way doubles as a shipping container for the Geo Shelter. Since each panel is completely flat, they nest on top of each other creating no wasted space and allowing the Geo Shelter to be shipped with minimum space requirements. Shipping is one of the most vital aspects of the response time of disaster relief efforts. The kits take up a very small space and several of them could be shipped out from strategic locations around the globe in times of crisis. In comparison to the FEMA trailers commonly used by the United States government in times of crisis, 40 of our kits could take the place of one of their trailers. Our kits take up 16 sq ft of floor space
column2:
comparable to the amount of space that the average lawnmower takes up in a garage. When fully assembled our domes take up approximately 300 sq. ft of floor space, which is about 10 sq ft larger than the average FEMA trailer. There is little time to waste in times of crisis when response time can be a matter of life and death. 

 

STATISTICS

column1: • Worldwide, there are currently an estimated 32.5 million people who need shelter or have been displaced due to the effects of war, poverty and/or natural disasters.
• More than 1.4 million Haitians are in need of temporary housing due to the effects of hurricane Matthew alone.
• While the US government has taken a proactive role in finding a solution for these people, unfortunately, our average reaction time is 45 days.
• A human can survive for 3 days without water, 21 days without food, but without proper shelter, it is possible that they could not survive for one 12-hour period.

There is no time to waste in times of crisis when response time can be a matter of life and death! People need quick and effective solutions in their times of crisis. Entire families are left in desperate need of shelter and medical attention while they wait for government aid.

 

OUR OBJECTIVE &
column2:
WHAT WE NEED 

At Geo Shelter, our objective is to respond to people in need swiftly with our comprehensive design. We need your support to reach our goal of $30,000 to complete a working prototype of our structure.  

Here is a breakdown of how we would use your $30,000 of contribution in order to bring this product to life:

column1: • $2500 would go to the materials needed for a working prototype
• $3500 would go to the labor of creating this prototype
• $2500 would go to the space needed for this structure
• $2500 would go to the development of our website
• $4500 would go to marketing costs (per month for 2 months)
• $10,000 would be used to grow our team to make this concept into a fully functioning company

With your help, we can make a working prototype of our patented interlocking panel design we can boost interest and investment in our project, which will help millions upon millions of people in need of housing each year.
• $10 donation you will get your name added to our email list and we will add your name to our list of contributors on our website
• With a $25 donation, you will gain private access to our Geo Shelter portal + a Geo Shelter sticker
• With a $50 donation, you will gain private access to our Geo Shelter portal + a Geo Shelter sticker + a Geo Shelter contributor certificate
• With a $75 donation, you will gain private access to our Geo Shelter portal + a Geo Shelter sticker + a Geo Shelter contributor certificate + a Geo Shelter t-shirt
• With a $100 donation, you will get access to all of the perks listed above + a 3D printed scale model of our Geo Shelter
• With a $250 donation, you will get access to all of the perks listed above + you will get an invite to a VIP launching party and dinner in Sarasota, Florida when our prototype is complete

• With a $500 donation, you will get access to all of the perks listed above + you will get an invite to a VIP launching party and dinner in Sarasota, Florida when our prototype is complete + 25% off discount off one of our Geo Shelter domes (once it is in production)

• I am your Pirate Captain, Jay Cassity Hamilton.  We want to free our fellow brothers and sisters from debt slavery and the planet from the inefficient use of resources.  We are a lifestyle brand.  That lifestyle gives you more time and money to do the things you want to do and a more enjoyable way to exist..... Build Renegade
• We want to radically change the way people live and spend their money.

• We are a startup and the things we are showing and discussing is just the tip of the iceberg of our future vision.  The money we raise will allow us to get closer to our goal of changing as many people's lives as we can.
We need money, you get know how.

• We have a list of needs and wants.  Our needs can be accomplished for as little as $70,000 our wants list becomes really interesting at $1,000,000.  If we raise $1,000,000 or more we will be able to move fast and do big things to help people take control of their lives and finances.
• Our Kit is available soon and you can already get started on changing your life.  Our Tshirts will let people know that you are part of the insurrection......

• If we don't reach our goal most of our funds will go to securing patents for the many unique innovations and design features within Renegade.  We are also going to be doing printing as the goal for the build manual is to make it readable and enjoyable.  Coffee Table book status would be nice.
• We are going to radically change the way people live.  As close to ZERO as possible.  That Zero could be your cost of living, your carbon footprint or the effort one needs to simply exist. ZEROGADE
• We built a working Prototype with a limited budget and had to invent or innovate many of the solutions along the way.
• Version 1.0 is a turnkey offgrid solution.  It is pound for pound dollar for dollar one of the greatest homes on the market

Our greatest Risk is from the traditional homebuilding side of our business plan.   We are pushing against conventional wisdom.  Our big picture goal is to build a financing wing to our company as to allow us to build and finance these for people in house. Our target is working class Americans the ones that the banks and lending institutions are less likely to help. We want to build something radically different for the people who need it most. We are going to have the conquer a lot of the challenges but we have a roadmap.

• We are qualified to do so because of our combined years of experience in alternative energy, engineering and design.  You can see what we did with a VERY limited budget.  You will be blown away with what we can do with less monetary constraints and building upon the lessons we have already learned.

• We have designed a financing vehicle to accomplish the above risk and challenges.  We know the legal framework we need to operate in and the steps we need to accomplish it. What we need now is money to make it happen.

• If you can't buy our home kit or a tshirt. TELL A FRIEND or make plans in your life to put yourself in a position to BUILD RENEGADE.  When you are ready we will help you accomplish the build. www.BuildRenegade.com

My story

I was a Rotary Exchange Student in Brasil for a year, and lived with people from all over the world. Being an exchange student its my dream to travel the world one country at a time. I dont want to just visit a country, I want to live there. Thus ill be doing a road trip for 2 months. 

Ill be flying into Usa from india( flights booked) and from usa to mexico( flight left to book).Ill be making a vlog on youtube about my travels, and you can check my plans on Facebook- (Pallav Haria)

I own a small business (@luastores) in making Tshirts, and yoga Products, but due to some reasons i am short on cash. I have saved enough to travel for a month but Ill need more.

More than a need this is my experiment.

The Reason for this Trip

Since Brasil, Its my dream to see every corner of the world, Meet the people, eat their food, play with the kids there, make friends, Drink local liquor, Dance to their music, Find LOVE of all Kinds.

I even have a tattoo of a compass

While I was in Brasil, I met some very very very special people in my life ( The ones in the pictures) and its been years since I ve seen them all, thats why Im going

Trip Plan

This is my approximate route for the Mexico trip

13th April- San francisco
21st April- puerto vallarta
Guadalajara
guanajato
Morelia
mexico city
puebla
oaxaca
merida
cancun
playa de carmen
Mumbai 9 June

If you cant fund it, I would still love to have a drink!!!

Hope you can be a part of this. 

CHEERS!

Make cleaning easier with TECBOT M1. Our revolutionary 4-in-1 technology provides vacuum, sweep, mop, and self rinse functions in one innovative robot. At the touch of a button, TECBOT M1 does it all. Simple, automatic, and convenient.

 

 

A sensor monitors the condition of the mop. It triggers an automated self rinse whenever necessary, ensuring that the mop pad is always clean and preventing contamination of the previously cleaned floor areas. Less effort, less worry!

 

 

Unlike the previous generation of robots with mop functions that required manual cleaning of the dirty mop pad, TECBOT M1 has a self rinse function that uses high-pressure water to maintain a clean mop head as it moves across the floor without returning to its base. More intelligent, more versatile, more effective!

 

 

TECBOT M1 has a unique feature that automatically lifts the mop roller when it moves from the floor to a carpeted area, preventing wetting your carpet. The mop will also lift when finished mopping and while returning to its base. It will not repeat the previously cleaned areas.

 

 

There are several modes to choose from via the app: Sweep, Mop, Heavy Mop or combine them all! The app makes it easy to select that mode that fits your unique cleaning needs.

 

 

TECBOT M1 has twice as much suction power as any typical robot vacuum on the market. Powered by a 30,000 RPM brushless motor, TECBOT M1 pulls out deeply embedded dust and dirt from your floors and carpets in one pass.

 

 

Efficiently sweep dirt and pet hair without entangling itself. Brushes adjust and flex to stay in constant contact with carpets and hardwood floors, capturing 99% of cat and dog hair—an ideal function for pet owners.

 

 

TECBOT M1 comes with an industry-leading LDS (laser navigation system) with a built-in SLAM algorithm
column2:
the floor scanning and mapping are accurate, detailed, and completed in seconds. TECBOT M1 will analyze the floor conditions in real-time and adapt to optimize routes for an efficient coverage area with a row by row cleaning path.

 

 

TECBOT M1 has built-in advanced smart sensors to map your rooms and clean them better. It scans and analyses the surroundings to create the most efficient cleaning path possible.

 

Obstacle Climb

TECBOT M1 has super stable German Covestro wear-resistant all-terrain wheels. It can ascend slopes with a gradient of 45° and 19 mm height. Nothing gets in the way!

 

Anti-drop

TECBOT M1 has sensitive cliff sensors that automatically gauge whether steps are near or the device is approaching a drop-off. It will not fall!

 

Edge Mode &
column3:
Corner Clean

Dust and dirt can easily gather in corners and edges, which are often difficult to clean up. However, TECBOT M1 shape and clean corner function are perfectly designed to clean every corner effectively. In addition, after finishing the cleaning, TECBOT M1 will run an extra edge clean to ensure nothing is left dirty.

 

Anti-collision

TECBOT M1 has an excellent obstacle avoidance system to prevent collisions. Plus, TECBOT M1 has mechanical and infrared sensors to detect walls and obstacles with a diameter of ≥ 20 mm.

 

 

Pair TECBOT M1 with its App. You can start, stop and schedule cleaning
column4:
spot clean, and set NO-GO zones from anywhere at any time. Enjoy convenient cleaning that works around your life.

 

Multi floors mapping with memory

With the App, TECBOT M1 automatically maps and remembers up to 5 different floors layouts to ensure efficient navigation on all the floors of your home.

 

Scheduled Cleaning 

You can easily schedule cleaning times and routes on your phone. Control TECBOT M1 conveniently anywhere at any time! 

 

No-go Zone

Have an area of the home that is not robot-friendly?  Simply set up a no-go zone on your app to avoid those areas.

 

Spot Cleaning

Place TECBOT M1 on a certain spot and turn it loose! In Spot Cleaning mode, the robot will concentrate its cleaning on a 1 square meter area, making two passes for enhanced cleaning. Keep your house spotless 24/7.

 

 

Auto- recharging 

TECBOT M1 can detect a low battery level and execute auto-recharging (3-4hrs from 0-100%). Then resume cleaning from where it’s been left off.

 

40db Ultra-quiet Sound

TECBOT M1 achieves a surprisingly quiet sound while working with a streamlined air-way design and a military-level noise-reducing technology. It’s just a pleasant white noise in the background.

 

1200 to 2000ft² cleaning area in one go

Powered by BYD's 5200mAh high-energy-density lithium battery, TECBOT M1 can clean 1200 to 2000 square feet in one go.

 

 

TECBOT M1 is compatible with Alexa &
column5:
Google Assistant. You can easily create cleaning schedules, change modes, or check the battery and performance with voice commands. 

 

Check out the Official  Product Announcement
column7:
showinfo=0"">

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

","Make cleaning easier with TECBOT M1. Our revolutionary 4-in-1 technology provides vacuum, sweep, mop, and self rinse functions in one innovative robot. At the touch of a button, TECBOT M1 does it all. Simple, automatic, and convenient.  A sensor monitors the condition of the mop. It triggers an automated self rinse whenever necessary, ensuring that the mop pad is always clean and preventing contamination of the previously cleaned floor areas. Less effort, less worry!  Unlike the previous generation of robots with mop functions that required manual cleaning of the dirty mop pad, TECBOT M1 has a self rinse function that uses high-pressure water to maintain a clean mop head as it moves across the floor without returning to its base. More intelligent, more versatile, more effective!  TECBOT M1 has a unique feature that automatically lifts the mop roller when it moves from the floor to a carpeted area, preventing wetting your carpet. The mop will also lift when finished mopping and while returning to its base. It will not repeat the previously cleaned areas.  There are several modes to choose from via the app: Sweep, Mop, Heavy Mop or combine them all! The app makes it easy to select that mode that fits your unique cleaning needs.  TECBOT M1 has twice as much suction power as any typical robot vacuum on the market. Powered by a 30,000 RPM brushless motor, TECBOT M1 pulls out deeply embedded dust and dirt from your floors and carpets in one pass.  Efficiently sweep dirt and pet hair without entangling itself. Brushes adjust and flex to stay in constant contact with carpets and hardwood floors, capturing 99% of cat and dog hair—an ideal function for pet owners.  TECBOT M1 comes with an industry-leading LDS (laser navigation system) with a built-in SLAM algorithm

column1:
0,"

The Mozu Hanger is a beautiful, slim, Earth-friendly hanger with an innovative notch that eliminates the stretching of collars. From baby outfits to adult shirts, the Mozu Hanger can revolutionize the way you hang your clothes.

From button-down dress shirts and polo shirts to hoodies and t-shirts, the Mozu Hanger can easily be used on a wide variety of garments and allows you to hang and remove clothing easily without unbuttoning buttons or overstretching collars.

The Mozu Hanger was designed with business professionals in mind. Whether you dry clean your clothes or you travel regularly, you know the pain of unbuttoning and buttoning shirts. With the Mozu Hanger, most button-down shirts can be put on and taken off without unbuttoning a single button.
column2:
>

Parents know the frustration of having to buy baby hangers, kid hangers, and then regular hangers as their children grow. With the Mozu Hanger, we've eliminated the need for various sizes of hangers, and we've simplified the clothes hanging experience in the process.
column3: >
column4:
>*Source: http://www.greenprogress.com/environment_articl...

 

Our wheat straw hanger is light and thin while still being strong, flexible, and highly durable. The hanger is made from 40% renewable wheat straw material, an agricultural bi-product, making it a great alternative to conventional plastics.

*Please note that the premium bamboo Mozu Hangers are no longer available

Conventional plastic hangers are cheap and very flimsy, whereas the Mozu Hangers are strong and durable enough to last a lifetime. 

The design of the Mozu Hanger offers a variety of features to make your life easier, and it is so unique that we were awarded a US Patent.

The Mozu Hanger is approximately 16.2” long and 8.1"" tall, and is about 0.23″ thick at the top and 0.17″ thick at the bottom. The notch-to-shoulder length is about 6.875” long.

*Please note that the premium bamboo Mozu Hangers are no longer available

Childhood friends Tim Lee and Michael Graham teamed up to pursue their lifelong dream of starting a design company together, which they named Ensu Design. They leveraged their backgrounds in design and engineering and set off to redesign everyday products by incorporating beautiful design, innovative functionality, and environmental consciousness. The Mozu Hanger is the first embodiment of their design philosophy.

Timothy Lee – Engineer + Co-Creator   

After earning degrees in mechanical engineering from Columbia and the University of Washington, Tim spent several years in the aerospace and automotive industries as an engineer and fabricator. Now, he is a proud military spouse and stay-at-home dad by day and a technology consultant and product development engineer by night. He’s passionate about innovation and holds five patents (additional pending), and he recently earned his EMBA from Quantic.

Michael Graham – Designer + Co-Creator   

Since studying industrial and graphic design at the Art Institute, Michael has been a graphic designer and art director for several top media and marketing companies as well as for an international fine minerals dealer. He was also a topographic analyst in the United States Army, with two combat tours to Iraq. He is a proud father, and he is passionate about design.

Although the Mozu Hanger was originally intended to be an internal test project and nothing more, its functionality and simplicity proved to be so inspiring that we decided to bring it to market.

The problem statement was simple: plastic hangers are primarily made from petroleum, and they typically end up in landfills. Therefore, the first objective was to make the clothing hanger more sustainable. Through extensive research, bamboo and wheat straw were determined to be extremely promising materials. Bamboo is one of the most sustainable materials on the planet, and wheat straw is a strong and economical bioplastic that is made of 40% renewable content, making both materials ideal for an eco-friendly hanger.

The second objective was to identify a problem with conventional clothing hangers and solve it. The problem we chose was the stretching of tight-necked shirts and collars. By incorporating a notch into the body of the hanger, shirts could be slid past the center-point and removed with ease. This simple but highly effective solution eliminates the stretching of collars and allows for the hanging and removal of most buttoned shirts, even with top buttons buttoned. The design of the notch is so effective that it works on baby clothes as well.

Through refinement, prototypes, and evaluations, our design became what is now known as the Mozu Hanger, a beautifully designed, slim, eco-friendly hanger that revolutionizes the way you hang your clothes. “Mozu” (pronounced moh-zoo) is a modification of the word “Moso,” which is the species of bamboo most commonly used for manufacturing. We are excited to introduce the patented Mozu Hanger, and we hope that everyone will appreciate its beauty, functionality, and sustainability as much as we do! 

 

Risks and challenges

We have an overseas manufacturer lined up for production, and the injection molding tooling has already been made. Production samples in both wheat straw and bamboo have already been received and approved. As always, the project timeline is estimated. Any delays in production, shipping, customs, or fulfillment will shift the timeline to the right, which of course can result in delays. COVID-19 has had a significant global impact on both manufacturing and logistics, which we have done our best to account for in our estimates. Of course, we will continue to keep you posted as everything happens.

 

Environmental commitments

LONG-LASTING DESIGN

Using high-quality, durable materials and designs.

REUSABILITY AND RECYCLABILITY

Using highly renewable materials and agricultural bi-products, and using minimal, recyclable packaging materials.

SUSTAINABLE MATERIALS

Wheat straw (40% renewable material, agricultural bi-product)

column1:
0,"

We’re thrilled to offer you Aden - our side table, Baltic - our coffee table and Ceram - our set of hooks. On Indiegogo, we are providing you with an opportunity to get these items at an introductory discount price as a thank you for supporting our campaign.

Aden:

This little guy is the one you imagined while staring at your cluttered side table. It can easily become wider in just a few minutes —  allowing you to double its lower cubby capacity, and have twice as much surface area for books or that lamp you always wanted within reach. Breaks down and is back up in minutes for moving day.

Aden is 28 inches tall and 19 inches deep. The accompanying hardware will allow you to assemble it to a width of 18 inches or 12 inches.

Baltic:

Baltic is love child of sturdy and style. The coffee table that literally expands with your growing life. Enjoy its sleek avatar as a single surface, and use the shelf to hold wine, books or toys. 

Baltic is 20 inches tall, 36 inches across and 18 inches deep. 

Ceram:

Inspired by Kandinsky. These decorative wall hooks will keep your jackets, bags and other knick- knacks off the floor.

 

Color options for Aden &
column2:
Baltic

*Aden also available in Black

What makes us different?

One size doesn’t fit all:

-Every space is unique and one size does not fit all. By using modern digital fabrication techniques for manufacturing, we are able to create furniture that can actively change sizes to suit your needs.

Quality at affordable prices:

-Our furniture is built from real wood - birch plywood and uses stainless steel hardware. It’s built to last you many years and also will not burn a hole through your pocket.

Assembly:

-Most of us often don’t have the time or the skill to assemble the furniture we buy these days. When buying new furniture for a home, assembly itself can take a few harrowing days. We want to make it incredibly simple for you to be able to both, assemble and disassemble furniture. We believe it should come apart as easily as it went together so that it can be moved, packed and stored, if required.

Too much waste when you outgrow your furniture:  

We want to be part of a movement where we build things that last. People are moving more frequently now than ever before. Our furniture is built to easily move and since it is modular, its configuration can be changed so that it can fit into a new space with incredible ease. You don’t have to discard your Pirate Duck Designs’ furniture just because you are moving!

                            

How it works:

We design our furniture in slim easy to assemble sections. Each section is cut from real wood precisely and efficiently using a CNC (Computer Numerical Control) router. A complete item is assembled by sliding the individual sections onto metal rods, which aligns them. They are held together by bolts on either end. This allows for quick assembly and disassembly. Sizes can be altered simply by changing the number of sections used. This guarantees you will have the perfect fit for your space.

CNC manufacturing allows us to simplify the production process, lowers production time and reduces material waste. This is more cost efficient in comparison with traditional furniture manufacturing techniques, allowing us to offer a quality product to you at a reasonable price.

                                         Individual sections of Aden
column4:
showinfo=0"">
 

Why are we on Indiegogo?

On Indigogo, our campaign offers you introductory pricing and early access to our unique pieces of furniture. Funds raised via your orders and backing will jumpstart our production run, and launch our own web store.  The web store will feature an interactive 3D design interface for customization of a larger range of products.

 

 

 

Pirate Duck Designs' future, post Indiegogo:

We will use the funds from a successful Indiegogo campaign to build and launch our own e-store with a product line which pretty much covers the furniture requirements for you. You will be able to customize the type and size of furniture pieces that you need in an interactive 3D platform with real time feedback.

We like to think of our products as an ecosystem of furniture pieces, which can evolve with your changing requirements over time. If a new place needs a larger piece of furniture or even a smaller one, you can get the extra pieces and new hardware from us at a fraction of the cost of a new piece to make this change yourself.

You could also give a new look to your existing pieces by using the same process.

 

Risks

The risk, as in any product launch, is that the campaign does not garner the expected support and we are not able to create the eco-system for a while. We would then need to make changes and look for alternate funding. Nevertheless, your products, as ordered through the campaign. will be delivered to you as committed
column5:
but your ability to resize these in the future may get delayed.  

 

How else you can support us

It would be amazing if you can spread the word about Pirate Duck Designs and this campaign. Talk about us, share on email, facebook, twitter or any other social media outlets you use. Come check us out on Instagram. 

Also, we'd love to hear from you (info@pirateduckdesigns.com) about what appeals to you, what doesn't or even if you just want to find out how a duck goes about becoming a pirate.

column1: Multifunctional - Prep, Freeze, Cook and Bake with Ease.
EL DINE streamlines the entire cooking process. You can prep, freeze, bake, eat, store and reheat in the same container, eliminating the need for multiple dishes or plastic bags.

All of us know the feeling, you have cooked too much food and you never have the right size of storage can at hand which means half empty storage cans or freezer bags in your freezer, taking way too much space. 
When you want to heat up the food again - often the frozen portion is too much. You only need one option, eat half of it and throw away the other half. What a waste!

With EL DINE, this daily routine is a thing of the past. You have three sizes in various colors for every occasion, made out of 100% sustainable material. And the clean-up is even easier: put them in the dishwasher when you are done.

You can use EL DINE in the freezer, oven, microwave or even boiling water - with the one-slide mechanism you can decide, how you want to store or heat up your food. 
It is hands-off cooking at its best.

Conveniently stack and store when filled, perfect for any size freezer.
EL DINE's modular and compact design maximizes storage space in any freezer, fridge or kitchen cabinet.

EL DINE comes in three sizes, 2x500ml (2x16oz) / 4x250ml (4x8oz) / 12x30ml (12x1oz), and various colors - The two large (500ml/16oz and 250ml/8oz) container sizes were constructed to slide into one another to match exactly with your daily needs. Enjoy a delicious curry in your 500ml (16oz) - and fresh rice as a side dish in your 250ml (8oz) container.
When you prepare the porridge for your baby or your favorite bolognese for lunch, with a flick of the wrist you can take a portion out of the freezer and warm it up.

Easy to clean and dishwasher-safe.
EL DINE is vegan and naturally non-stick and made with 100% FDA-approved, high-grade platinum silicone material and does not have an artificial chemical coating like other freezing bags or baking pans that release chemicals into the food or dangerous fumes into the air when heated. 
The trays and lids can withstand high oven - (450°F/232°C) and freezing temperatures (-58°F/-50°C). Food perfectly cooks each time without sticking to the trays. When you are finished, put the trays and lids in the dishwasher to clean.

Take an EL DINE tray with you to the office and easily heat up your lunch in the Microwave. Do not worry, due to the spill-protected lid, nothing can happen on the way. With the one-slide mechanism you can decide which meal you want to enjoy. 
Eliminate single-use consumables such as freezer and plastic bags, take-out containers that cannot be recycled.

We are two passionate foodies and we love to cook. The problem we faced with freezer bags or even silicone trays is that the material is thin, flimsy, and sags when food and water is put into it. And on top of that, we were not able to find the perfect sized tray for us. 
That is why we developed EL DINE - trays that can be used for any food portion, whether baby food, sauces, soups, meals, ice cubes or even cakes, with us everyone finds his lid.
In average, a single household uses 50 freezing bags per a year. Calculated to Switzerland with a total of 3.6 Mio. households, thats 180 million bags per year.
That has to sink in a little!
Close to our heart is the trillion trees joint venture which protects, restores and end deforestation. And we want to pay forward to protect this beautiful world.
","Multifunctional - Prep, Freeze, Cook and Bake with Ease.
EL DINE streamlines the entire cooking process. You can prep, freeze, bake, eat, store and reheat in the same container, eliminating the need for multiple dishes or plastic bags.

All of us know the feeling, you have cooked too much food and you never have the right size of storage can at hand which means half empty storage cans or freezer bags in your freezer, taking way too much space. When you want to heat up the food again - often the frozen portion is too much. You only need one option, eat half of it and throw away the other half. What a waste!

With EL DINE, this daily routine is a thing of the past. You have three sizes in various colors for every occasion, made out of 100% sustainable material. And the clean-up is even easier: put them in the dishwasher when you are done.

You can use EL DINE in the freezer, oven, microwave or even boiling water - with the one-slide mechanism you can decide, how you want to store or heat up your food. It is hands-off cooking at its best.
Conveniently stack and store when filled, perfect for any size freezer.EL DINE's modular and compact design maximizes storage space in any freezer, fridge or kitchen cabinet.

EL DINE comes in three sizes, 2x500ml (2x16oz) / 4x250ml (4x8oz) / 12x30ml (12x1oz), and various colors - The two large (500ml/16oz and 250ml/8oz) container sizes were constructed to slide into one another to match exactly with your daily needs. Enjoy a delicious curry in your 500ml (16oz) - and fresh rice as a side dish in your 250ml (8oz) container.
When you prepare the porridge for your baby or your favorite bolognese for lunch, with a flick of the wrist you can take a portion out of the freezer and warm it up.

Easy to clean and dishwasher-safe.EL DINE is vegan and naturally non-stick and made with 100% FDA-approved, high-grade platinum silicone material and does not have an artificial chemical coating like other freezing bags or baking pans that release chemicals into the food or dangerous fumes into the air when heated. The trays and lids can withstand high oven - (450°F/232°C) and freezing temperatures (-58°F/-50°C). Food perfectly cooks each time without sticking to the trays. When you are finished, put the trays and lids in the dishwasher to clean.

Take an EL DINE tray with you to the office and easily heat up your lunch in the Microwave. Do not worry, due to the spill-protected lid, nothing can happen on the way. With the one-slide mechanism you can decide which meal you want to enjoy. Eliminate single-use consumables such as freezer and plastic bags, take-out containers that cannot be recycled.

We are two passionate foodies and we love to cook. The problem we faced with freezer bags or even silicone trays is that the material is thin, flimsy, and sags when food and water is put into it. And on top of that, we were not able to find the perfect sized tray for us. That is why we developed EL DINE - trays that can be used for any food portion, whether baby food, sauces, soups, meals, ice cubes or even cakes, with us everyone finds his lid.
In average, a single household uses 50 freezing bags per a year. Calculated to Switzerland with a total of 3.6 Mio. households, thats 180 million bags per year.
That has to sink in a little!
Close to our heart is the trillion trees joint venture which protects, restores and end deforestation. And we want to pay forward to protect this beautiful world.

column3:
>Have you ever interacted with a child who lives in a remote village that does not have electricity? Can you imagine what future that child has that cannot study, access internet, connect to world and lacks basic awareness? We want to change that and give every child an opportunity to not lose to darkness and build an educated career. We cannot support each and every child, but a few hundred to start with would be a great change. Please try to help as many kids as you can !!

Supporting Children!

Solar lamps are an excellent way to ensure that children are able to study in un-electrified villages. We are developing high quality Solar lamps that are sturdy, cheap and last more than 3 years. We are paying immense attention to the life and quality of these lamps and committed to make these lamps multi-purpose to even light up the house when the children do not need it for studying. Each night, for 6 hours, these lamps will provide lighting for studying, cooking, cleaning etc!!

column1: Most of your contribution will go directly towards lamp cost for the kid. After paying Indegogo fee, We will keep 20% of your donation as development fee, distribution channels, administration, packaging, organizing distribution events and creating certificates and photographs and shipping.

Each of the contributor will know exactly where his donation has gone and which child is he supporting. We will send an interesting Thanks certificate signed by the child to you, and his/her photograph
column2: and it will be a permanent token of your goodwill towards these children. And as they say - There is no gift like gift of Light !

column1: We have worked out with 50$ contribution from you, we will be able to cover our development charges per lamp and deliver that lamp to the child. This will be well run program coordinated with Schools, and you will be intimated at every step.

The Impact

I have been working in Rural electrification for many years now. This is my passion, dream and career. I have created many successful projects to electrify entire village or schools or communities. Still, the most motivating factor that convinces me to continue working is the children and their education.
2012 Global Green game changers as 10 leading innovators

While we cannot electrify an entire village at the pace we would want to, we can still enable the students to study better and create better and aware citizens. A single solar lamp, mere 50$ , is all it takes to change a life for years. Providing support to a child to study, conquer darkness and emerge as a winner and be better prepared for life ahead.
The impact is enormous and far reaching ! Imagine how life would be for you without light and what all would you lose. And now imagine what all that child can achieve if he has the gift of light !

What if we do not reach our mark !

If we are not able to raise required funds, we will not be able to show the overall impact that light can bring into educating children in remote areas. The impact assessment will be much better if we are able to give lamps to thousands of kids and then see how the entire area performs better not only compared to previous years but other areas which do not have these lamps for children.
For this idea to shape up, for us to raise even more funds to impact more lives and children, THIS mark has to be reached !!

Other Ways You Can Help

You can always reach out to organizations who can help in this effort with technology, advice, data and even popularizing this campaign. Any help is great help :)

in Prague and worked for a while in Italy.   As an architect she was always fascinated

<h4>Ing. Bohumil Liba - mechanical design engineer and father<span style=""color: rgb(106, 106, 106)
entrepreneur who settled down or cooperated in several successful businesses.
He is mechanical engineer and designer who transforms his technical way of
thinkung together with aesthetic sense into beautiful custom interiors and
furniture design. He was always keen on connecting smart and usefull with
beautiful and aesthetic through sophisticated technical details. In 2013, on
the pilgrimage route to Santiago de Compostella, he realized again that everyone
has to do what he does with joy and love. How simple it seems to be and at the
same time man tends to forget it easily under pressure of the daily stress. And
there he restarted and came back to develop for you with love a concept of
magnetically clamped and cleverly modulating cabinets.

architect Martina Libova came up with idea of a home design product that is
change your home easily and quickly

in Prague and worked for a while in Italy.   As an architect she was always fascinated

Ing. Bohumil Liba - mechanical design engineer and father
entrepreneur who settled down or cooperated in several successful businesses.
He is mechanical engineer and designer who transforms his technical way of
thinkung together with aesthetic sense into beautiful custom interiors and
furniture design. He was always keen on connecting smart and usefull with
beautiful and aesthetic through sophisticated technical details. In 2013, on
the pilgrimage route to Santiago de Compostella, he realized again that everyone
has to do what he does with joy and love. How simple it seems to be and at the
same time man tends to forget it easily under pressure of the daily stress. And
there he restarted and came back to develop for you with love a concept of
magnetically clamped and cleverly modulating cabinets.
Help Us To Make It Happen

Help YaCUBE : The first really modular home furniture and the team!                70% of funds will be used to present our idea on Salone del Mobile Milan    2016 exhibition and the rest to upgrade SVK to EU patent  .                                         If our funds goals aren't reached , we will upgrade our patent only.
Remember to use the IndieGoGo share tools, they really work!

Be a part of solar energy movement! Help us to get this house production ready! :)

The Landholder Solar House is 100% solar powered and is, what we like to call it an active house. It is a new type of smart home where everything has multiple functions. This kind of houses would help people towards more sustainable way of living and reduce the cost of energy.
The concept house is created with years of close observation considering and understanding that the way we have built houses over the last decades is no more fully satisfying.  
The prototype was finished in 2011 and following years were used for testing. This  house has gone through testing and taught us a lot about building and setting up the house.

The form of the house has been developed based on the idea of building from inside to the outside. Outside is a guarding space and holding the house together but inside is the space for living. The sphere has the smallest surface area of all surfaces that enclose a given volume, and it encloses the largest volume among all closed surfaces with a given surface area. 

The Idea

The prototype house for testing is engineered by Tõnis Kasemägi, and we love it! The idea was born in early 2005. Development took few years before the building began. In 2011 the prototype was ready and since then there has been a frequent interest in this project. The prototype has been featured in Estonian TV and Estonian design papers.

Until today Tõnis Kasemägi has used his personal funds to bring the Landholder Solar House into existence. In order to start manufacturing further steps need to be taken.

Our dream is to produce different models and scales of solar houses, which can take off the pressures of having have to worry about the energy need. This house can function in synthesis with nature and help this world to ease the need of fossil fuels.

With current technology, we can make different modifications of solar houses. The houses can be used as singular off grid or on grid houses, but also can be set up as groups of solar houses. For example, to the prototype sphere section another spere can be added. This doubles the amount of solar panels and the living space.

What does this house do?

Current prototype has 24 solar panels on its outer wall. The solar panels are hooked to 24 batteries which are located in the prism section (garage). This can provide 48h worth of energy when it is pitch black outside. The solar panels obtain energy from the early morning sun until the very last rays of light.

We live in a four season country Estonia, which means during the three winter months the solar energy levels are lower. During that period of time the energy can be bought from local electrical company or produced by a generator. During the summer the excessive energy can be sold.

Building one house takes 5 men, 2 trucks, 1 month and est. 150 000-200 000 eur (prices can range depending on extras)

This current prototype has one bedroom, 2 bathrooms (one with shower room), sauna, living room/kitchen area, garage, storage room. 

(Possibility to add extra bedroom and office)

Why do we need you?

So far this house has been one man's solo project but in order to start manufacturing this type of houses we need to hire staff to get the house production read and to coach the team of builders. Since the particular house was finished in 2011  we have had a lot of new inspiration and ideas in order to bring this house up to date.

Bringing this project to life would mean that this kind of houses would be available for people to purchase and therefore help the world towards more sustainable path and way of living, and also enjoy the luxury of not worrying about the cost of energy.

Funds go towards getting this house production ready. We need to map out the line of how we work, updating the house with most recent technology and materials.

We need to figure out most economical way to produce the houses in order to manufacture and to bring the cost of the houses down.

For under 100 000 we will seek professional help, to gather a team and find passionate people to take the next steps to move forwards. Also find investors and make promo models.

Over 100 000 we will finalize one Solar House and get it production ready.

500 000 we will make the variations of Solar Houses production ready and will start pre selling limited amount of houses.

1 000 000 We will make custom version of our Solar House so every person can custom Solar House for their personal needs. This also allows us to produce houses with lower cost.

2 000 000 We will get the price even lower and start manufacturing as soon as the house gets  production ready. We will make 7 versions of the house and lower the costs of building abroad. Also we will make a custom version of the house which you can add to your current house. 

Also our final  goal includes special edition house, which is transportable via helicopter to places cars cannot reach, in order to make off grid living possibility where it has not been before.

Who are we?

We are Tõnis Kasemägi and Taavi Kasemägi, father and son. Our aim is to bring the manufacturing of solar houses to reality. Tõnis Kasemägi has funded the building of a prototype and personally observed the last 4 years, therefore we would like to point out that this a project very close to our hearts.

The purpose of this campaign is to raise money for replicating Gerald's Energy Amplification Experiments.
We are an independent group of engineers, mechanics, scientists, not
affiliated with Gerald Morin, who are in the process of replicating
Gerald Morin's work. The monies raised will go directly to sourcing
So far we have 3 groups of scientists working loosely together towards replication.
One of the experiments that we seek to replicate is the “pole pig” experiment.
In this experiment, Gerald generates ~3000 watts of electricity from a generator and powers ~6000 watts of devices.
This video is the “pole pig” experiment we are replicating. (note, we are not affiliated with the group freenaturalenergy@gmail.com or Gerald Morin)
In order to properly replicate this experiment we are looking at costs of
All of our results will be published to the public.
These videos below from Gerald's youtube channel, provide more
explanation of the energy amplification technique we are seeking to
This is one of the original experiments Gerald has done to prove that he is amplifying the energy from his batteries.
Here is a recent interview with Gerald
Thank you for helping us to find Over Unity Energy devices that will run
an average size home. At first the project Should produce around 3500
watts of excess power and from there we can tune the coils.
Stay tuned. We hope the world will be a brighter place in the future.

Hi, I', David Coles inventor of The Lit-Lid 360 and I think it is a revolution in Bicycle lighting &
We make it easy for cyclists to be seen AND communicate their intentions to the world.
We designed this lightweight, transferable unit with 360 degrees of LED panels to look more like a TV screen than a light. Our unit mounts on any helmet,  then, all you do is say
column2: “signal left” and a set of day-bright, iconic indicators step-flash your intention to turn or merge left. To turn off, simply say “signal off” A beeping sound is also activated when any function is on so the rider and pedestrians are aware.
Signal Left, Signal Right, and Hazard. And completely hack-able.

column1: 360s is only LED panel lighting with an on/off switch
360vr adds voice-activated turn signals, allowing the rider to communicate their intentions to the world &

column2: rear cameras, an accelerometer feeding to a Micro SD card &amp
column3: BLE for add on indicators. This model allows the rider to capture crucial data in case of crash or download and share a particular ride.

column1: We have purposely made our units modular, interchangeable &
column2: hack-able. Change color scheme, or lighting timing, brightness or voice commands.
