column1: Top 10 Reasons to get a Lit-Lid 360 TODAY
1. LED panel lighting captures and holds the attention of pedestrians &
column2: drivers like a rock star on TV .

column1: 2. Mounts on any helmet placing lights above most obscuring vehicles and structures
3. 360 degrees of lighting allows Rider to be seen from any angle.
4. Voice activated signaling allows the rider to communicate intentions to pedestrians and motorists, hands-free.
5. Hack-able programming allows the user to program color schemes like team colors.   As well as adding additional sequencing voice commands.
6. Encourages personal Transportation users to wear a helmet.
8. You will look soooo cool. Wearing the prototype, I get positive shout-outs for my entire ride.
9. It just might save your live.

column2: Lit-Lid 360 will make the world a better place

column1: With your help, we can significantly improve cycle visibility.And improve the cycle/auto relationship.
How many lives do you think can be saved or injuries avoided, with this simple, but effective, lighting technology and configuration?

• Bicyclist injuries in 2013: 48,000 (NHTSA Traffic Safety Facts)
    Increase in bicyclist injuries between 2001 and 2011: 8.9 percent
    The total cost of bicyclist injury and death is over $4 billion per year (National Safety Council)
• If we can reduce these statistics by 1% we save the nation $40 million, 480 injuries, and 7 lives. Now that's a legacy!

There are 2 big challenges we need to overcome. the first challenge is getting the word out to enough of the cycling/personal transportation community. And the second challenge is to get the world to understand that this is truly a revolution is lighting that includes signaling.
• We are depending on YOU to help solve both of the challenges.
<li>These challenges are overcome by YOU supporting this campaign, and then passing the word along to as many as you can. early &amp
• Once YOU have you unit wear it, when the public sees the unit in action the revolution of it will be apperent.
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
• PLEASE get the word out and make some noise about This campaign.
• Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!
Hi, I', David Coles inventor of The Lit-Lid 360 and I think it is a revolution in Bicycle lighting & signaling. I hope you'll agree.
We make it easy for cyclists to be seen AND communicate their intentions to the world.
We designed this lightweight, transferable unit with 360 degrees of LED panels to look more like a TV screen than a light. Our unit mounts on any helmet,  then, all you do is say
column2: “signal left” and a set of day-bright, iconic indicators step-flash your intention to turn or merge left. To turn off, simply say “signal off” A beeping sound is also activated when any function is on so the rider and pedestrians are aware.
Signal Left, Signal Right, and Hazard. And completely hack-able.

column1: 360s is only LED panel lighting with an on/off switch
360vr adds voice-activated turn signals, allowing the rider to communicate their intentions to the world & be better roadway citizens.

360vr Black Box adds front & rear cameras, an accelerometer feeding to a Micro SD card & BLE for add on indicators. This model allows the rider to capture crucial data in case of crash or download and share a particular ride.
We have purposely made our units modular, interchangeable & hack-able. Change color scheme, or lighting timing, brightness or voice commands.
What We Need & What You Get
This is round 1 of the Lit-Lid 360 campaign:

The inventor of this product has been funding it solely out-of-pocket. So, the first thing that has to happen is to put some advertising dollars behind this campaign. If people know that this product exists & just how much of a revolution it is in Bike/roadway citizenry it is, this device will soon be everywhere.
Then, the organization has got to get caught up on some bills & do some organizational legal housekeeping.
Next we need to have the molding tool made, Have the supporting bands made & have the electronics board built(designs & step drawings complete)
Next, all the parts are brought to our NW Pennsylvania manufacturer & assembled for distribution, all while proving that the product is sale-able.
Top 10 Reasons to get a Lit-Lid 360 TODAY
1. LED panel lighting captures and holds the attention of pedestrians & drivers like a rock star on TV .
2. Mounts on any helmet placing lights above most obscuring vehicles and structures
3. 360 degrees of lighting allows Rider to be seen from any angle.
4. Voice activated signaling allows the rider to communicate intentions to pedestrians and motorists, hands-free.
5. Hack-able programming allows the user to program color schemes like team colors.   As well as adding additional sequencing voice commands.
6. Encourages personal Transportation users to wear a helmet.
8. You will look soooo cool. Wearing the prototype, I get positive shout-outs for my entire ride.
9. It just might save your live.

column2: Lit-Lid 360 will make the world a better place

column1: With your help, we can significantly improve cycle visibility.And improve the cycle/auto relationship.
How many lives do you think can be saved or injuries avoided, with this simple, but effective, lighting technology and configuration?

Bicyclist injuries in 2013: 48,000 (NHTSA Traffic Safety Facts)Increase in bicyclist injuries between 2001 and 2011: 8.9 percentThe total cost of bicyclist injury and death is over $4 billion per year (National Safety Council)
Bicyclist deaths in 2013: 743 (NHTSA Traffic Safety Facts).
If we can reduce these statistics by 1% we save the nation $40 million, 480 injuries, and 7 lives. Now that's a legacy!

There are 2 big challenges we need to overcome. the first challenge is getting the word out to enough of the cycling/personal transportation community. And the second challenge is to get the world to understand that this is truly a revolution is lighting that includes signaling.
We are depending on YOU to help solve both of the challenges.
These challenges are overcome by YOU supporting this campaign, and then passing the word along to as many as you can. early & often.
Once YOU have you unit wear it, when the public sees the unit in action the revolution of it will be apperent.
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
PLEASE get the word out and make some noise about This campaign.
Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!",3.0,0,"1 Campaign
A barbecue has to be a complete experience for everyone – also the host.
Avoid the stressful endeavor to achieve good cooking results with the CookPerfect Intelligent Meat Thermometer.

What makes CookPerfect unique, is how the thermometer measures the temperature in up to five places in the meat, and then mathematically calculates the core temperature (the coldest spot in the meat). Hereby you no longer have to worry of placing the tip of thermometer precisely in the core of the meat to achieve the desired result. You can now ensure perfectly cooked meat on the grill every time, regardless how its placed in the meat!
With the CookPerfect Intelligent Meat Thermometer and the accompanying App you can setup, cook and serve the perfect meal every time - It has never been more simple to grill as Champion!
Insert the CookPerfect Intelligent Meat Thermometer properly into the meat and start your cooking process. After cooking in 5 minutes the App has calculated when the meat is ready to be served.
Achieve perfect cooking result without any concerns, relax and enjoy your cooking time with friends and family.

The CookPerfect Intelligent Meat Thermometer has a build-in probe for measuring the air temperature in your grill, thus you can monitor the outer cooking temperature and get alarms if the air temperature gets above or below specified limits.

The CookPerfect meat thermometer work with Grills, Ovens and Smokers. It even work with small cuts of meat, so if you want to cook your small cut of meat to perfection for example on a Pan CookPerfect will flawless and provide perfect results.
It has never been more simple to set, monitor and achieve perfect cooking results every time.
Simply connect the thermometer to the receiver, open your CookPerfect App on your mobile device, and you are ready to setup the cooking process.
Choose between 3 different options for obtaining the cooking result - Meat temperature, Pre-select and Visual.
Meat temperature - you know what core temperature you want for your meat, simply enter the temperature and you are ready to Go!

Pre-Select – you know which style you want (for example medium cooked beef), simply push the pre-selected style you prefer and you are ready to go - you even have the option to adjust the temperature, if you want to fine tune the cooking result.

Visual select – you dont know exactly which temperature you want, but you know what it should look like when finished. Simply swipe between the different images and select the result you want and you are ready to Go! Different images for different types of meat.
With the CookPerfect App is very easy to customize and monitor your cooking process.
The App will let you know after 5 minutes when the meat is done and ready to be served.
You can define alerts for both time and temperature warnings, thus you can prepare everything in advance and serve your perfect meal at the same time.
The App also include an activity log where you can save, load and share your personal cooking profiles.
CookPerfect presented in media and by users:
With CookPerfect it’s plug and play - simply plugin the thermometer properly into the meat, choose type of meat and cooking result, push start cooking and you are ready to go.
Relax and enjoy the cooking time with friends and family. No need to worry if your thermometer is placed in the core of the meat.
The App will let you know when you are ready to serve the perfect meal - simple perfection!
Cooking pork to perfection has been even more challenging as the color of the meat depending of temperature almost looks the same.
Using CookPerfect Intelligent Meat Thermometer you can now avoid overcooking the meat and in stead cook juicy pork tenderloin, as you now are in control of the meat's core temperature.

Cooking meat with complex structures as fat marbling and fibres is really challenging using regular thermometers, especially as the meat changes shape during the cooking time. The Grill is often opened and closed, the thermometer is inserted into the meat in different places in an attempt to measure the core temperature – and yet, the result is not quite what you’d hoped for.

The CookPerfect Intelligent Meat Thermometer makes it simple to cook these types of meat to perfection. Simply place the thermometer in the meat, close the grill and wait for the App's message that the meat is ready to be served.

The CookPerfect meat thermometer work with Grills, Ovens and Smokers. It can also be used to cook small cuts of meat on you Pan to perfection. Furthermore the CookPerfect works with 2 thermometers, thus you perfectly can cook to type of meats.
How does the CookPerfect Intelligent Meat Thermometer work?
The secret is a specially developed algorithm (mathematically calculation)
In order to get good cooking results you need to control the meats core temperature.
The meats cooking temperature equals the core temperature (the coldest spot in the meat) – so to achieve a good cooking result it is essential to measure the core temperature of the meat correctly.

Usually, when you place a regular thermometer in the meat, the temperature is only measured at the tip of the thermometer. Therefore you need to be sure to place it precisely in the core of the meat. This is something you cannot determine before the cooking process begins due to the meat's complexity. If you cannot guarantee measuring the core (the coldest spot) you cannot guarantee to be in control of the core temperature.

Measuring the core temperature is thereby a complicated process. In fact, missing the core by one centimeter can result in a difference of 10 degrees Celcius, and there is a world of difference between 54 and 64 degrees Celcius – the difference between medium rare and medium done.

What makes the CookPerfect Intelligent Meat Thermometer so unique is how the thermometer measures the temperature in up to five places in the meat and then mathematically calculates the core temperature, You are thereby not dependent on a precise placement of the thermometer in the meat's core as the core temperature will be calculated regardless of the placement. Thereby you will always be guaranteed measurement of the core temperature.
When knowing the meats core temperature our special developed algorithm also inform you when the meat will be finished and ready to be served based on the settings you chose in the accompanying app.
We have always loved barbeque. That feeling of anticipation you get from the sight and smell of thick juicy cuts of meat sizzling on the grill.
Sadly though, the result hasn't always matched those expectations.
We had become increasingly irritated over the fact that there wasn’t a better tool available to simply achieve perfect cooking result every time.
From talking about it we discovered there were many others who shared our frustrations. Their grill thermometers lay unused in a drawer, because they didn’t help achieve good cooking results.
So we decided to act and began working on the development of the CookPerfect thermometer.
Overview of how the Funds will go
Through strong cooperation with our production partner we have already successfully built, tested and verified parts based on prototype tooling – including Hardware.
Furthermore we have manufactured a small batch of products for field test users around the World, therefore we are certain to deliver products according to our promises.
We have brought this project very far but for us to move into final stage and start mass production we need your support to obtain a successful campaign for realizing the project.
Kasper Kristensen and Martin Kloster are the founders of CookPerfect and long time friends.

""The idea began in annoyance of how complicated it was to achieve perfectly cooked meat on the grill using the regular meat thermometers available on the market. Like many Danes, we love to barbecue, but have too often experienced that the delicious meat on our barbecues were over- or undercooked, despite always using meat thermometers. We thought there had to be a simpler and better way, and that idea resulted in the CookPerfect.

Martin Kloster: From 2001 to 2010 worked as entrepreneur with successful commercialization of technology projects. From 2011 to 2016 employed in a large Danish company as Senior project manager with overall responsibility to lead and drive global cross functional project teams to secure project’s time to market, budget and quality.

Kasper Kristensen: From 2010 to 2015 worked as Regional CFO in a large international company and lately worked as finance manager in a medium sized Danish Company. Both leading positions in international trading and manufacturing companies giving experience within all aspects of financial management combined with management and board work.

column2: />Ion Marqvardsen has played a very important role in the developing the Worlds most intelligent meat thermometer. Ion's primarily expertise is mathematic. A big credit to Ion as he has played an important role in developing our unique algorithm which makes cooking of meat to perfection very simple. On top of this, then Ion is highly skilled in design of antennas - our antenna design makes our Bluetooth communication very robust even over longer distances - superior to our competitors.

column1: Also behind the scene are several specialists with expertise in their field, working hard to make the CookPerfect Meat Thermometer the most sophisticated thermometer available. The engineers are experts within: Mechanical design, Product ID design, Software and Hardware design.
Within project development of mechanical designs the big risks often lays hidden within the phases from conceptual design to releasing the design for tooling.
With integration of electronic designs it becomes even more challenging to avoid issues and delays of a project schedule.

Therefore we decided early on that we would do our outmost to bring this project through all the critical phases thus we are sure to be able to mitigate the unforeseen bumps that could occur late in a project. We are now very proud to say, that we actually were able to bring this project so far and eliminate all the big bumps and risks you would enter for such a venture.
That’s also why we can guarantee deliveries before Christmas of all X-mas Perks.
But we will of course continue looking into the horizon in attempt to foresee what could jeopardize our project schedule – some risks are:
• Delay in parts from sub-suppliers - Could be caused by a tool brake down.
• Slow Production ramp-up - Could be caused due to variation in quality of parts from sub-suppliers
• Delay in customs when distributing products around the World
Therefore if we get a very successful campaign, we will have an even stronger position to mitigate above mentioned risk – for example ordering extra tools of complex parts.
What differentiates the CookPerfect Intelligent Meat Thermometer from other regular meat thermometers?

- The CookPerfect Intelligent Meat Thermometer measures the temperature of meat in five different places, providing the data for our algorithm which uses mathematical calculations to determine the meat’s core temperature. Other regular meat thermometers only measure temperature at the tip of the thermometer. Therefore, you are completely reliant on getting other regular thermometers positioned at the exact centre of the meat, whereas this does not really matter with the CookPerfect Intelligent Meat Thermometer.
How can you be so sure to get the core temperature right?

- We have developed an algorithm which uses five measuring points to calculate the coldest point in the meat (the core temperature). Just make sure to insert the thermometer through the centre of the meat.
Can the CookPerfect tell me when the meat will be done?

- Yes. Using the accompanying app, set your targeted cooking temperature (e.g. 54 degrees Celcius), press ""start"" on the app and after 5 minutes our algorithm will tell you when the meat reaches 54 degrees.
What happens if the grill’s temperature changes?
- Our algorithm continuously calculates the time needed to cook the meat. This means that if the grill’s temperature changes, cooking time will adjust accordingly.
How many pieces of meat can I measure simultaneously with the CookPerfect?
- You can measure two pieces of meat simultaneously – using two different thermometers – and follow them simultaneously in the app.
Can the CookPerfect be used in all kinds of meat?
Can the CookPerfect work on smaller cuts of meat if the probe isn't fully inserted?
- The meat would have to be quite thin if it is not possible to place the CookPerfect Intelligent Meat Thermometer properly into the meat to calculate the meats core temperature.
If that is the case, like a chicken fillet or thin steak, then you can place it horizontally like you would do with other regular thermometers and it will work as you would expect.

For all the ways that technology has improved our lives over the last couple of decades, it has created in our lives a giant vacuum, a dependency that we too often find ourselves unable to escape. The thing is, we can only really escape this dependency by giving it up completely. What does that mean? To start with, it means we need to abandon the Internet when it comes to our most crucial systems, chief among them our security systems. Yes, if we want our security systems to be as efficient as possible, we need to do something counterintuitive: we need to take them offline.

By taking a security system offline, you save money and avoid a reliance upon an Internet connection. Balert is a security system that does just that, running off a 12-volt power supply, requiring no Internet connection, and consuming less than 10 milliamperes of power to keep your home, your office, your shop, or any other property totally secure.
Balert is incredibly simple to install, taking around three minutes and costing just $ 59, which includes worldwide shipping charges.

Unlike other CCTV security systems that take a full day to install, huge money to maintain, and upwards of $200 to start, Balert is compact and affordable. Save money without sacrificing any functionality.

Balert will provide an opportunity to be safe and secure to people and business owners who otherwise would be left defenseless. Because this system is affordable and convenient, it is filling a niche market: the people who need security systems (which is just about everyone) and feel that they cannot afford to get one.

We have come to you, Indiegogo, for help raising $40,000. This start-up capital will cover the costs of manufacturing, marketing, and distributing the initial run of Balert security systems. As a thank-you to you, our early adopters, we are offering discounts, full security systems, and even special-edition security systems.

Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, and any other social media platforms you may use. The more people know about what we are doing, the better off we will be.
We appreciate all contributions at this early stage of our development, and we thank you greatly for your time.

column4: >The most exciting development in grow lighting technology in 2016. The PHG-150 offers unbridled power combined with total energy efficency. Want to take your indoor growing to the next level? The PHG-150 is the complete package.
column8: >Energy Efficiency. The PHG-150 is equivalent to a 500W Metal-Halide grow light. This is outstanding considering the unit only consumes 138W of input power. Combine this with an expected service life of 100,000+ hours.
column12: > The unit is manufactured using only the highest quality materials. The unit features the latest OSRAM LEDs. The LEDs combine with a customised PCB designed by Doug Ford Analog Design - one of the most trusted names in LED circuit design in Australia.

The individual perk delivery times are specified in the perks section of the campaign.
Will the PHG-150 work with different plug configurations from around the world?
If you choose to take up a
perk that includes the PHG-150 you will be contacted to confirm which plug
you require. Your PHG-150 will be manufactured with your desired plug configuration.
Is the Plantilium PHG-150 set up to perform
No. Changes to a plant's requirements are minimal. The benefits of a single ‘plug & play' design far
outweigh the additional cost, time and knowledge required to employ a specialised
balance for individual applications. The designers have taken the time to
understand the fundamentals elements of plant growth, and combined them into a
Is it true that a whiter spectrum is more desirable at different stages of a plant's growth cycle?
PHG-150 on a variety of species and are confident that the red/blue balance of the PHG-150 will meet your plant's requirements at all stages of growth.
What other equipment would I need if I wanted to use
the Plantilium PHG-150 in applications such as a hydroponics?
We’d recommend the use of a
basic timer system that can easily be purchased via the internet, or from
your local hardware store. The use of a timer will allow the Plantilium PHG-150
to be operated for the optimal number of hours per day.
Can I return the PHG-150 if I change my mind?
asked” return policy will be in place. If you wish to return the unit simply  contact the Plantilium team and confirm you will be returning the
unit. Then it’s a matter of returning the unit to Plantilium (at your expense).
Once the team confirms the receipt of the unit your money will be refunded
How can I contact Plantilium if I need to speak to
best way to contact the team is to send an email to info@plantilium.com",15.0,0,"1 Campaign

Rentie started after Chris Schlierman, Co-Founder and CEO, moved to Utah from Los Angeles in December 2016 and couldn’t find a place to live. In Los Angeles there was a website that had built the brand of trust with tenants and landlords called Westside Rentals. Chris always used that site and when he moved to Utah he couldn’t find a single site that had even half the same brand trust or listings. From there the idea was planted and after months of market research to learn and understand the housing industry Chris linked up with his roommate Christian Lambert, his friend from LA, Shane Duggan, and his cousin Danny deLeon to build Rentie: the product that landlords and tenants can actually trust. Our site allows you to connect with landlords and sellers of contracts seamlessly to go from searching to sold within minutes.

Now we at Rentie have been growing very fast. However, this comes at a cost. We have hit the point where we can’t afford to bootstrap enough to meet the demand. We are looking for 50,000 dollars to meet our marketing, staffing, and IT demands. We really appreciate the help! Please share with your friends and family!

Check out our perks for what you get. Your options include a thank you email from the team, a Rentie t-shirt, going to lunch with a team member, coming to a team activity, being a VIP at one of our parties or community events, and working with the team to improve Rentie.

The primary risks for Rentie right now are refining our product and scaling our technologies to meet rising demand. Our development team has researched what we need to do to make sure we can scale. We've got the strategies necessary for this, but we need funds to be able to have the time and talent to move forward with scaling our product. While we haven't done this kind of scaling before, we are confident that we can learn what we need to, and we are confident we can expand our engineering team to fill in any remaining skill gaps. Having the funds to expand our team will also allow us to speed up our development cycle, minimizing the possibility of being undercut by our competition, and allowing us to deliver a higher quality experience sooner.
If you can’t contribute you can use our website and share your experiences with your friends and family. Check out myrentie.com and start searching today!

After a successful campaign on another platform with 1,000 backers, we are bringing the LessMore Flosser Set to Indiegogo. All backers are in effect getting an improved second generation product with fine-tuned details as a result of our recent work.

Background

Our core team member has work experience in the dental laboratory sector for over 15 years, having delivered dental crown and implant work to thousands of patients. For someone whose mind is set on oral health all the time and who happens to enjoy creative design, this product is brought out hardly by coincidence. 

Using a Water Flosser is not a substitute of flossing

Loads of Details Incorporated Into Its Simplistic Looks!

The tips of the flosser are designed to the optimal width so that there is enough length for users to finish flossing all the upper and lower teeth. This width makes it comfortable to move around in the mouth.

Its round shape avoids hurting gums while retaining the grip desired to achieve the tightness of the floss. 

Achieving the Correct Way of Flossing, Do it Easier and Quicker

We would like to help people achieve the correct way of flossing by using our flosser. This photo illustrates how it does the job. By pressing the floss deeper against the root of the gums it brings out more food debris. You can tell the difference after use.

Easy to Reach All Areas in the Mouth

Patent Pending Groove and Locking System

Despite its simple look it is a patent pending system comprising the groove channel, the shape of the tips and the fastening element. 

The Floss Is Kept Tight, Just The Way It Should Be

This ensures that you floss through all teeth without having to re-wrap your floss.
 

The floss holder can be used with any floss you are using at the moment. You don't need to stick to our floss included in the pack. Simply wrap any floss around the holder as shown in the video.

 

The Floss Dispenser Is Re-usable As Opposed To Disposable Ones On the Market

We hate to see the throwing away of plastics. We would like to have you join us in tackling this BIG social issue. 

Here is a bit more we have done: making the floss dispenser a re-usable one. So you only replace the floss inside once about every 10 months without throwing away the dispenser.

 

In the meanwhile, it is made into the STAND for the flosser so as to

Keep Things Clean And Organised

Like we said, this product has been created with reducing plastic use as equally important an objective. This not only applies to our design concept but also our supplies. Our aim is to combine good design and quality so that customers will keep using this re-usable set for many years. 

COST SAVING

Spending reduced from 24 pounds to 4 Pounds a year (if you are using disposable floss picks). Not bad! 

Helps Children Start Flossing

For little kids to learn to floss at 7 or 8 years old it will be a difficult task. It becomes an easy job with the help of our flosser. 

 *Actual product colors are different from above photo

Materails For the Product and Floss

We have chosen to use FOOD GRADE materials the same as used in tooth brushes for both the flosser and the dispenser.

We will offer replacement rolls of floss on amazon after commerical launch.

The floss is packaged in BIODEGRADABLE plastics. We would like to give you a guilt-free experience in using our products. 

Shipping Costs will be shown after you have selected your rewards. The table below is an indication of shipping costs for different regions using 2x rewards as an example.

We have already done 7-8 times of trial productions with our first version of mould.

 

We faced the decision when approaching the end with the first mould: manufacture using this mould with some aspects of the products that we are not entirely happy with, or obsorb the costs and invest in a new mould.

We decided to go for the latter.

Issues like fuzzy area around the logo and thin edge of dispenser are addressed, we are also able to use brass threaded inserts to add some premium feel. The tightening knob is now bigger with anti-slip features.

Eco-Packaging

The design process has been, like all creative work, a mix of pain and joy. Its current sleek minimalistic look is decided after changing drawings 6 to 7 times. The dispenser’s overall contour went from round to flat-surfaced. The most difficult part is hammering out the precise position of the metal cutter to stick out enough but not too much, as well as its supporting structure for easy installation in production. The idea of using the dispenser as the stand for the handle came last during the process.

Undoubtedly the story of Detroit parallels the story of Philetus W. Norris.

The hustle and the entrepreneurial spirit. Creating something basically from nothing but hard work and true grit. Celebrating the Wins and rolling with Busts. Seeker of knowledge, a poet, and Storyteller.

But there is little left to us tell of his story 150 years later. And one of those things is the house he built.

Constructed in 1873 by Norris, who went on to become the second superintendent of Yellowstone National Park. Norris founded the town of ""Norris"" (later ""North Detroit"" aka Nortown) and built his house there. The town was later annexed into the city of Detroit
column2:
Norris's house is one of the few original structures left in the area.

However this house is on the brink destruction and without preserving what is left, Mr. Norris comes closer to being lost to obscurity.

Supporters and defenders of Norris’ legacy have organized together to help save this house. We are asking for assistance to make the first steps to raise funds to repair the roof, shore structural damage from a partial structure fire, and do basic landscaping to alleviate blight.

Doing this will stave off losing of the registered historical status and in turn prevent the building from being demolished.

$51.230.00  is needed in order to do the following:

column5: >Roof: $43,200 ( Constractor 2008 Estimate, adjusted for inflation via http://data.bls.gov.)

column1:
Please help us raise the funds to save this historical residence.

Perhaps, with your support, The Philetus W. Norris House Historical District will continue to embody that Detroit Spirit, such as embodied in the City of Detroit’s Great Seal has Latin the motto meaning ""We hope for better things"" and ""It will rise from the ashes"".

Supporters can also donate directly by mailing to:

ATTN: Norris House Restoration
Nortown CDC
P.O. Box 34102
Detroit, MI 48234
Thank you for your time and consideration,

-The Philetus W. Norris House Historic District Restoration Committee

hEmpowering Bottom-Up is building homes for dalit communities around Nepal.

It is based on the understanding that having a clean and safe place to live, eat and sleep is a basic requirement for any kind of further development to happen (as highlighted by Maslow's hierarchy of needs, 1943). If basic needs like food and shelter are not fulfilled, an individual cannot move up the ladder to fulfill other needs like safety, love, self esteem and self actualization.

hEmpowering Bottom-Up is a project jointly initiated by Shah Hemp Inno-Ventures (SHIV) and Women Development Advocacy Center (WDAC). Both SHIV  and WDAC () are organizations of Nepalese origin and working in Nepal for the economic and social development of Nepal respectively. We initiated this project in July 2016 and with support of HempConsult and Hempro International (Germany based firms) finished the prototype home for a family of five in December 2016 (https://hemptoday.net/shiv-nears-completion-hem...).

Anybody who has been to Nepal knows why hemp makes sense in this important project: Hemp grows in the wild all over Nepal. International convention and laws have not been able to remove the plant from the DNA of the country due to its religious, social and economic relevance. For generations and decades, seeds and fiber of the plant have been major sources of livelihood for people living in remote western areas of Nepal.

SHIV was founded in the post-earthquake (2015) context of Nepal to use the hemp plant for developing and providing its people an economical and sustainable model of living. Working at ground level for earthquake reconstruction we realized that large numbers of families did not lose a home in the earthquake -- because they did not have one before. This harsh reality led to our mission of providing a home to every homeless person in Nepal. This mission gave name to the project: hEmpowering Bottom-Up.

In this project, the houses are built from hempcrete, a bio-composite made from the inner woody core of the hemp plant mixed with a lime/clay binder. The structure of the house is made with bamboo.

Building homes for the needy is not an innovative solution to homelessness/poverty. But building homes with hemp definitely makes it not only innovative but economically, socially and environmentally sustainable as well. This project does three things differently:

Homes built under this project are neither a financial burden nor a charity for the beneficiary family. It works on the model of local sustainability, where the beneficiary family contribute in building their house by being part of construction team. This ensures that they earn ownership of their new homes and gain skills along the way.

Homes built under this project are extremely healthy -- with built-in thermal insulation and humidity regulation. The structures provide the families a permanent, earthquake resistant home which doesn't feel like an oven in summers and freezer in winters.

Homes are built with local material, local people and with technology easy to learn and easy to maintain. In the next couple of years the beneficiary family can easily maintain their house by themselves without any need of external support.

Construction of the prototype house provided a boost to the local economy and provided employment to the local youth.

The cost of building the prototype house was $5000. 75% of the total cost was the cost of raw material and 25% was the cost of the manpower. Interestingly, 95% of $5000 spent in building the prototype house went to the villages as payment for the raw materials like sand, clay, hemp shivs, bamboo, and as compensating the local construction team, thereby contributing to the local economy.

In this second phase, we want to build 6 houses in 6 different villages of south eastern Nepal, hence we request $30,000  through this crowdfunding campaign. Along with building these six houses we are also proposing the Government of Nepal to adopt this model for constructing 1,000 houses they intend to build in every district for Nepal in next 5 years. With this, every penny contributed in this model not only builds a home but also generates employment and boosts local economy.

For the amount of construction that is needed in Nepal in next five years, if it isn't done with natural &
column2:
local construction material then we would end up destroying the natural beauty of Nepal.

Let's hEmpower!!!

For more details on hempcrete construction in general and in context of Nepal, watch the following video

I. Background and urgency
column2:
>

* Three real facts

FACT 1:  According to WHO, every year, more than 1 billion people are infected and more than 1 million die from vector-borne diseases such as malaria and dengue carried by mosquitoes, flies and other vectors.

FACT 2:  Most of these deaths occur in Africa. Both adults and children, seems to have been accustomed to the surrounding flies, they do not know the dangers of flies.

FACT 3:  Landfills are paradise for flies, living space for people who earn a living by picking up garbage. They even eat, play, sleep, pass the whole life on the landfills. Hunger is their main issue, but they do not know the virus carried by flies that around them is also threatening their survival. They even have no choice.
column4:
>………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………

Warm and beautiful spring is coming, lives will be resuscitated, but this can also mean ill and death because of flies and the vector-born disease coming after them.
column5:
>………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………

II. Solution and project progress

* Main solution — Flies Trap Lid
column6:
>

Coffee, ordinary daily commodities, just Starbucks, 4 Billion To-Go Cups have been thrown away each Year. Our main solution is to change the disposable coffee lid. When people finish drinking, they just need to press the trap bottom before throwing it away. The flies will be easily attracted by the residual coffee smell.

Because of the trap hole's conical structure, once the fly gets in, it’s hard to get out. As the crowd moves, the trap lid can be randomly and quickly distributed in every corner of the city. Everyone can join to prevent from the spread vector-borne diseases.

Help to reduce the spread of the virus and prevent death without public property and energy consumption in an extremely easy way.

The cost of our coffee lid is almost the same with the normal one. We also can transform the coffee lids with any other food box lid.

* Another solution— Fruit Fly Catcher

Fruit Fly Catcher is a complementary solution for Flies Trap Lid.

Considering Flies Trap Lid is a consumable goods and designed for public good. It works only when a lot of people participate to use it. But we want to give a perfect and meaningful souvenir for our sympathetic backers. So we designed this Fruit Fly Catcher to support the Flies Trap Lid project. From this,  you also can see our determination.
column10:
>

The principle of Fruit Fly Catcher is similar with Flies Trap Lid. The difference is that it is designed for catching fruit fly and bactrocera cucuribitae ( a kind of fruit-destroying  pests). So the trap hole size is based on them. More worth mentioning is we manufacture an attractant with the help of a biology professor, its raw materials are edible, and it's really works very well.

It has a hanging ring
column11:
you can not only put it at home, but also hang it in your orchard. It is rainproof and easy to clean. Remember to add some oil in the bottle (to kill the insects and prevent rot).

* Project progress
column12:
>

III. About us and join us

* General information

- Our team is composed of five students in France and Spain. 

- Our goal is simple: To prevent the diseases carried by flies and reduce death.

- Our team founder's major is Distributed Computing. Briefly saying, many common computers work together to solve a problem that requires large computations, such as predicting earthquakes. Flies Trap Lid was originally inspired by it. We want to create a worldwide environmental protection activity. This activity can save lives but do not need additional financial expenditure. You can even participate in it unconsciously.

* The feasibility of the project

- The money will be mainly used on mold. The factory said the die sinking cost is about 2000 euros.

- After the products come out, we plan to transport some to Africa, and give them to governments or NGOs.

- Coffee shops and fast food restaurants owners are accustomed to using regular coffee lids. They will not accept our design immediately, so in the beginning, we also need to send them for free.

* Risks &
column13:
Challenges

- Firstly, it's may be difficult to persuade people to abandon the traditional disposable coffee cup lid and use ours. ​ ​

- Secondly, there will be some opposition from competitors who selling one-time use fruit fly traps, since our Fruit Fly Catcher is reusable and more effective.

- Thirdly, the plagiarism. We have to say, for the coffee cup lid, we don't worry about the plagiarism. Because the plagiarist's products can still catch flies and save lives. From another point of view, we actually want more people to adopt such a design to help those living in areas of infectious diseases raging people. But for our Fruit Fly Catcher, it may bring in some income
column14:
some people will try to plagiarism. We have applied for a patent. In the beginning, the cup lid project need the support from Fruit Fly Catcher. When the cup lid project works well, we will open source Fruit Fly Catcher.

 * About the rewards

Our reward includes:

 - Flies Trap Lid.

 - Fruit Fly Catcher set.

 - Put your name on the ""Contributor"" page.

Sometimes we try to donate some money to help the poor, but the money is just helpful at a moment, it’s hard to make a big change unless it is a huge amount. What we need is a sustained action. Although it may be insignificant, but at least we put into action.

Maybe one of the coffee cup we've used to save the lives of the children who live in the landfills.

Share this project, it also makes a big help.
column18: showinfo=0"">","I. Background and urgency* Three real factsFACT 1:  According to WHO, every year, more than 1 billion people are infected and more than 1 million die from vector-borne diseases such as malaria and dengue carried by mosquitoes, flies and other vectors.FACT 2:  Most of these deaths occur in Africa. Both adults and children, seems to have been accustomed to the surrounding flies, they do not know the dangers of flies.FACT 3:  Landfills are paradise for flies, living space for people who earn a living by picking up garbage. They even eat, play, sleep, pass the whole life on the landfills. Hunger is their main issue, but they do not know the virus carried by flies that around them is also threatening their survival. They even have no choice.………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………Warm and beautiful spring is coming, lives will be resuscitated, but this can also mean ill and death because of flies and the vector-born disease coming after them.………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………II. Solution and project progress* Main solution — Flies Trap LidCoffee, ordinary daily commodities, just Starbucks, 4 Billion To-Go Cups have been thrown away each Year. Our main solution is to change the disposable coffee lid. When people finish drinking, they just need to press the trap bottom before throwing it away. The flies will be easily attracted by the residual coffee smell.Because of the trap hole's conical structure, once the fly gets in, it’s hard to get out. As the crowd moves, the trap lid can be randomly and quickly distributed in every corner of the city. Everyone can join to prevent from the spread vector-borne diseases.Help to reduce the spread of the virus and prevent death without public property and energy consumption in an extremely easy way.The cost of our coffee lid is almost the same with the normal one. We also can transform the coffee lids with any other food box lid.* Another solution— Fruit Fly CatcherFruit Fly Catcher is a complementary solution for Flies Trap Lid.Considering Flies Trap Lid is a consumable goods and designed for public good. It works only when a lot of people participate to use it. But we want to give a perfect and meaningful souvenir for our sympathetic backers. So we designed this Fruit Fly Catcher to support the Flies Trap Lid project. From this,  you also can see our determination.The principle of Fruit Fly Catcher is similar with Flies Trap Lid. The difference is that it is designed for catching fruit fly and bactrocera cucuribitae ( a kind of fruit-destroying  pests). So the trap hole size is based on them. More worth mentioning is we manufacture an attractant with the help of a biology professor, its raw materials are edible, and it's really works very well.It has a hanging ring
column19: you can not only put it at home, but also hang it in your orchard. It is rainproof and easy to clean. Remember to add some oil in the bottle (to kill the insects and prevent rot).* Project progressIII. About us and join us* General information- Our team is composed of five students in France and Spain. - Our goal is simple: To prevent the diseases carried by flies and reduce death.- Our team founder's major is Distributed Computing. Briefly saying, many common computers work together to solve a problem that requires large computations, such as predicting earthquakes. Flies Trap Lid was originally inspired by it. We want to create a worldwide environmental protection activity. This activity can save lives but do not need additional financial expenditure. You can even participate in it unconsciously.* The feasibility of the project- The money will be mainly used on mold. The factory said the die sinking cost is about 2000 euros.- After the products come out, we plan to transport some to Africa, and give them to governments or NGOs.- Coffee shops and fast food restaurants owners are accustomed to using regular coffee lids. They will not accept our design immediately, so in the beginning, we also need to send them for free.* Risks & Challenges- Firstly, it's may be difficult to persuade people to abandon the traditional disposable coffee cup lid and use ours. ​ ​- Secondly, there will be some opposition from competitors who selling one-time use fruit fly traps, since our Fruit Fly Catcher is reusable and more effective.- Thirdly, the plagiarism. We have to say, for the coffee cup lid, we don't worry about the plagiarism. Because the plagiarist's products can still catch flies and save lives. From another point of view, we actually want more people to adopt such a design to help those living in areas of infectious diseases raging people. But for our Fruit Fly Catcher, it may bring in some income
column20: some people will try to plagiarism. We have applied for a patent. In the beginning, the cup lid project need the support from Fruit Fly Catcher. When the cup lid project works well, we will open source Fruit Fly Catcher. * About the rewardsOur reward includes: - Flies Trap Lid. - Fruit Fly Catcher set. - Put your name on the ""Contributor"" page.Sometimes we try to donate some money to help the poor, but the money is just helpful at a moment, it’s hard to make a big change unless it is a huge amount. What we need is a sustained action. Although it may be insignificant, but at least we put into action.Maybe one of the coffee cup we've used to save the lives of the children who live in the landfills.Share this project, it also makes a big help. Update-Rainproof test",10.0,1,"1 Campaign

column2: >

column1: Isn't it ironic that most recycling bins are made of oil based plastic and brushed aluminium?  Why do something that's good for our planet like recycling using something that isn’t?  Your dwiss is made of wood grown in responsibly managed forests, its durable design means it will last and last, and at the end of a long and happy life it can be recycled - all good!

It has 4 large compartments, including 1 that can be discreetly fitted with a bag for trash so you don't need a separate unit.  The other 3 compartments give flexible recycling options, with 1 having a removable tub suitable for composting.  Just decide what goes where and #reclaimyourworktops
People that trialled the dwiss refused to return them because they were so happy to have clear worktops again!

The dwiss' innovative 'frame and compartment' design provides more capacity than is currently available on the market and it’s super easy to keep clean - the bottom of all 4 compartments can be easily reached and the tub is safe to go in the dishwasher.  It's also easy to empty each compartment, the bottom two can be removed and carried in one hand, leaving the other hand free to open the door when taking the recycling out for collection.  And for peace of mind your dwiss is laser engraved on the rear with a serial number so we can provide first class customer service over the years to come.

We are asking for your help to fund our first large scale production run.  Your donations will also enable us to develop a low cost version of the dwiss made of recycled material, and which can be used on a scale where we'll significantly reduce the amount of waste ending up in landfill and in our seas.
If you're quick you can snap up a dwiss at up to 40% off the regular price!

Hi, I'm Jon, the Founder of dwiss.  I came up with the idea for the dwiss whilst working as an environmental manager.  I saw the clear benefits of recycling (conservation of natural resources, increased energy efficiency, reduced emissions and less waste to landfill) so started recycling what I could at home.  Our kitchen was soon full of piles of paper, plastic, tins and glass, you know the scene.  So I looked for a recycling bin that looked good, worked well and was itself sustainable. When I couldn't find it anything I thought I'd make one, what could be hard about that right...?  A little over 10 years laters and here we are!!

If you think a dwiss would make your kitchen look smarter and help you minimise the impact your trash has on this beautiful planet of ours then please check out our great rewards.  Making a donation in exchange for a reward will really help, and by sharing our video with your friends you are helping us spread the word.  With your help we can shift to a more sustainable position on the use of natural resources, and preserve a healthy environment for the generations of today and tomorrow.
To make the dwiss we need several manufacturing tools, materials and skilled craftsmen.  As such your donations will be used like this...

All rewards involve a dwiss - even for $10 you stand the chance of winning one. There's also the knowledge that you've helped start something great.

 

 

So, our rewards, or 'perks' as Indiegogo likes to call them...

• They start at $10 with the 'Lucky' dwiss for which you stand the chance of winning a dwiss. You'll also receive a personalised note of gratitude and your contribution will be acknowledged on yourdwiss.com, happy days!

'Make someone smile' gives you the chance of winning a dwiss.  You'll also receive a personalised note of gratitude and your contribution will be acknowledged on yourdwiss, plus you get 3 stunning postcards showing the dwiss taking time out in the glorious Yorkshire Dales.

• The exclusive, one-time-only, For the 53 'Founders' includes 40% off, nice, but your dwiss also carries additional laser engraving on the back, acknowledging you as one of the 53 founding fellows of Fellow53 Ltd ('dwiss' is our trading name) and will be serial numbered 1-53.  I'll also send you a hand written letter of thanks and we'll acknowledge you on yourdwiss.com.
• Or there's the 'Early Bird' you can grab your dwiss with 25% off.
• We've then got a 'Multi-Buy' reward if you and a friend want to buddy up for a 10% discount, or you want one for home and one for the office.
• And finally we've got the 'Presentation Package' reward, which includes 2 dwiss and a visit from me to deliver a presentation or talk sharing the story of how I brought my idea to life.

Both the Multi-Buy and Presentation Package rewards include an acknowledgement note and inclusion on yourdwiss.com.

Thank you for taking the time to read about dwiss, we hope you love the product and can see its potential.  It’s been an incredible journey to get to this point, and now with your help we can take it to the next stage.

Please support and share.

Thank you,

Jon

Portable, Cordless, and Automatic. MagicRod comes with 5000mAh rechargeable battery to offer 60 minutes working time. The patented automatic technology will allow you to wrap around your hair and create curls automatically within 8 seconds at home, or wherever you go!

The patented automatic technology will wrap around your hair automatically in a safe and easy way, you just need to press one button and wait around 8 seconds to experience the most gorgeous curls for your next vacation, party or even for work.

column2: >Thanks for the unbiased and great hands-on review from Youtube Influencer Milabu! She was even shocked by the long-lasting curls, let's click to check out the truth!

column1: ​​In order to keep your curls in perfect condition, and looks healthy &
column2: fresh, MagicRod features 6 adjustable low heat settings: 150℃/160℃/170℃/180℃/190℃/200℃, combined with 6 timer settings: 8s, 10s, 12s, 14s, 16s, 18s to avoid damaging your hair, even your hair is

column1: Making your curls last longer can always be a challenge, but with patented automatic technology, MagicRod allows you to create your curls just the way you like them.  The best part of all, you will enjoy perfect curls that’ll last over 5 hours.

We care about your safety if you put in too much hair in the barrel. It will automatically stop and reverse the hair from getting tangled up! The auto shut-off after 10 minutes of no use makes MagicRod protect your families from any incident.
There are many hair curlers with a naked barrel sometimes that you even feel dangerous, MagicRod comes with unique heat isolating curl chamber to protect your hands from any instant surface heat.

Would you like to wake up every morning and spend less time on beautiful waves and curls? Are you always running late or “on the go” yet still want to create “Party curls” with charming style? MagicRod only takes a few short minutes and you’re all set!

The portable design is perfect for anyone who loves to travel, MagicRod comes with 5000mAh lithium-ion rechargeable battery for 60 minutes working time, which allows you to create 3 hairstyles even for thick hair.

Even at home, MagicRod brings you a lot of conveniences, easy to organize without tangled wires and locate a socket. The patented automatic technology is delicately designed for the easiest curls for your lifestyle.

MagicRod was established in 2015 by a small but talented group of young and passionate beauty and personal care enthusiasts based in Shenzhen, China.  Ever since its humble beginnings, MagicRod has been putting its focus on cutting-edge hardware innovation, superior product design and development, and creating simple hair care solutions. MagicRod is not only passionate about what they do and create, but they are also fully dedicated to becoming the #1 hair curler brand worldwide.

To maximize our success, there are several hurdles we must overcome as a company. We are currently working hard with our partners to consolidate production plans and coordinate third-party vendors. Despite spending the last two years building an efficient supply chain, we may run into component delays or unexpected shortages. An international logistical risk is present as our product contains a battery which is more difficult to ship internationally. Therefore, the speed and price of shipping may affect the number of units we are able to deliver to each country. If this occurs then we will keep the community informed while doing our best to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.
Remarks: MagicRod can't be shipped to North America, Asia, and Pacific countries.

This didactic toy is more than just a toy. In production, natural materials were used, with no harmful chemicals, and every part of this toy was hand-made and polished with natural bee wax.
Hand-made cube made of real wood with two pieces of plexiglass that transmit LED lights embedded in the cube. The cube is illuminated when the square-man is inserted.
You can select two types of the cube: Ash and Cherry, Ash and Walnut.

SPECIFICATION

All products are handmade

 

LIGHT UP CUBE

• Light-triggered by inserting the “square-man toy” in the cube
• 100% natural solid wood
• 12v powered led light
• Highly polished with beeswax
• Dimension: 4” x 4” x 4” (100mm x 100mm x 100mm)

 

SQUAREMAN TOY

• 100% natural solid wood
• Two types of wood - dark &
column2:
light
• Highly polished with beeswax
• Dimension: 1.2” x 1.2” x 2.75” (30mm x 30mm x 70mm)

 

Squareman -Unique key chains

For those who support our project but do not need toys. :)

When making square-man and other toys there are some excess materials remaining from sawing and these materials we use to make various key chains. Each one is handmade and unique. In each pendant, you will find one or more semi-precious stones such as zircon or amethyst… depending on the shape, the color of the wood and the current inspiration.

 

Squareman - Multipurpose wooden toys

 

Squareman is made up of two types of wood for a more beautiful design, 1.2"" width and length fit perfectly into the light cube and all the other toys that are being prepared or are in the final stage of preparation.

 

The cube, squareman and all the other toys are made of natural wood without coloring, highly polished and protected with bee wax.

 

SPECIFICATION

All products are handmade
